description.zh: 在二十世紀眾多分歧的思想中，有些廣受人們的認同，並信奉為價值體系而實踐，此稱為思潮。這些流行的思潮，影響人民生活，社會生計，更影響著國家的發展方向。因此，這些思潮與國家發展有極為密切的關係。思潮的內容及其與國家發展的關係就是本課程的主要內容。當代思潮中，民族主義、國家主義與世界主義的理想不同，國家之運作便不相同；民主主義、共產主義影響各國的政治制度及人民的生活方式；資本主義、社會主義與共產主義關係著國計民生，在經濟、社會及生活各層面都深受其影響。本課程中第一部分介紹最具代表性的當代思潮，第二部份就民族思潮、經濟思潮與國家發展的關係加以剖析，藉以探討我國立國的精神所在，即民族平等、政治民主，經濟發展，以實現三民主義自由、民主、均富理想。
description.en: In the 21th century, there are numerous different thoughts in which some are well recognized, treasured and put in practice. These popular thoughts influence the livelihood, the society and the direction of national development. So contemporary thoughts plays an important role in national development. Such contemporary thoughts and national development are the key contents of this course.The ideal of such thoughts as Racism, Nationalism, and Cosmopolitanism differ from each other, so they have a different effect on national policy decision. Nationalism and Communism influence the political system of the nation and the lifestyle of its citizens. Capitalism, Socialism and Communism have a main impact on the social and economical issues and affect the quality of life of a nation. The first part of this course introduces the most representative contemporary thoughts. The second part analyzes the effect of national thoughts, political thoughts and economical thoughts on a nation.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。介紹產品製造的程序和各種加工方法，及使用的機械設備、製造過程材料及製程參數的影響，製程規劃及製造成本的因素、產品檢驗量測技術及品質管制的方法、製程自動化及電腦整合製造系統等。
description.en: Introduction to a variety of manufacturing processes and associated production equipments, operations planning and cost estimating of the production process, techniques of measurements and basic components of a quality control  system, concepts of process automation and computer integrated manufacturing.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。材料性質、製程與結構之關係、機械基礎-彈性行為、塑性基本理論。冶金基礎-單晶的塑性變形、差排理論、強化機構、材料的破壞。
description.en: Mechanical Fundamentals: Introduction, stress and strain relationships for Elastic Behavior, Elements of the theory of Plasticity, etc.. Metallurgical Fundamentals: Plastic Deformation of Single Crystal, Dislocation Theory, Strengthening Mechanism, Fracture, etc..

description.zh: 先修課程：3002014或負責教授同意。一維及多維穩定態熱傳導及非穩定態熱傳導、對流原理、強迫對流及自然對流經驗和實驗關係式、輻射熱傳遞、凝結與沸騰、熱交換器、熱傳遞中的特殊論題。
description.en: Steady-State Conduction-One Dimension, Steady-State Conduction-Multiple Dimensions, Unsteady-State Conduction, Principles of Convection, Empirical and Practical Relations for Forced-Convection Heat Transfer, Natural- Convection Systems, Radiation Heat Transfer, Condensation and Boiling Heat Transfer, Heat Exchangers, Special Topics in Heat Transfer.

description.zh: 先修課程：3002012及3002015或負責教授同意。以單元實例說明機械設計之過程:設計理念、設計方法、設計步驟(物料及材質選用、元件設計、製造控制、及設計整合等)、品質與設計問題發生與破解實例、專題研究。
description.en: Study of Machine Design by Example Units: Design Concepts & Methodology, Design Approaches (Material Selection, Element Design, Manufacturing Control and Integral Design), Quality and Design Function, Theoretical Study in Designed Examples.

description.zh: 先修課程：3001053或負責教授同意。Z-轉換、取樣資料系統、等效於連續函數的數位濾波器設計、使用轉換技術設計數位控制系統、使用狀態空間設計數位控制系統、電腦控制。
description.en: Z-Transform, Sampled-Data Systems, Discrete Equivalents to Continuous Transfer Functions: The Digital Filter, Design of Digital Control Systems Using Transform Techniques, Design of Digital Control Systems Using State-Space Methods, Application and Practice of Digital Control, Case Study.

description.zh: 先修課程：3001017或負責教授同意。運動方程式、一維振動（自由及強制）、振動量測、二維振動、多維振動及機械應用說明。
description.en: Equation of Motion, Single-Degree-of-Freedom Vibration (Free and Forced),Measurement of Vibrations, Two-Degree-of-Freedom Vibration, Multiple-Degree-of-Freedom Vibration and its Applications in Mechanical Engineering.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。系統匯流排（匯流排之時序、匯流排之負載及驅動能力）、序列系統介面（8251可程式通信介面）、平行系統介面（8251可式程式週邊介面）、A/D &D/A 介面、系統中斷 DMA(Direct Memory Access)介面 、通訊訊號介面（RS232、RS422、電流迴路）、區域性網路（區域性網路概論、區域性網路的使用方法、區域性網路方式及目的）、區域性網路的基礎技術、通訊線路及信號、資料交換規則、匯流排網路的特性及分析。
description.en: System Bus (Bus Timing, Bus Loading, Bus Driven), Serial Communication Interfaces (8251 Programmable Communication Interfaces), Parallel Communication (8255 Programmable Peripheral Interface), A/D & D/A Interface, Interrupt System, Direct Memory Access Controllers Communication Interface (RS232, RS422, Current Loop), Local Networks (Introduction of Networks Technology, Communication Circuit and Signals, Data Switching Techniques, Network Performance & Analysis).

description.zh: 先修課程:負責教授同意。自動化機械之機構、感測器與驅動器介面技術、可程式控制程式設計及應用、作實際自動化機械之模擬、分析及設計專題。
description.en: prerequisite: the permission of the instructorsubjects: mechatronic systems, mechanism of mechatronic systems, sensors, drivers and actuators, interface techniques , PLC, and case study.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。二技三年級實施普通班體育正課教學。
description.en: The teaching goal is to establishing students have a Health life、Sportsmanship、Team work and Life time exercise habit.  All Freshman students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.

description.zh: 本課程旨在加強閱讀策略指導，以培養學生獨立閱讀、及使用適當英文表達之能力。教材以介紹英語地區文化、思想、及價值觀為主，以協助學生建立世界觀，並培養其批判思考能力。教學活動以分組討論、段落寫作與短文習作。
description.en: This course aims at providing the students with various reading strategies so that they may find the optimal straategies when they read independently; and furnishing the students with competence in writing.  Reading selections will be mainly focused on discussion of the cultures, thoughts and values of the English-speaking world.  Students will be required to join class activites, which encompasses group discussion, small group discussion, paragraph writing and essay writing.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。物質熱力學特性、改變能量形式之基本原理、熱力學第一及第二定律、可逆性與可用性、動力循環、冷凍循環、混合氣、化學反應。
description.en: Prerequisite: Consent of InstructorThermodynamic Properties of Substance, Energy Forms, The First Law Thermodynamics, The Second Law of Thermodynamics, Irreversibility & Availability, Power Cycle, Refrigeration Systems, Mixtures, and Chemical Reactions.

description.zh: 先修課程：3002012或負責教授同意。介紹各種不同分析方法（如能量法及Castigliano定理）、破壞理論、材料選用、可靠度概念、軸及軸承、離合器及煞車器、傳動元件(如皮帶、鏈條、齒輪)、軸聯接器、飛輪、彈簧等。
description.en: Prerequisite: ME212 or Consent of Instructor Introduction to Analysis Methods (Energy method & Castigliano theorem), Failure Theory, Material Selection, Introduction to reliability, Shafts and Bearings, Clutches and Brakes, Power Transmission Elements (Belts, Chains, Gears), Couplings, Flywheels, and Springs.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。以C語言為主的計算機應用程式設計，得包含：人機界面程式、即時多工程式、輸出入界面程式、多媒體程式、通訊及網路程式。
description.en: Computer programming using C language: programming of human-machine interface, real-time multi-task programming, input/output interface programming, multimedia programming, communicational and network programming.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。材料科學與工程緒論、原子結構與鏈結、結晶構造與幾何結晶學、凝固、結晶缺陷與固體中的擴散、金屬材料之機械性質、聚合材料、相圖、工程合金、陶瓷材料、複合材料、腐蝕、材料的電性質、光性質與超導材料、磁性材料。
description.en: Introduction to Material Science and Engineering, Atomic Structure and Bonding, Crystal Structures and Crystal Geometry, Solidification, Crystal Imperfections and Diffusion in Solids, Mechanical Properties of Metals, Ploymeric Materials, Phase diagram, Engineering Alloys, Ceramic Materials, Composite Materials, Corrosion, Electrical Properties of materials, Optical properties and Superconducting Materials, and Magnetic Materials.

description.zh: 先修課程：3001011或負責教授同意。力、質量與加速度、質點運動學、質點動力學、功與能、衝量與動量、剛體運動、剛體系的動力學。
description.en: Force and Acceleration, Kinematics of a Particle, Kinetics of a Particle, Work and Energy, Impulse and Momentum, Kinematics of a Rigid Body, Kinetics of a Rigid Body.

description.zh: 先修課程：微積分或負責教授同意。常微分方程式、線性常微分方程式、拉普拉氏轉換、級數及傅立葉級數、線性代數及矩陣、積分定理。
description.en: Introduction of the deformation, Strain and stress of structure (Beam, Column, Pressure vessel) under different loading conditions such as Tension, Compression, Shear force, Torsion and Bending moment.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。半導體元件、整流電路、電晶體和電路、運算放大器、線性積體電路、邏輯元件、數位電路、數位積體電路、微處理器、放大器等。
description.en: Semiconduction Device, Rectifier circuit, Transistor Circuit, Operational Amplifier, Linear Integrated Circuit, logic Device, Digital Circuit, Digital Integrated Circuit, Micro Processor, Amplifier, etc.

description.zh: 先修課程：3001018或負責教授同意。介紹特殊加工如超音波加工、放電加工、雷射加工、化學蝕刻、電化學加工、電子束加工、高壓水束加工等，及表面處裡技術如金屬噴佈、金屬塗層、物理蒸鍍、化學蒸鍍等，及其他新開發之加工法，除了說明加工原理外並探討各加工法之技術。
description.en: Introduction to Special Material Processing Methods, including Electrical-Discharge Machining, Laser-Material Processing, Chemical Machining, Electrochemical Machining, Electron-Beam Machining, Hydrodynamic Machining, the Principle as well as the Technologies of each Process will be discussed.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。包括工業發展概況、工廠組織、工廠計劃與佈置、製造工程、工作研究、生產管制、物料管理、品質管制、成本管制、人事管理、工業安全與衛生。
description.en: General Situation of Industrial Developments, Factory Organization, Factory Plan and Layout, Manufacture Engineering, Work Study, Product Control, Materials Control,  Quality Control, Cost Control, Personnel Management, Industrial Safety and Hygiene.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。鑄造的廣義定義、鑄造相關的材料基礎、鑄造的方案設計、凝固理論、熱分析技術的原理與應用、配料計算與交祝、實驗設計簡介、鑄造金屬、特殊鑄造法等。
description.en: The General definition of Foundry, Material fundamentals concerning casting, Foundry project design, Solidification theory, Thermal analysis and its application, Material preparing and pouring, Experimental design, Metal for casting, Special casting process, etc..

name.zh: 自動化機構設計與實習

description.zh: 自動化機構運動及動力分析、控制理論與氣液壓學簡介、機構元件說明、馬達及感測器選用、實驗器材介紹、機構選用實例及實習。
description.en: Kinematic and dynamic Analysis of automatic mechanisms, Control theorem, Introduction to pneumatics and Hydraulics,Mechanism elements, Selection of motors and sensors,        Introduction to Lab. Instruments, Examples and Lab's of mechanism selection.

description.zh: 先修課程：3001011或負責教授同意。力、質量與加速度、質點運動學、質點動力學、功與能、衝量與動量、剛體運動、剛體系的動力學。
description.en: Force and Acceleration, Kinematics of a Particle, Kinetics of a Particle, Work and Energy, Impulse and Momentum, Kinematics of a Rigid Body, Kinetics of a Rigid Body.

description.zh: 先修課程：微積分或負責教授同意。常微分方程式、線性常微分方程式、拉普拉氏轉換、級數及傅立葉級數、線性代數及矩陣、積分定理。
description.en: Introduction of the deformation, Strain and stress of structure (Beam, Column, Pressure vessel) under different loading conditions such as Tension, Compression, Shear force, Torsion and Bending moment.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。半導體元件、整流電路、電晶體和電路、運算放大器、線性積體電路、邏輯元件、數位電路、數位積體電路、微處理器、放大器等。
description.en: Semiconduction Device, Rectifier circuit, Transistor Circuit, Operational Amplifier, Linear Integrated Circuit, logic Device, Digital Circuit, Digital Integrated Circuit, Micro Processor, Amplifier, etc.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。包括工業發展概況、工廠組織、工廠計劃與佈置、製造工程、工作研究、生產管制、物料管理、品質管制、成本管制、人事管理、工業安全與衛生。
description.en: General Situation of Industrial Developments, Factory Organization, Factory Plan and Layout, Manufacture Engineering, Work Study, Product Control, Materials Control,  Quality Control, Cost Control, Personnel Management, Industrial Safety and Hygiene.

description.zh: 在二十世紀眾多分歧的思想中，有些廣受人們的認同，並信奉為價值體系而實踐，此稱為思潮。這些流行的思潮，影響人民生活，社會生計，更影響著國家的發展方向。因此，這些思潮與國家發展有極為密切的關係。思潮的內容及其與國家發展的關係就是本課程的主要內容。當代思潮中，民族主義、國家主義與世界主義的理想不同，國家之運作便不相同；民主主義、共產主義影響各國的政治制度及人民的生活方式；資本主義、社會主義與共產主義關係著國計民生，在經濟、社會及生活各層面都深受其影響。本課程中第一部分介紹最具代表性的當代思潮，第二部份就民族思潮、經濟思潮與國家發展的關係加以剖析，藉以探討我國立國的精神所在，即民族平等、政治民主，經濟發展，以實現三民主義自由、民主、均富理想。
description.en: In the 21th century, there are numerous different thoughts in which some are well recognized, treasured and put in practice. These popular thoughts influence the livelihood, the society and the direction of national development. So contemporary thoughts plays an important role in national development. Such contemporary thoughts and national development are the key contents of this course.The ideal of such thoughts as Racism, Nationalism, and Cosmopolitanism differ from each other, so they have a different effect on national policy decision. Nationalism and Communism influence the political system of the nation and the lifestyle of its citizens. Capitalism, Socialism and Communism have a main impact on the social and economical issues and affect the quality of life of a nation. The first part of this course introduces the most representative contemporary thoughts. The second part analyzes the effect of national thoughts, political thoughts and economical thoughts on a nation.

description.zh: 配電系統規劃及自動化，負載特性，配電變壓器的應用，二次輸電線及配電站設計，一次系統的設計考慮，二次系統的設計考慮，電壓降落及電力損失計算，電容器在配電系統上的應用，配電系統電壓調整，配電系統負載潮流分析，配電系統故障分析。
description.en: Course Title:Industrial power distribution Labs.Description:To familiarize students with the techniques of analyzing,designing, operating, maintaining high and low voltage powerdistribution systems.

description.zh: 簡介，感測器，基本驅動器，順序及計時控制，PLC，伺服驅動器及放大器，基本伺服控制系統。
description.en: Course Title:Mechatronics PracticeDescription:To familiarize students with the usage of mechatronictechniques and corresponding parts/components

description.zh: 數位通訊系統簡介，數位調變及偵測，數據譯碼及錯誤更正碼，同步(載波及時刻訊號的還原)，多工技術，通訊網路技術。
description.en: introduction to design communication systems, digitalmodulation and detection, data signaling and error correction codes, synchronization,multiplexing techniques,communiation networks.

description.zh: 各種時域響應之電腦繪圖，矩陣各項特性分析與應用，根值軌跡圖，波德圖，奈奎士圖，PID控制器之設計，Lead-Lag補償器之設計，控制器時域及頻域分析，控制器在狀態空間之設計，實例探討，書報研讀。
description.en: Course Title:Automatic Control PracticeDescription:This course is first to introduce the basic concepts ofcontrol systems and the mathematical background, second, state thetransfer function, block diagram and signal  flow graph, third,discuss the mathematical modeling of control systems and elements, andforth, describe the time-domain analysis, root locus techniques andfrequency-domain of control systems, and then to measure the characterof control systems, Finally, the design of control system will beintroduced.

description.zh: 1. 可程式控制器(PLC)概論2. PLC指令說明與應用3. PLC I/O介面4. A/D、D/A介面5. PLC與電腦連線6. 分散式控制系統7. 中小型PLC網路系統8. PLC選用9. PLC網路監控系統10. PLC應用實習5~7個
description.en: 1. Introduction to PLC (Programmable Logic Controller)2. PLC Instructions and Applications3. PLC I/O Interfaces4. A/D and D/A Interfaces5. PLC and PC Communications6. Distributed Control System7. PLC Network8. PLC Selection9. Monitor Control System10. Laboratory work: 5~7 experiments

description.zh: 前言、DSP 架構、指令、定址法乘法加法、量化誤差、假信號FIR 濾波器、濾波器設計
description.en: IntroductionDSP architectureInstructionsAddressing modeMAC instructionsQuantization errorAliasingFIR filtersFilter design

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。二技三年級實施普通班體育正課教學。
description.en: The teaching goal is to establishing students have a Health life、Sportsmanship、Team work and Life time exercise habit.  All Freshman students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.

description.zh: 本課程旨在加強閱讀策略指導，以培養學生獨立閱讀、及使用適當英文表達之能力。教材以介紹英語地區文化、思想、及價值觀為主，以協助學生建立世界觀，並培養其批判思考能力。教學活動以分組討論、段落寫作與短文習作。
description.en: This course aims at providing the students with various reading strategies so that they may find the optimal straategies when they read independently; and furnishing the students with competence in writing.  Reading selections will be mainly focused on discussion of the cultures, thoughts and values of the English-speaking world.  Students will be required to join class activites, which encompasses group discussion, small group discussion, paragraph writing and essay writing.

description.zh: 藉由歷代人物之表現形式，歸納出現代人可資取法之原則，以做為個人行事立身處事之參考。將歷代不同類型之人物，分成五個專題，由五位老師分別輪流至各班講授。
description.en: This course aims at providing a guide to role models for the people today from literary images in the history of Chinese Literature.   Five topics will be formed subject to their types and presented by five teachers in sequential periods.

description.zh: 通論，基本理論，傳輸線參數，傳輸線的數學模式，變壓器的數學模式及標么值系統，對稱成分，對稱三相故障，非對稱故障，負載潮流分析與控制，電力系統之經濟運轉，發電機之數學模式，電力系統穩定度，電壓控制系統，電力控制系統，系統保護。
description.en: Introduction, Basic principles, Transmission line parameters, Line model, power flow analysis, optimal dispatch of generation

description.zh: 數學基礎簡介，轉換函數，訊號流程圖，實際系統數學模式之求得，狀態方程式，線性系統之穩定度分析，控制系統之時域分析，根值軌跡圖，控制系統之頻域分析，時域及頻域下之控制器設計。
description.en: Course Title:Automatic Control PracticeDescription:This course is first to introduce the basic concepts ofcontrol systems and the mathematical background, second, state thetransfer function, block diagram and signal  flow graph, third,discuss the mathematical modeling of control systems and elements, andforth, describe the time-domain analysis, root locus techniques andfrequency-domain of control systems, and then to measure the characterof control systems, Finally, the design of control system will beintroduced.

description.zh: 最佳化組合邏輯之演算法，可規劃邏輯元件，組合邏輯之VLSI設計，使用MSI與標準電路元件設計多層邏輯，使用閘陣列設計，循序邏輯之元件，循序邏輯之分析與合成，VLSI之設計與測試技巧，各種CALD軟體工具介紹。
description.en: 1.Algorithms for Optimization of combirational logic2.VLSI realizations of combination logic3.Multilevel logic using complex parts and cells.4.Components of sequential systems5.Synthesis of clock-mode sequential circuits.

description.zh: 半導體開關在電力電子電路之作用，波形失真與諧波分析,DC-DC轉換器，AC-DC轉換器，DC-AC轉換器。
description.en: 1.power semiconductor switches. 2.waveform distortion  & harmonic analysis. 3.DC-DC converter. 4.AC-DC converter. 5.DC-AC converter.

description.zh: 本課程之教學目標在使學生瞭解信號與系統之基本概念及分析方法，以作為控制，通訊，電子電路，濾波器設計及數位信號處理等課程修習之基礎。課程內容包含：(1)標準訊號及訊號表示法 (2)連續系統的數學分析 (3)離散系統的數學分析 (4)拉氏轉換分析 (5)Z-轉換分析 (6)傅立葉分析 (7)工程應用。
description.en: course title : signals and systemsdescription : this course contains the properties of signals , systems , LTI systems , and basis linear transforms . this is a basic course in the field of control and communication .

description.zh: 矩陣及線性方程式，行列式，向量空間，基底，線性轉換，正交空間，傅立葉轉換，傅立葉積分。
description.en: Course Title:Applied Engineering MathematicsDescription:Two topics, Linear Algebra and Fourier Analysis, arecovered as an extension of "Engineering Mathematics"

description.zh: 示波器技巧，移位暫存器，計數器串接，SRAM之技巧，DOT LED驅動，LCD驅動，ADC技巧，DAC技巧，其他複雜的數位IC的實習，GAL燒錄程式練習，PALASM語法與範例，模擬器語法與範例，以GAL設計組合邏輯電路，以GAL設計循序邏輯電路。
description.en: 1.The skill of oscilloscope2.shift register3.counter cascading4.The skill of SRAM5.Driving the dot LED6.The skill of ADC7.Practice the GAL Writer8.PALASM Syntax and example9.Simulator Syntax aerial example10.Combinational circuit design11.Sequeutial circuit design

description.zh: 二極體特性，功率電晶體之飽和特性，單象限直流馬達驅動電路,四象限直流馬達驅動電路,MOSFET馬達驅動電路。
description.en: power diode characteristics, power transister in saturationdiode. single-graduant DC motor drive,four-graduant DC motor drive,MOSFET motor drive.

description.zh: 1.各程式語言之發展由來 2.語法與語意之描述 3.識別字,形態檢查及範疇 4.資料形態 5.運算式及設定敘述 6.敘述層級之控制架構7.副程式 8.抽象資料形態 9.並行及例行處理 10.各程式語言之比較
description.en: 1.evolution of the major programming languages 2.descriptionsyntax and sanmantics 3.names(identifier),type checking,andscope 4.data types 5.expressions and the assigning statement6.statement-level control structure 7.subprograms 8.abstract data types  9.concurrency and exception handling 10.comparison of the major programming languages

description.zh: 一、線性連立方程式二、矩陣基本運算三、行列式四、向量空間與基底五、線性相依與線性獨立六、線性轉換七、正交空間八、特徵值與特徵向量
description.en: As a basic mathematics in engineering,the course Linear Algebraemphasizes on the subjest of matrix computation(theory) and thetechnique of mathematical proving.The outline of the course includes the following:1.Systems of Linear Equations2.Matrices3.Determinants4.Vector Spaces5.Linear Transformations6.Eigenvalues and Eigenvectors7.Advanced Topics: selet one of the following if time permitted:  Numerical Techniques in Matrix operations,Jordan form,or     Linear Programming.

description.zh: 本課程之教學目標在使學生瞭解信號與系統之基本概念及分析方法，以作為控制，通訊，電子電路，濾波器設計及數位信號處理等課程修習之基礎。課程內容包含：(1)標準訊號及訊號表示法 (2)連續系統的數學分析 (3)離散系統的數學分析 (4)拉氏轉換分析 (5)Z-轉換分析 (6)傅立葉分析 (7)工程應用。
description.en: course title : signals and systemsdescription : this course contains the properties of signals , systems , LTI systems , and basis linear transforms . this is a basic course in the field of control and communication .

description.zh: 矩陣及線性方程式，行列式，向量空間，基底，線性轉換，正交空間，傅立葉轉換，傅立葉積分。
description.en: Course Title:Applied Engineering MathematicsDescription:Two topics, Linear Algebra and Fourier Analysis, arecovered as an extension of "Engineering Mathematics"

description.zh: 示波器技巧，移位暫存器，計數器串接，SRAM之技巧，DOT LED驅動，LCD驅動，ADC技巧，DAC技巧，其他複雜的數位IC的實習，GAL燒錄程式練習，PALASM語法與範例，模擬器語法與範例，以GAL設計組合邏輯電路，以GAL設計循序邏輯電路。
description.en: 1.The skill of oscilloscope2.shift register3.counter cascading4.The skill of SRAM5.Driving the dot LED6.The skill of ADC7.Practice the GAL Writer8.PALASM Syntax and example9.Simulator Syntax aerial example10.Combinational circuit design11.Sequeutial circuit design

description.zh: 二極體特性，功率電晶體之飽和特性，單象限直流馬達驅動電路,四象限直流馬達驅動電路,MOSFET馬達驅動電路。
description.en: power diode characteristics, power transister in saturationdiode. single-graduant DC motor drive,four-graduant DC motor drive,MOSFET motor drive.

description.zh: 1.各程式語言之發展由來 2.語法與語意之描述 3.識別字,形態檢查及範疇 4.資料形態 5.運算式及設定敘述 6.敘述層級之控制架構7.副程式 8.抽象資料形態 9.並行及例行處理 10.各程式語言之比較
description.en: 1.evolution of the major programming languages 2.descriptionsyntax and sanmantics 3.names(identifier),type checking,andscope 4.data types 5.expressions and the assigning statement6.statement-level control structure 7.subprograms 8.abstract data types  9.concurrency and exception handling 10.comparison of the major programming languages

description.zh: 一、線性連立方程式二、矩陣基本運算三、行列式四、向量空間與基底五、線性相依與線性獨立六、線性轉換七、正交空間八、特徵值與特徵向量
description.en: As a basic mathematics in engineering,the course Linear Algebraemphasizes on the subjest of matrix computation(theory) and thetechnique of mathematical proving.The outline of the course includes the following:1.Systems of Linear Equations2.Matrices3.Determinants4.Vector Spaces5.Linear Transformations6.Eigenvalues and Eigenvectors7.Advanced Topics: selet one of the following if time permitted:  Numerical Techniques in Matrix operations,Jordan form,or     Linear Programming.

description.zh: 本課程之設計係針對非歷史系學生研習之用，基本上著重以宏觀的角度作歷史趨勢的闡述。課程方面包括中、西歷史觀念的比較與中國歷代政治、經濟、社會、文化的歷史演進，藉以幫助學生認識時代之趨勢與意義。授課方式以口頭講述為主，討論及書面報告為輔，期使學生在短時間內，能對中國歷史有一簡要而清晰的了解，並對日後的生活有所裨益。
description.en: This course is designed for non-history majors. It is chiefly intended to interpret the development of the Chinese history in a comprehensive perspective so that students may have a better understanding of the historical trends and their implications and may thus benefit from such an understanding. The course includes the following topics: a comparison of Chinese and Western concepts of history, the political, economic, social, and cultural developments of the Chinese history. The class activities include lectures and discussions; students are also required to submit written reports.

description.zh: 提供本校二技學生在本行以外，對其他領域的認識，以彌補其只鑽研專業課程的限制，訓練學生整合知識，使不致在知識爆炸的時代中迷失，促進各種專材的溝通，培養共識；培育人文素養，啟發人文關懷，使具有完整的人生觀。
description.en: This course offers such a good opportunity for the two-year college students in this university that they might have an easier access to a completely different field of knowledge in the hope that students can add their individual professional knowledge and broaden their minds. The students will be furnished with integrated knowledge, discovering a better way towards professional communication, developing more common sense and never losing themselves in this information-explosive age. With a solid basis on humanity and liberal ideology, they are sure to find a more complete picture of human life.

description.zh: 配合理論基礎、單元操作單元程序與程序控制，動態模擬之設備，瞭解實際工廠運作之情形。
description.en: A laboratory course practices the theories of the unit operation, process control and dynamic simulators.

description.zh: 本課程以化工程序中所包含的製程如蒸餾、熱交換器、攪拌、泵、機械分離等，由質量、能量及動量均衡開始講述，然後探討程序設計時使用的流程圖及其符號、成本估算、管線配置、流體輸送、化工單元規格設計等。
description.en: Application of chemical engineering science techniques to design of chemical processes. Comprehensive problems are assigned which include heat, material and economic balances, unit operations and processes, kinetics and thermodynamics.The major responsibility is placed on individuals or small groups for the optimum design and selection of equipment, and for the calculations of required sizes, plant layout, and cost analyses.

description.zh: 介紹如何解決環境汙染之防治技術，依氣體、液體、固體、噪音、輻射等各種不同汙染源，分別探討解決空污、水污、土壤污染、噪音以及熱污染防治，內容包括有關環境工程之單元操作及設計，生物反應器之組合，操作及用途介紹。
description.en: This course introduces the technology of environmemtal pollution prevention. It investigates the way to control air, water, soil, noise and thermal pollutions according to various gas, liquid, solid, noise and radioactive pollution sources. The content of this course involves the unit operation and design for environmental engineering concerned equipments. It also introduce the combination of bioreactors, operation and use of these reactors for the application to environmental engineering.

description.zh: 利用基因工程，生物化學、微生物學之原理，培養變種之微生物（或改良過的微生物），動、植物細胞，以製造生物活性物質（如抗生素、免疫體、酵素、毒素、激素、特殊結構之蛋白、脂肪、醣類、脂肪酸、氨基酸、生長因子、藥理活性成份、抗體等等）
description.en: By the application of genetic engineering, biochemistry and microorganisms or animal or plant cells and how to produce living organisms.

description.zh: 單元操作專論是化工單元操作更深入之專題討論之課程,其(一)內容著重於流體之特性及其應用,高壓或真空之形成,粉粒及超微粒之作業,機械分離(包括滲膜分離),熱輸送及其應用,高溫爐與耐火材料等。
description.en: Special topics on unit operation are an advance course designed for chemical engineering unit operations. It (1) consist of characteristics of fluid and its application, high pressure and vacuum formation, power and super fine powder processing, mechanical separation process(include membrane separation), heat transfer and its application, furnaces and refraction.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。二技三年級實施普通班體育正課教學。
description.en: The teaching goal is to establishing students have a Health life、Sportsmanship、Team work and Life time exercise habit.  All Freshman students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.

description.zh: 本課程旨在加強閱讀策略指導，以培養學生獨立閱讀、及使用適當英文表達之能力。教材以介紹英語地區文化、思想、及價值觀為主，以協助學生建立世界觀，並培養其批判思考能力。教學活動以分組討論、段落寫作與短文習作。
description.en: This course aims at providing the students with various reading strategies so that they may find the optimal straategies when they read independently; and furnishing the students with competence in writing.  Reading selections will be mainly focused on discussion of the cultures, thoughts and values of the English-speaking world.  Students will be required to join class activites, which encompasses group discussion, small group discussion, paragraph writing and essay writing.

description.zh: 藉由歷代人物之表現形式，歸納出現代人可資取法之原則，以做為個人行事立身處事之參考。將歷代不同類型之人物，分成五個專題，由五位老師分別輪流至各班講授。
description.en: This course aims at providing a guide to role models for the people today from literary images in the history of Chinese Literature.   Five topics will be formed subject to their types and presented by five teachers in sequential periods.

description.zh: 本課程介紹用於解析實際工程問題所需之相關數學方法 , 其內容包含:(1)一階二階及高階常微分方程 , (2)聯立常微分方程 , (3)常微分方程之冪級數解 , (4)拉普拉斯轉換.本課程介紹用於解析實際工程問題所需之相關數學方法 , 其內容包含:(1)一階二階及高階常微分方程 , (2)聯立常微分方程 , (3)常微分方程之冪級數解 , (4)拉普拉斯轉換.
description.en: This course introduces students of engineering to those areas of mathematics which are important in connection with practical engineering problems. The material in this course is arrange accordingly in four parts: (1) Fist-order, second-order and higher order differential equations. (2) Systems of differential equations. (3) Series solutions of differential equations and special function. (4) Laplace transforms.

description.zh: 本實習課程設計,讓學生經由儀器及裝置的操作印證理論,內容包含物理化學.聚合物合成,高分子物性檢測,環工檢測技術,生化發酵技術,表面化學技!,乳化技,電化學技術以及有機物合成與分析技術等.
description.en: This laboratory course is designated to acquaint the student with the experiment methods of practical instrument and apparatus. It contains the following topics: physical chemistry, polymerization techniques, analytical methods in environmental science, biochemical methods in fermentation, surface chemistry, emulsification techniques, electrochemistry, and organic syntheses.

description.zh: 本課程介紹利用質量、能量守恆定律(熱力學第一定律)及均衡方程式(熱力學第二定律)，並在導入逸壓（Fugacity）觀念下，討論單成份系相平衡問題。最後延伸至多成份系統的熱力學性質的探討。此外還介紹化工程序中真實流體流動熱力學、機械能均衡、熱力學機械之設計與作功原理、熱機循環之熱力函數及熱機效率。
description.en: This course is designed as an introductory course in thermodynamics of chemical engineering.  Topics include the first and second law of thermodynamics, open and closed system, thermodynamics properties of materials, generalied correlations with real fluids and multicomponent systems.  Emphasis is placed on the chemical potential and its use in phase equilibria and chemical reaction equilibria.

description.zh: 此內容為化工程序的理論基礎，探討動量、熱量輸送之現象，以便應用於化工單元操作以及反應工程有關之計算與設計。
description.en: The course introduces the principles of the chemical process and discusses the momentum and heat transport phenomena. And its application to the chemical unit operation and reaction engineering

description.zh: 本課程的目標在使學生了解工業安全衛生的重要,熟悉有關知識及緊急措施,從而增加處變之因應能力.內容包括工業安全衛生組織,事故調查分析,工廠設備安全要領,工業衛生和衛生設備.
description.en: TThis course is design to introduce the student to concept of the importance of industrial safety and health with emphasis on the ability of dealing with accidents. Topics covered are organization of industrial safety , analysis of Accident ,industrial health and facilities.

description.zh: 本課程強調表面化學性質之基本原理及其應用。內容可分成三部份：（一）液體之表面張力、熱力學及有關表面電力方面之性質，潤溼、清潔、乳化及起泡。（二）固體表面化學強調固體表面之生成及鑑定，固液間之接觸角、吸附及溶液表面分子的黏著現象。（三）介紹固氣界面，氣體及蒸汽在固體表面上之吸附，化學吸附及催化。
description.en: The course describes the foundamental principles and the application of Surface Chemistry, which is concentrated in following three major fields:(1) The surface tension, thermodynamics of the liquids and their related electrical properties, wetting, cleaning, emulsification and foaforming.(2) The surface chemistry of solid state emphasizes the formation of a solid surface, its characterzation, the liquid-solid contact angle, the adsorption, and the adhesion phenomena on molecular basis.(3) The interfacial phenomena at the solid-gas interface, the adsorption of gas or vapor on the solid surface, the chemistry of adsorption and the catalysis.

description.zh: 本課程講解有關生產設備投資低，雖量少，但附加價值高之精細化學品，如各種界面活性劑，添加劑，促進劑，催化劑，助劑，香料，顏料，醫藥等。並引例介紹這些化學品製程，用途，運用原理，國內外特用化學品之現況與發展。
description.en: An introductory course focuses on chemicals which are sold at high prices in relatively limited volumes. The scope of fine chemicals includes surfactants, plastic additives, catalysts, pesticides, flavors & fragrances, dyes & pigments, bulk medicinals, etc.  Topics concerning about the manufacturing processes, application principles and recent developments of fine chemicals are also discusses in this course.

description.zh: 本課程之設計係針對非歷史系學生研習之用，基本上著重以宏觀的角度作歷史趨勢的闡述。課程方面包括中、西歷史觀念的比較與中國歷代政治、經濟、社會、文化的歷史演進，藉以幫助學生認識時代之趨勢與意義。授課方式以口頭講述為主，討論及書面報告為輔，期使學生在短時間內，能對中國歷史有一簡要而清晰的了解，並對日後的生活有所裨益。
description.en: This course is designed for non-history majors. It is chiefly intended to interpret the development of the Chinese history in a comprehensive perspective so that students may have a better understanding of the historical trends and their implications and may thus benefit from such an understanding. The course includes the following topics: a comparison of Chinese and Western concepts of history, the political, economic, social, and cultural developments of the Chinese history. The class activities include lectures and discussions; students are also required to submit written reports.

description.zh: 本課程內容包括礦產品經濟分析、礦床蘊藏量計算、採礦方法評選、炸藥之化學成份設計、剝土比及露天開採界限之計算、露天開採爆破設計、邊坡穩定設計、物料搬運機械選擇、物料搬運機械之成本分析、現場實習、捲揚系統設計、回收率之計算、排水設計、鑽進機械之選擇及成本估算、地下開採爆破設計、通風設計、開採成本及利用之計算等。
description.en: This class includes mineral economic analysis, reserve evaluation, mining method selection, break-even analysis, surface blasting design, material handling and machines, hoisting design, recovery calculation, mine power and drainage and overall mining cost analysis.

description.zh: 為配合課程使學生有實際操作的經驗以獲得完整的知識，實習課程包括：篩析法、碎礦實習、磨機實習、自由沈降實習、安氏吸管粒度測定、重液選礦、濃集實習、薄水層選礦、靜電選礦、磁選、浮選、脫水及乾燥等實習項目。
description.en: The laboratory section of the mineral processing classes are designed to have student obtain hand-on experiences of various mineral processing operations.  The lab. includes screening, crushing, grinding operation, settling, size analysis, heavy medium separation, classification, sluicing, electrostatic and magnetic separations, flotation, dewatering and drying.

description.zh: 本課程針對各種資源之特性，使學生瞭解開發各類資源之方法及各種機器之應用。其內容包括：資源探勘、資源蘊藏量評估、資源開拓、資源開採、地下開採、地面開採、大型機器之應用及特殊工程施工。
description.en: Various mining exploitation methods and mining equipmentinvolved are introduced in this class.  It includes exploration, reserve calculation, resource exploitation, and mining operations (underground and surface).

description.zh: 資源處理的主要對象為礦物，但其他有些固體與固體間或固體與液體間之分離與純化也包括在本工程之內，採用的方法：凡是各分離物間不同之物理及化學性質，皆可設法加以利用。本課程則針對其應用方法加以介紹，以期學生對資源處理有一初步及完整的認識。授課內容包括：粉粒體之簡介、篩及篩分、碎礦機之種類及應用、磨礦機之種類及應用、分級及分級機、重液選礦、浮游選礦、磁選機之種類及應用等。
description.en: Mineral processing uses various techniques to perform solid-solid and soild-liguid separation and concentration by using physical and chemical properties between different minerals.  The separation and concentration methods include particle size analysis, screening, crushing, grinding, pulverizing, classification, heavy medium separation, flotation, magnetic separation, etc.

description.zh: 材料科學為工程教育的重要科技，材料的性質與特性，為現代工程設計中佔有相當重要的地位，金屬材料的各種性質，都基於其內部構造的變化，其內部原子聚集成規則的結晶構造，亦或聚集成非結晶構造，其所形成的各種物理特性，由最基本的結晶構造開始了解。電子顯微鏡，破壞力學，超導性，電傳導，超塑性，動態回復，動態時效應變。差排理論、結晶核的形成與成長，合金相理論，晶界自由度，鑄造物的成核與均質化，硬化現象，固體擴散現象，破壞現象及理論，潛變的形成與原因等，充分了解金屬材料特性上的理論基礎與變化軌跡。
description.en: Properties and characteristics of materials play important role in modern engineering design.Each property of materials is based on its transformation at inner structure,its atoms inside converge either a regulated crystal structure or a noncrystal structure,their physical property should be understood from the most fundamental crystallinestructure, such as electronic microscope, destructive dynamics, super-conductivity,electronic conductivity, super-plasticity, dynamic recovery, dynamic aging strain, dislocation theory, the formation and growth of nucleus, alloy phase theory, degree of freedom of crystal boundary , nucleation and homogenization of casting product,hardening phenomenon, solid diffusion phenomenon, destructive phenomenon andtheory, creep formation and its reason, all of these make student fully understandthe theory basis and change record of the metallic material characteristics.

description.zh: 將熱力學定律應用於計算凝結相之化學位能與其平衡，逸壓和活性因素，溶液熱力學，多元金屬溶液，相圖和相變化，運用電腦模擬相反應和相圖，及研擬冶金數學模式。
description.en: It applies thermaldynamics to calculate the chemical potential energy of condensedphase and its balance, escape pressure, activated factors, solution thermaldynamics, complex metallic solution, phase diagram and phase change. It also utilizes computer simulated phase reaction and phase diagram, and studies the mathematic model of metallurgy.

description.zh: 塑性加工係藉塑性變形將金屬材料變化成目的形狀之金屬加工法。本課程包含：金屬塑性變形之基礎，塑性力學之基礎及各種塑性加工法之介紹，最近之塑性加工技術的進步，並涉及與塑性加工關連之成形技術及適合各種塑性加工材料之選擇。
description.en: Plastic deformation processing is a metal processing method which based on plastic deformation to transform metal material into objective shape. This course includes the foundation of metal plastic deformation, the foundation of plastic dynamics, and the introduction of all kinds of plastic deformative processing methods. The recent technology development of plastic deformation processing is related to formation technique and suitable for alternatives to all kinds of plastic deformation materials.

description.zh: 物理冶金實習是配合課堂理論，使學生在實習過程中探索有關於金屬方面之物理性，進而啟發學生對於材料方面之設計與開發之興趣。實習內容包括：管狀爐之設計與製作、熱傳導係數之測定、陶瓷粉末之真比重測定、材料之熱分析、磁性材料之磁滯曲線特性、蓋爾文及惠斯登電橋、掃描式電子顯微鏡觀察、材料之結晶構造分析等。
description.en: This course is designed for matching the theory of the subject-matter, let studentsexplore the physical property of metal during the process, and to encourage theinterest to design and develop materials. The laboratory content includes thedesign and manufacturing of tube furance, the test of heat transfer coefficient,the true specific gravity of the ceramics powder, thermal analysis of the material,the magnetic hysteresis loop of magnetic materials, Calvin-Heston electric bridge,scanning electron microscopy, the crystal structure analysis of materials.

description.zh: 本課程介紹X射線特性、繞射原理及X射線繞射在材料科學上之應用。內容包括X射線之產生，X射線之性質，X射線之繞射理論，材料之晶體結構與繞射條件。在X射線繞射方法方面則介紹Laue照相法，粉末法，繞射儀及光譜儀等。應用方面則包括晶體結構之鑑定，晶格常數之量測，相圖測定，序化一非序化轉換及化學成分分析等。
description.en: Introduction to the following topics: 1. Properties of X-Ray2. Geometry of Crystals3. Principles of X-Ray Diffraction4. Experimental Methods　(Diffractometer Measurements, Powder Photographs, and Laue Photographs)5. Applications of X-ray Diffraction on Materials Science (Orientation and Quality of Single Crystal, Determine of Crystal Structure and Precise Parameter Measurements, Chemical Analysis, Phase Transformations etc.)

description.zh: 本課程需先修習腐蝕學後，加強防蝕之訓練，重點包括防蝕材料選用，防蝕效果評估，防蝕設計，塗裝，塗膜，防蝕技術，課程將針對各種材料的物理性及化學性區分，加以分析其腐蝕損傷之種類，外在要因及內在原因而建立防蝕之工程上所使用的技術，而使學生能具備真正之防蝕能力。
description.en: 1.Electrochemical mechanisms2.Corrosion tendency and Electrode Potentials3.Polarization and Corrosion Rates4.Theories of Passivity5.Corrosion Prevention6.Eight forms of Corrosion7.High Temprature Corrosion

name.en: Optical,Electrical and Magnetic Properties of Materials

description.zh: 一、 簡介二、 電性質三、 介電性質四、 磁性質五、 光學性質
description.en: This course is a special topics of Optical，Electrical and Magnetic Properties of Materials.1.Outline2.Electrical  Properties3.Dielectric  Properties4.Magnetic  Properties5.Optical  Properties

description.zh: 寶石業為台灣新興的工業之一，集地質學、礦物學、結晶學、切割技術、商業行為及藝術美感於此門學問，寶石礦物的物理及化學性質和鑑定，寶石礦物的生成和產狀及其地理公布，如何加工，銷售行為如何進行，珠寶的設計方式及製造。寶石礦物之顏色分類，內含物之特色，光學現象之表現。人造寶石之製造與辨認，均讓學習者有能力鑑定其真偽，價值與市場行為。
description.en: Introduction the physics and chemistry properties of gemstones.

description.zh: 其內容包括水資源形成、賦存、分佈與時間變化之規律；水資源勘察、                                         調查、試驗、監測、參數之估算、評估水質與水量變化和條件；水資源                                         合理之規劃、開發利用、供水及節流計劃估算；水資源補給、人工降雨                                         與地下水補給、水源涵養、地表水庫調蓄、地下水庫調蓄之水資源養                                         蓄；水資源保護與保育、污染防治、水土保持；水資源管理與規劃，利                                         用社會經濟、行政法規、技術等措施。
description.en: ntroduction to Water Resources .

description.zh: 本課程將介紹在固液分離技術應用中,固體於液體間之行為,其中相關之基本理論包括:流體力學、界面現象、膠體行為、以及界面力的問題。至於相關設備介紹方面,將著重於資源回收單元設備之說明,例如:過濾、離心、浮除、沉降、混凝等。
description.en: In the basic theory introduction, theories related to solid and liquid interactions will be introduced, fluid mechanics, liquid and solid interfacial phenomena, colloidal behavior and interfacial forces. In terms of separation instruments, the operation principles of filters, centrifuge, flotation, settling, coagulation, etc. will be described.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。二技三年級實施普通班體育正課教學。
description.en: The teaching goal is to establishing students have a Health life、Sportsmanship、Team work and Life time exercise habit.  All Freshman students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.

description.zh: 本課程旨在加強閱讀策略指導，以培養學生獨立閱讀、及使用適當英文表達之能力。教材以介紹英語地區文化、思想、及價值觀為主，以協助學生建立世界觀，並培養其批判思考能力。教學活動以分組討論、段落寫作與短文習作。
description.en: This course aims at providing the students with various reading strategies so that they may find the optimal straategies when they read independently; and furnishing the students with competence in writing.  Reading selections will be mainly focused on discussion of the cultures, thoughts and values of the English-speaking world.  Students will be required to join class activites, which encompasses group discussion, small group discussion, paragraph writing and essay writing.

description.zh: 本課程討論，化學中相關物理量的基本理論，技巧及應用等，特別是化學熱力學及電化學等。有關氣相，氣体定理，熱量，功，熱力學第一、第二及第三定律，焓，熵，自由能，相平衡，溶液，化學平衡，酸鹼，電化學，電極，電池，半反應等基礎理論之探討。
description.en: This course discuss the fundamental theory, technique and application with regards tophysical property in chemistry, especially at the chemical thermal dynamics and electrical chemistry. The research of the fundamental theory about gaseous phase,the gas laws, heat, work, the first, second and third law of the thermodynatmics, entropy, enthalpy, free energy, phase equilbrium, solution, chemicalequilbrium, acid and alkali, electrical chemistry, electrode,electric cell,half reaction ,etc.

description.zh: 本課程主要目標在介紹與實際問題相關之數學領域，以模擬解題及詮釋等方式，將數學方法應用在工程問題上。課程內容有常微分方程，線性代數，向量微積分，Fourier 分析及偏微分方程式等章節，訓練同學在理論，計算及實驗間建立正確的認知及意義。內容將繼續介紹複數分析及數值方法等章節，尤其對計算機的概念及演算法乃給予較多的強調，對實際問題亦有簡化討論。另外，在應用解決問題構想，練習例題及理論間，更有相輔相成的效果。至於線性規化，圖形組合，機率理論及數學機率等內容亦有概略介紹，務使同學有正確的認知。
description.en: The course*s main taget is to introduce math region which is relating to practicalquestions with simulate solution and interpretation, it applies the math method to engineering questions. The course content includes ordinary differential equation,  linear algebra, vector calculus, Fourier analysis and partial differencial equation partial differential equation, with the aim to train students in establishing an exactperception to the meaning of theory, calculation and experimentation. it also introduces complex number analysis and numeric method, especially put moreemphasis at the computer concept and algorithm, a simplified discussion to thepractical problem as well. Besides, it has a mutual supporting effect in solvingquestion concepts, practising model question and theory. As to the linear programming, graphs and combinatorial optimization, probability theory and mathmetical probability, this course also has a brief introduction, its target is to let all the students

description.zh: 本課程討論結晶質固體之基本概念，含晶體之幾何學及數學理論，並進一步討論結晶化學及結晶構造之原理，同時輔以電子顯微鏡法及X-射線法作結晶構造分析。
description.en: This course is to introduce Elements of Crystallography.

description.zh: 講述材料試驗的目的，各種材料試驗設備的構造及操作使用方法，內容涵蓋抗拉、彎曲、壓縮、衝擊及各種不同之硬度試驗機等，使學生能充分熟悉使用操作，以達熟練之程度。並配合其他課程，判斷分析材料特性。
description.en: It focuses on the purpose of material testing, the structure of material testing equipment, and the operation method, its content covers tensile, bending, compression, impact and various hardness tester equipment, let student fully aware of operation method, to the extent of skillfulness, and it matches other curriculums to judge the specifics of the analytic materials.

name.en: Analytical Chemistry and Lab. for Materials

description.zh: 配合分析化學講述，實際操作訓練，加強材料及礦物分析之基礎。內容包括：一般定量分析概念，誤差及分析數據的處理，氧化還原，重量分析，電位滴定，中和滴定，紫外光／可見光吸收分析，極譜分析，金屬，礦物樣品成份分析與鑑定。
description.en: To match the lecture of analytic chemistry, practical operation training and strenthening foundation of material and mineral analysis. Its content include general quantitative analysis concept, the treatment of error and analytic data, oxidization-reduction, weight analysis, potentiometric titration, neutralization titration, UV/visible light absorption analysis, spectrography, metal, mineral sample component analysis and test.

description.zh: 「雷射」的發展史雖然很短，但由於它具有高輸出功率、高方向性及易控制等優異的特點，再加上產品的附加價值極高，雷射在材料加工方面的應用逐漸普通。此課程的教授是先複習光的基本物理現象，再介紹雷射的原理及特性，雷射與材料發生作用時所產生的現象，以及各類加工（如雷射切割、硬面處理等）的原理與應用。
description.en: Introduction to Laser Marerials Processing and Its application

description.zh: 材料之結晶構造及一般性質簡介，由簡單之單成份系，二成份系，到三成份系之平衡狀態圖，解釋各平衡狀態圖之相變態過程，並以顯微組織圖作輔助說明，由簡而繁，循序漸進，使同學容易領悟。
description.en: This course is to introduce Phase Diagrams and Microstructure.

description.zh: 金屬材料概念已有充分了解後，利用此基礎知識探討，近年來頗受工業界注目的新材料，課程內容有：1.超高強度鋼之種類及特性、用途。2.析出硬化型不銹鋼之種類、特性、用途，熱處理方法。3.超耐熱材料，合金之種類、特性、用途。4.形狀記憶合金之種類、特性、用途。5.超塑性合金之種類、特性、用途。6.特殊模具鋼之種類特性、用途及其熱處理。7.鈦及鈦合金之種類、特性、用途及其處理。
description.en: After receiving full understanding to the metal materials, using such basic knowledgeto explore new materials which catch wide attention in recent years, its contentcovers the following items:1.The specification, usage and property of super highstrength steel. 2. The specification, usage and property of precipitation hardeningstainless steel, and its heat treatment method. 3. The specification, usage and propertyof super heat resistant material and alloy. 4.The specification, usage and property ofshape-memory alloy. 5.The specification, usage and property of super plasticity alloy,6.The specification, usage and property of special mould steel and its heat treatment.7.The specification, usage and property of titanium and titanium alloy, and theirtreatment.

description.zh: 粉末冶金是工業先進國家積極發展的重點科技之一，其內容涵蓋粉末製造、粉末成形固結以及燒結體的後處理等範圍，本課程即安排包括粉末製造、粉末特性與其測定、粉末混合與造粒、成形、燒結理論與實務、燒結體性質與其測定、燒結體的後處理等基礎項目。另外，再講述利用粉末冶金技術製造的材料與產品的實務應用項目等，以期讓學生能對粉末冶金技術能有基本上的認識。
description.en: Powder metallurgy is one of the most important highlighted high-tech in the developed countries, its content includes powder making,powder formation and condensing,and the final treatment of sintered body,etc.Thus, this course includes the fundamental items such as powder manufacturing, powder characteristics and its test, powder mixing and granulation, formation, sintering theory and practice, the property of sintering body and its test, the post-treatment of sintering body. Besides, it also lectures practice method like using powder metallurgy to manufacture material and product, in order to let students have basic knowledge about powder metallurgy.

description.zh: 如何將材料創造出強度更高，延伸率，斷面收縮率，衝整值等耐強度更大之材料，除了調整合金元素外，如何應用熱處理之手段使材料達到所求之特性。對於各種熱處理之原理、解析及實際的應用作詳盡的介紹。隨著科技之發達，機械工業之進步、構造物之增大及精密化、迷你化之趨勢，金屬材料所要求之性質需要更進一步之強化，為滿足此一要求，除調整合金元素之外，必須賴適當的熱處理，才能發揮材料本身含有合金元素之功能，亦可滿足吾人所需之各種用途，本課程為使學生瞭解這些處理方法，由理論上說明熱處理與變態理論，及熱處理對強化機構上之理論根據，及熱處理之方法等，本熱處理課程內容有：1.金屬熱處理之基礎，各種組織與變態，平衡圖在熱處理上之應用，連續冷卻，恆溫冷卻，在熱處理之應用、鋼之淬火變態舉動，合金元素在材料上之影響，結晶粒之大小性質對熱處理之影響，鋼之硬化能之應用及計算方法。2.熱處理技術、鋼之加熱及各種熱處理方法。3.鋼之光輝熱處理，保護爐氣之種類及其管理方法。4.鋼之表面硬化熱處理。5.淬火零件之設計及材料之選擇。6.工具模具鋼、不銹鋼、鑄鐵、銅及鋁合金之熱處理。7.熱處理發生不良原因及其防止方法。
description.en: How to create a higher strength, elongation, percentage of area reduction, impactvalue material, except for adjusting alloy elements, it also utilizes heat treatmentmethod to achieve the property. Pinpoint to the theory ,analysis,practical applicaton of all kinds of heat treatment,,it would be detailly introduced by this course.

description.zh: 主要介紹陶瓷之製程及所應用的範圍.
description.en: Introduction to The processes of ceramics materials and their application

description.zh: 超硬材料是一種越來越普及的新興材料。超硬材料可以作成精密加工工具及多種高價值產品。是提升一國競爭力不可或缺的尖端材料。超硬材料包括鑽石及立方氮化硼。本課程將介紹世界各國最先進製造超硬材料方法，包括超高壓技術及鑽石膜技術。而目前日新月異之超硬材料之發展及應用，亦作進一步介紹。
description.en: This course is to introduce the Hard materials.

description.zh: 本課程主要針對各種材料（金屬、陶瓷、高分子、複合材料）之基本原理，性質及應用，做概要性的介紹。內容包括材料之晶體結構與晶體缺陷，固體材料之原子擴散，相圖與相變化，材料製程及應用，材料之物理性質（光性質、電性質、磁性質及熱性質）.
description.en: 1.The structure of crystalline solids.2.Imperfections in solids.3.Phase transformation and phase equilibrium.4.Strengthening mechanism of materials.5.Metal alloys6.Ceramics7.Polymers

description.zh: 針對地理資訊系統 之概念與技術基礎作一基本瞭解。學習範圍包括城市資訊系統、天然資源及環境管理系統、緊急救援系統等。並學習地理資訊系統 軟體操作與技巧之訓練。
description.en: Conceptual & technical foundations of geographical information systems. Applications covered include: urban information systems, natural resources & environmental management systems & emergency response systems. Laboratory sessions focus on acquiring basic skills in using GIS software with real world data.

description.zh: 本課程之設計係針對非歷史系學生研習之用，基本上著重以宏觀的角度作歷史趨勢的闡述。課程方面包括中、西歷史觀念的比較與中國歷代政治、經濟、社會、文化的歷史演進，藉以幫助學生認識時代之趨勢與意義。授課方式以口頭講述為主，討論及書面報告為輔，期使學生在短時間內，能對中國歷史有一簡要而清晰的了解，並對日後的生活有所裨益。
description.en: This course is designed for non-history majors. It is chiefly intended to interpret the development of the Chinese history in a comprehensive perspective so that students may have a better understanding of the historical trends and their implications and may thus benefit from such an understanding. The course includes the following topics: a comparison of Chinese and Western concepts of history, the political, economic, social, and cultural developments of the Chinese history. The class activities include lectures and discussions; students are also required to submit written reports.

description.zh: 土木營造工程範圍廣泛，各種法營造工法更是不計其數，本課程教授學生幾種常見之施工法：一、土方工程：1.土壤調查2.挖方3.填方4.搬運5.軟弱地盤之處理6.土方作業計劃7.作業能力估算。二、混凝土工程：1.混凝土材料及其性質2.配比設計3.混凝土之攪料、灌置與搗實4.混凝土之養護與品質控制。三、基礎工程：1.基礎之種類2.淺基礎3.樁基礎4.沈箱5.深開挖及擋土工程6.圍堰7.灌漿。四、專項工程：1.河川工程2.海岸工程3.堰埧工程4.發電工程5.隊道工程6.橋梁工程7.港灣工程8.道路工程9.衛生下水道工程10. 鐵路工程11. 地下構造物工程12. 建築工程13. 機場工程。
description.en: public work,improving the land and the enviorment,and preventing the harricoms.Construction Methods includes elementary and applied methods.The purposes of this course are for students understanding the steps of various construction methods.

description.zh: 課程內容包含：(1)緒論、(2)運輸系統規劃、(3)公路工程概述、(4)交通工程概述、(5)鐵路工程概述、(6)航空工程概述、(7)港灣工程概述。
description.en: Integrated transportation systems from the standpoint of assembly,haul,and distribution means.Analysis of transportequipment and traveled way.Power requirements,speed, stopping,capacity,economics,route location.Future technological developments and innovations.

description.zh: 本課程主要教授學生：(1)橋梁之功能及組織、(2)橋梁之種類、(3)橋梁之上部結構、(4)橋梁之下部結構：(a)基礎(b)橋台(c)橋墩、(5)橋梁之伸縮設施、(6)橋面排水設施、(7)欄杆及照明設施、(8)跨海大橋、陸橋、高架橋及跨河大橋等簡介。
description.en: Planning,desing,constroution and maintenance of the various bridges.

description.zh: 基礎為結構物與建築物之下部結構，其安全與整個結構物、建築物之安全息息相關，故基礎設計必須特別慎重。本課程宜包括下列各項：(1)基礎之種類及其選擇、(2)基礎之承載力計算、(3)基礎之沈陷分析、(4)各種基腳及筏基之設計、(5)深基(樁基、墩基、沈箱基礎)之設計。
description.en: Subsurface investigations and synthesis of soil parameters for geotechnical design and analysis,concepts of shallow and deep foundation design,geotechnical design of conventional retaining walls,computerized analysis and design of soil/foundation interaction;case histories.

description.zh: 本程主要教授學生熟悉 (1)結構設計各部驟之計算方式及其電腦程式之使用方法 (2)教導學生自行準備輸入資料，並操作以求取結果 (3)根據學生之電腦輸出結果或操作中之偵錯方法及結果正誤之研判方法。
介紹工程契約之內容與種類，以及其實際的作業程序及相關的投標規定；此外並說明規範的製定內涵與意義，同時探討其對工程之影響與重要性。

name.zh: 工程監測與非破壞性檢測

description.zh: 本課內容將從最基本的量測觀念,理論,推導主工程實務的應用.例如:應力與應變的關係,應變計的種類(Foil type以及半導體),應變計的電路及按裝,溫度及非線性效應,LVDT量測原理,荷主儀的製作原理,非破壞性檢測的種類及原理,超音波檢測原理及實例.
description.en: This course will introduce the basic concept and theory of measurement,and engineering application.such as:stress-strain relation. types of strain gange(foil and semicondust),basic circuits.effects of temperature and nonlinearity,theory and applocation of LVDT and load cell.theory of nondestructive testing and its application.

description.zh: 熟悉軌道工程各部位功能及特性(鋼軌、軌道扣件系統、軌道承托系統)、軌道靜力學分析、軌道動力學分析及完成軌道工程設計案例
description.en: Familiar with every position function and characteristic of track project (the rail , track fastener system , track bear the system of asking) , track statics analysis , track dynamics are analysed and finish the engineering design case of the track

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。二技三年級實施普通班體育正課教學。
description.en: The teaching goal is to establishing students have a Health life、Sportsmanship、Team work and Life time exercise habit.  All Freshman students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.

description.zh: 本課程旨在加強閱讀策略指導，以培養學生獨立閱讀、及使用適當英文表達之能力。教材以介紹英語地區文化、思想、及價值觀為主，以協助學生建立世界觀，並培養其批判思考能力。教學活動以分組討論、段落寫作與短文習作。
description.en: This course aims at providing the students with various reading strategies so that they may find the optimal straategies when they read independently; and furnishing the students with competence in writing.  Reading selections will be mainly focused on discussion of the cultures, thoughts and values of the English-speaking world.  Students will be required to join class activites, which encompasses group discussion, small group discussion, paragraph writing and essay writing.

description.zh: 藉由歷代人物之表現形式，歸納出現代人可資取法之原則，以做為個人行事立身處事之參考。將歷代不同類型之人物，分成五個專題，由五位老師分別輪流至各班講授。
description.en: This course aims at providing a guide to role models for the people today from literary images in the history of Chinese Literature.   Five topics will be formed subject to their types and presented by five teachers in sequential periods.

description.zh: 目的在使學生瞭解電腦基本知識及程式撰寫方法，以應用於土木工程問題之處理與解決。授課內容包括：電子計算機概論、資料型態、程式語言、輸出入陳述與格式、迴圈及副程式、檔案開啟，及其他應用套裝軟體之介紹。
description.en: Specifications of language syntax and semantics by grammars and automata and by attribute grammars,denotational semantics,and action equations;algebraic,denotational,and operational semantics,application of formal specifications to construction of software tools.

description.zh: 1.線性聯立微分方程2.向量分析3.富利葉級數及富利葉積分4.偏微分方程及邊界值問題
description.en: This course deals with the following subjects:Ⅰ.Ordinary Differential Equations   Ⅱ.Laplace TnangformsⅢ.Vector AnalysisⅣ.Matrices and DeterminantsⅤ.Fourier SeriesⅥ.Partial Differential Equatians

description.zh: 本課程講授以實用為主，以避艱深理論，乃以機械與電機設備之基本原理、種類、特性及功用、使用及維護方法、注意事項扼要精節，促使學習土木工程的學生獲得最佳之概念。
配合測量學之講授，作相互之印證，以期融會貫通，落實提昇測量教學之效果。課程概要：(1)各項儀器之使用實習、(2)距離、高程、角度測量實習、(3)控制測量實習、(4) 地形測量實習、(5) 定線實習。
description.en: Theory and practice of surveying measurements and calculations for engineering works; coordinate geometry and computer-aided design applications for civil engineering facilities.

description.zh: 本課程以計算力學之理論為經，結構分析之方法為緯，教導修習學生將結構學之基本觀念徹底融通。其內容主要在說明變分原理，應用於結構分析之原理及方法，並介紹計算力學與古典力學應用於結構分析之差別及優點，使學生能對結構力學有更深刻的瞭解。
description.en: Fundamental theory of statically indeterminate structures; analysis of indeterminate beams, frames, and trusses by stiffness and flexibility methods; study of influence lines for beams, frames, and trusses.

description.zh: 使同學進一步獲得土壤力學之重要觀念與理論，授課內容含粘土礦物、滲透與滲流、土壤內之應力分析、壓密理論與沈陷分析、剪力強度應力軌跡與土壤之側向土壓力、邊坡穩定分析。
description.en: Intermediate soil mechanics is an advanced knowledge following soil mechanics, and is designed to apply soil mechanics to underground excavation such as shield tunneling as well as pipe jacking. This lecture will try to help students to use the theory in soil mechanics applying into how to select tunneling optimum method and type of vertical shaft. In addition, how to manage the chamber pressure and spoil return. Field trips will be arranged to provide students more opportunities to apply what they learn in the class to be verified in the construction site.

description.zh: 模型理論,管流理論,渠流理論,渠變理論,數值理論.
description.en: Introduction,Model similitude,Pipe flow,Open channel  flow,Gradually varied flow(Backwatercomputation...),Computation fluid mechanics(ex:FDM,FEM,...)

description.zh: 1.受彎構材反撓度 2.托架,剪力摩擦筋之設計 3.細長柱之設計 4.各種基礎之設計 5.雙向版之設計 6.規範之應用與解說。
description.en: Properties and behavior of steel reinforcement and concrete.Analysis and design of members subject to bending,shear,Torsion and Axial loads.Design of beams,Slabs,Columns and Footings.

description.zh: 在本課程中,我們將邀請產,官,學,研界人士,對電子,電機,電腦,通訊等相關議題,作深入而精闢之演講
description.en: In this course,we will intive outstanding professional persons to address lectures on various technical fields covering electronics,electicity,computer ,communication etc.

description.zh: １.數值解之介紹：精確度與誤差觀念２.插值及多項式３.數值積分與微４.數值線性代數５.非線性方程式之解６.曲線配合與函數近似７.近似解理論８.常微分方程式的數值解法９.偏微分方程式的數值解法
description.en: 1.Preliminary of Numerical Solutions2.Interpolations and Polynomials3.Numerical Differentiation and Integratin 4.Numerical Linear Algebra5.Numerical solution fo Nonlinear Systems6.Curve Fitting and cubic spline Interpolation 7.Approximation Theory8.Numerical Solution of Ordinary Differential Equations9.Numerical Solution of Partial Differential Equations

description.zh: (A) 部分：1.基本CMOS邏輯閘設計，2.CMOS基本邏輯閘時序模擬，3.CMOS基本邏輯閘佈局，4.數位電路功能分析與模擬，5.階層式的電路組成，6.中小型電路設計，7.VHDL系統，(B) 部分：1.認識Cadence系統， 2.圖形編輯設備的操作練習，3.零件庫介紹，4.設計電路之輸入編輯，5.電路模擬實習，6.數位電路的晶片設計，7.晶片製造專題。
description.en: (A)1.Basic CMOS logic design2.CMOS logic gate simulation 3.CMOS logic gate placement4.Analysis and simulation of digital circuit 5.Hierachy circuit6.VHDL system(B)1.Introduction to c cadence system2.Graphic editor practice3.module4.Input editor 5.Circuit simulation practice6.Special projects

description.zh: 1.轉移函數，方塊圖，信號流程圖2.物理系統之數學模式3.線性控制系統之穩定度4.控制系統之時域分析5.根軌跡法6.頻域分析7.控制系統設計
description.en: 1.Transfer Function,Block Diagrams,Signal-Flow Graphs2.Mathematical Modeling of phsical systems3.Stability of Linear Control Systems4.Time-Domain Analysis of Control Systems5.Root-Locus Technique6.Frequency-Domain Analysis7.Design of control systems

description.zh: 本課程可視為電磁學之延續，介紹電磁波在各種媒質及結構中的傳播特性，以及這些現象在通訊科技之應用，討論主題如下：1.馬克斯威爾方程式之複習，2.電磁場與材料之互作用，3.電磁波於線性／非線性、全向性／異向性與均勻／不均勻材料中之傳播，4.導波管與共振腔，5.微波電路。
description.en: 1.Maxwell equations2.Magnetic fields and materials3.EM wave propagation in linear/nonlinear materials4.EM wave propagation in homogeneous/hetrogeneous materials5.Em wave propagation in isotropic/anisotropic materials6.Waveguides and resonators7.Microwave circuits

description.zh: 論述電磁干擾之物理模式與耦合機制。探討各種抗干擾之電磁相容設計實務，其中包括：接地、濾波、瞬態抑制與保護電路、屏蔽、信號互連、積體電路應用防止雜訊措施、印刷電路板抗干擾佈局設計、靜電放電保護等。介紹電磁干擾標準與量測方法。
description.en: Discuss the physical model of electromagnetic interference (EMI) and coupling mechanism. Deal with a variety of design methods for electromagnetic compatibility (EMC) which includes : Grounding, Filtering, Transient suppression and protection, Shielding, Signal interconnection, Prevents noise in IC applications, PCB layout design rules against interference, Electrostatic discharge (ESD) protection, etc. Introduce the EMI standards and measurement techniques.

description.zh: 本實習之主要目標為訓練學生實際電路設計之經驗及使用電腦軟體（SPICE） 為設計之輔導工具。實習內容如下：低頻電路原理及參數測量、電晶體電路之頻率響應及參數測量、從電路規格計算及設計電路、回授之影響及補償原理、設計類比乘法器、應用 OP 放大器與乘法器設計線性及非線性電路、鎖相迴路之原理。
description.en: The course is to train students to use SPICE tool for designing electronic circuits.Contents cover:1.Low-frequency circuit design and its parameter measurement 2.Frequency response of transistor circuit and its parameter   meadurement3.Design of feedback amplifier circuit4.Applications of OP amplifier circuit5.Linear and nonlinear circuit design 6.Phase lock loop design

description.zh: 使學生熟悉，應用程式設計之環境、方法、及原則，內容含：（１）作業系統與應用程式之關係（２）視窗環境（３）網路環境（４）整合設計學生將窗撰寫完整之應用程式
description.en: To familiarize the student with the environments,methodologies,and principles of application softwaredesign.Topics include :1.Run-time environments2.Window environments3.Networking environments4.Integrated designThe student will write application programs with actual function.

description.zh: 本課程將結合理論說明與示範實習，使同學對雷射基本原理及光電科技應用有一完整的認識，內容包括：1.光電工程概論，2.基礎光學，3.電射發光原理，4.雷射光的調製，5.光電科技應用概論。
description.en: The course covers bath lectures and lab exercise1.Introduction 2.Fundamentals of optics3.Laser principles4.Electrooptic modulation of laser beams5.Applications of electrooptic techniques

description.zh: 1.資料表示法：定點系統(Fixed Point System)，浮點系統(Floating Point System)，2.運算工作：定點之加減乘除，快速之運算，浮點運算，3.指令與控制：各種指令介紹，中斷，硬體控制單元設計(Hardwired Control)，微程式控制單元設計(Microprogramming)，4.記憶系統：記憶體之層次(Memory Hierarchy)，虛擬記憶系統(Virtualmemory)，快速記憶(Cache Memory)。
description.en: 1.Data representation 2.Logic operations3.Command and control4.Memory organization5.Processor organization

description.zh: １.組合分析２.機率理論３.隨機變數４.隨機變數函數５.機率分佈６.期望值性質７.樣本分佈８.假設檢定９.線性迴歸分析１０.變異數分析
description.en: 1.Combinatonal Analysis2.Pribability Theory3.Random Variables4.Functions of Random variables5.Probability Distribution 6.Properties of Expectation  7.Sampling Distribution 8.Tests of Hypotheses9.Linear Regression Analysis10.Analysis of Variance

description.zh: 線性代數為工程類學科之基礎數學之一,著重於訓練學生矩陣運算及基本數學証明.課程大綱如下：1.解聯立方程式2.矩陣運算3.行列式4.向量空間5.線性轉換6.特徵值及特徵向量7.選擇性題材,視時間充許教授下列之一：矩陣數值方法, Jordan form ,或線性規劃
description.en: As a basic mathematics in engineering,the course Linear Algebraemphasizes on the subjest of matrix computation(theory) and thetechnique of mathematical proving.The outline of the course includes the following:1.Systems of Linear Equations2.Matrices3.Determinants4.Vector Spaces5.Linear Transformations6.Eigenvalues and Eigenvectors7.Advanced Topics: selet one of the following if time permitted:  Numerical Techniques in Matrix operations,Jordan form,or     Linear Programming.

description.zh: 本科目介紹各種軟體系統之設計及實作觀念。主要之課程包括有：1.系統軟體概念與電腦結構2.組譯器基本概念3.組譯器之設計與實作4.載入器與連結器之基本概念5.載入器與連結器之設計與實作6.巨集處理器之基本概念7.巨集處理器之設計與實作8.編譯器之基本功能9.編譯器之設計理與實作10.其他系統軟體之介紹。
description.en: This course is an introduction to the design and implementation of various types of system software.The major topics covered in this course are :1.System software and Machine structure2.The concept of Assemblers3.The implementation of Two-pass Assembler4.The concept of Loaders and Linkers   5.The implementation of Loaders and Linkers 6.The concept of Macro Processor7.The implementation of Macro Processor8.The concept of compiler9.The concept of Operating System10.Other System Software

description.zh: 1. 簡介；2. 組合邏輯系統設計；3. 標準組合邏輯模組；4. 算術組合模組與網路；5. 順序邏輯系統設計；6. 標準順序邏輯模組；7. RTL系統；8. 資料及控制子系統；9. 微處理器設計。10.數位系統設計之原則與方法；11. ASM (Algorithm StateMachine) Chart 之應用與序向邏輯方法：傳統式合成法、多工器控制法、One-Hot 法、ROM-Based 法；12. ASIC所需之基本 SSI/MSI 元件；13.使用 SSI/MSI 基本元件解決邏輯問題；14.採用數位系統設計之原理與方法，利用 ASIC之基本元件，再配合基本閘設計 ALU、CPU 控制器、中斷控制器、DMA 控制器等 IC 元件；15.Bit-Slice 計算機設計；16.微程式設計；17.Hardwired CPU 設計。
description.en: 1. Introduction; 2. Design of combinational systems; 3. Standard combinational modules; 4. Arithmetic combinational modules and networks5. Design of sequential network; 6. Standard sequential network; 7. Register transfer level (RTL) systems; 8. Data and control subsystems; 9. Design of a microcomputer; 7.Principles of digital system design; 8.ASM chart 9.SSI/MSI component 10.Application of ASIC component 11.Bit-Slice machine 12.Hardwared CPU design.

description.zh: 1.電場強度電通密度、磁場強度、磁通密度電荷與電流之介紹;2.材料之導電特性，介電特性與導磁特性之介紹;3.向量數學分析之複習;4.馬克斯威爾方程式與羅倫磁力;5.靜電場之介紹;6.靜電問題之解決;7.靜磁場之介紹;8.靜磁問題之解決。
description.en: To make the students understand the basic concepts and applications of Electromafneties which includes :1.Electromafnetic Model.2.The Vector Analysis.3.Static Electric Fields.4.Electrostatic Problems`Solutions.5.Steady Eletric Currents.6. Steat Mafnetic Fields.7.Time Varying Fields and Maxwells`Equations.8.Plane Electromapnetic Waves.9.Theory and Applications of Transmission Lines.10.Wavef uide and Carity Resonators.11.Antenna and Radiation Theory.

description.zh: 本課程探討現代通訊的基本原理，內容重點放在類比通訊的調變技巧與雜訊分析．課程大綱包括：1.簡介2.信號與系統3.機率、隨機程序與雜訊4.振幅調變：雙旁波帶、調幅、單旁波帶與殘旁波帶5.角度調變：頻率調變與相位調變6.脈波調變：脈幅調變、脈寬調變、脈位調變、脈碼調變與步差調變7.數位通訊簡介對於數位通訊有進一步興趣的同學可繼續選修『數位通訊系統』課程
description.en: Fundamental principles of modern communication will be investigated in depth in this course, with emphasis on analog communications.Basic modulation techniques will be introduced with nosie analysis.Contents include1.Introduction 2.Signals and Systems3.Probability ,Random Process,and Nosie4.Amplitude Modulations:DSB,AM,SSB,and VSB5.Angle Modulations:FMand PM6.Pulse Modulations:PAM,PWM,PPM,PCM,and DM7.Intorduction to Digital Communication Students who want to know more details sbout digital commmunication are encouraged to take the course Digital Communication Systems

description.zh: 1. 程式語言類別介紹 2.物件導向與資料抽象化3.類別與方法 4.訊息﹐實例與初始化 5.繼承 6.靜態與動態繫結 7.多型性 8.發展環境及工具 9. C++ Java Smalltalk 簡介10.應用程式實例介紹
description.en: 1.Programming Language Paradigms  2.Object-Orientation and Data Abstraction  3.Classes and Methods 4.Messages, Instances, and Initialization 5.Inheritance  6.Static and Dynamic Binding7.Polymorphism  8.Environment and Tools  9.Introduction to C++, Java, and Smalltalk 10.Case Study

description.zh: 本課程之設計係針對非歷史系學生研習之用，基本上著重以宏觀的角度作歷史趨勢的闡述。課程方面包括中、西歷史觀念的比較與中國歷代政治、經濟、社會、文化的歷史演進，藉以幫助學生認識時代之趨勢與意義。授課方式以口頭講述為主，討論及書面報告為輔，期使學生在短時間內，能對中國歷史有一簡要而清晰的了解，並對日後的生活有所裨益。
description.en: This course is designed for non-history majors. It is chiefly intended to interpret the development of the Chinese history in a comprehensive perspective so that students may have a better understanding of the historical trends and their implications and may thus benefit from such an understanding. The course includes the following topics: a comparison of Chinese and Western concepts of history, the political, economic, social, and cultural developments of the Chinese history. The class activities include lectures and discussions; students are also required to submit written reports.

description.zh: 本課程在二技為2學分。人因工程旨在研究調查人類的能力、限制、行為和其他特性等知識，而應用於工具、設備、系統、任務、工作和環境等的設計，以提高人類生活品質及生產力。所探討的內容可歸納如下：人因工程的研究方法、人體設計、人員的感覺歷程、人員的資訊處理、人員的體力活動、人機介面設計、作業環境、安全與衛生等。
description.en: Human factors is dedicated to discover and survey human beings' capability, limit, behavior and other futures.  And then apply it to the design of tools, facilities, systems, works and environments in order to enhance the quality of life and productivity.  The course includes research approaches, physical design, human being's feeling process and information process, human/machine interface, operating environments, and safety.

description.zh: 本課程旨在探討各種類型之神經網路，如逆傳遞網路、機率神經網路、學習向量量化網路、反傳遞網路、自述應共振理論、霍普菲爾網路、雙向聯想記憶網路、自組織映射圖網路等，此外相關文獻及運用之領域將深入討論。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to study the several ANN paradigm，such as Bachpropogation，prohability ANN，learning vector quantization，Counter-propagation，self-organizing map，Hopqueld network，BAM etc. Besides，the relative literature and applications will also cover .

name.zh: 電腦輔助設計與製造(二)

description.zh: 介紹電腦控制之基本原理以及在製造系統應用，探討CNC製造系統之主要架搆，學習CNC製造系統之設計、規劃與整合方法。
description.en: Learn the computer control of machines and processes in manufacturing systems. Concepts of feedback control theory as applied to NC. CNC, and DNC systems, physical elements of NC equipment for metal cutting and other processes, control hardware, NC programming languages, and software aspects. Process planning and adaptive control concepts as they relate to NC manufacturing. Integrated computerized systems and emerging trends.

description.zh: 就生產與服務系統做模擬分析，以輔助系統設計、改善、管理之決策。
description.en: Use simulation modeling for the resolution of complex system design, system improvement and management decision.

description.zh: 本課程在使學生瞭解生產的物品或提供的服務能適時適地，並以最少的成本送到顧客手中。本課程之內容如下：  1.物流管理和策略  2.運輸和配送  3.保管與包裝  4.定單處理  5.採        購  6.物料搬運  7.物流成本  8.物流服務  9.資訊系統10.物流生產力衡量
description.en: The aim of the course is to help the students understand how to perform logistics activities so as to make products and services available to customers at the time place,and in the condition and from desired in the most profitable or cost-effective way.The content of the course discription:  1.Transpor totion  2.Inventory maintenance  3.Order processing   4.Purchasing   5.Warehousing & packaging  6.Materials handling  7.Logistics costs  8.Logistics customer serrice  9.productivity meajurement

description.zh: 1.策略管理者的特徵責任及風格2.企業環境的偵察3.策略形成4.策略執行與評估5.資訊科技與管理，高科技公司與多國籍企業的策略管理
description.en: This course attempts to define and analyze many the issue and function innvolved in management.The objection is to provide a set of frameworks for the development and analysis of strategic planning.The course seeks to structure the key dimension and the process of the strategic planning.

description.zh: 本課程在二技為品質管理。使學生瞭解品質管理的觀念、原理、領域。品管部門的組織、功能，如何管理產品或服務的品質，品管的工具、方法，如何持續改善品質的方法，品質表示法，如何評估品質管理成效，相關法令，品質管理未來趨勢。
description.en: This course lets the students understand the concepts, theories, and areas of qualify control, organization and functions of quality department.  Besides, the way to manage the products or the service quality, tools and methods of quality control, the way to improve the quality, quality representation method, evaluation of quality control, related regulations and future trends are also included.

description.zh: 任何計畫、產品或服務之壽命週期起始自需要分析，其次為決定需求和規格，接著為設計和執行，最後經由使用階段，在支援和維護下完成此計畫。而在進行經濟分析，應對貨幣之時間價值、投資報酬率、損益平衡、公司債券、現金流量、有效利率、最小成本壽命、通貨膨脹、成本估計、折舊、所得稅、資金成本、更新分析、敏感性分析和風險決策分析等要點，以求估計值之準確性、方案抉擇決策之正確性。
description.en: Engineering / management analysis of the economic aspects of public and private project proposals. Decisions involving the expenditure of capital funds. Alternative sources of funds; time value of money; methods of evaluating alternative project.

description.en: This course discusses how to design a computer system, which contains human intelligence. The subjects include: problem solving and searching, intelligent agent, reasoning, recognition, computer vision, knowledge representation, machine learning, perception.

description.en: The teaching goal is to establishing students have a Health life、Sportsmanship、Team work and Life time exercise habit.  All Freshman students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.

description.zh: 本課程旨在加強閱讀策略指導，以培養學生獨立閱讀、及使用適當英文表達之能力。教材以介紹英語地區文化、思想、及價值觀為主，以協助學生建立世界觀，並培養其批判思考能力。教學活動以分組討論、段落寫作與短文習作。
description.en: This course aims at providing the students with various reading strategies so that they may find the optimal straategies when they read independently; and furnishing the students with competence in writing.  Reading selections will be mainly focused on discussion of the cultures, thoughts and values of the English-speaking world.  Students will be required to join class activites, which encompasses group discussion, small group discussion, paragraph writing and essay writing.

description.zh: 本課程主要在探討產品生產週期的設計與製造階段，如何應用電腦來輔助其完成設計與製造的工作。在設計階段使用電腦以協助設計、修改、分析，使設計的結果最佳化；在製造階段可藉由電腦直接或間接監控生產的過程，使產品的質與量最佳化。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to discuss the applications of computers during the design and manufacturing stages. In the design stages, the computers are employed to assist design , modification and analysis. This can optimize the results. Which in the manufacturing stage, the directly or indirectly monitoring the production processes can lead to the optimal quality and quantity.

description.zh: 在二十世紀眾多分歧的思想中，有些廣受人們的認同，並信奉為價值體系而實踐，此稱為思潮。這些流行的思潮，影響人民生活，社會生計，更影響著國家的發展方向。因此，這些思潮與國家發展有極為密切的關係。思潮的內容及其與國家發展的關係就是本課程的主要內容。當代思潮中，民族主義、國家主義與世界主義的理想不同，國家之運作便不相同；民主主義、共產主義影響各國的政治制度及人民的生活方式；資本主義、社會主義與共產主義關係著國計民生，在經濟、社會及生活各層面都深受其影響。本課程中第一部分介紹最具代表性的當代思潮，第二部份就民族思潮、經濟思潮與國家發展的關係加以剖析，藉以探討我國立國的精神所在，即民族平等、政治民主，經濟發展，以實現三民主義自由、民主、均富理想。
description.en: In the 21th century, there are numerous different thoughts in which some are well recognized, treasured and put in practice. These popular thoughts influence the livelihood, the society and the direction of national development. So contemporary thoughts plays an important role in national development. Such contemporary thoughts and national development are the key contents of this course.The ideal of such thoughts as Racism, Nationalism, and Cosmopolitanism differ from each other, so they have a different effect on national policy decision. Nationalism and Communism influence the political system of the nation and the lifestyle of its citizens. Capitalism, Socialism and Communism have a main impact on the social and economical issues and affect the quality of life of a nation. The first part of this course introduces the most representative contemporary thoughts. The second part analyzes the effect of national thoughts, political thoughts and economical thoughts on a nation.

description.zh: 本課程旨在訓練學生公開表達之能力，內容包括語言表達基本原則與技巧、肢體語言與演講要領，備題演講及即席演講演練。
description.en: This course is designed to enable students to develop the principles and skills necessary for public speaking. Included will be guidelines for giving a speech and displaying body language, and practices for prepared speech and impromptu speech.

description.zh: 本課程著重分析中英文之句型, 語法, 慣用語等表達方式及比較其異同之處,並以密集練習及詳細解說交替, 使學生在兩種語言思考間運用自如。
description.en: This course focuses on the presentation of basic syntax, common expression, sentence structure, and an analytical comparison between the methodologies of English and Chinese translation, accompanied with frequent writing practice on students' part.

description.zh: 本課程旨在強化學生口語表達及溝通能力，開拓知識領域以及培養學生的國際觀。由逐步短句，段落至長途步口譯，循序漸進。從入門訣竅如讀稿技巧，筆記要領密集訓練及模擬演練。範圍涵蓋經貿，金融，時事，科技，產業等。
description.en: This course aims to strengthen students' oral expression and communicative abilities in English, broaden knowledge and international views. The course is designed to train the students gradually by using the techniques of Consecutive Interpretation, which starts from short sentences and paragraphs and leads to longer passages. For example, the techniques in sight translation, note-taking and various simulation drills are intensely practiced in class. It ranges from commercial & trade, banking affairs, current events, technologies and production.

description.zh: 本課程使學生具有基礎日語能力，加強會話及閱讀能力訓練。
description.en: The focus of this course is to enable students to have basic Japanese abilities and to strengthen the training or drilling of conversation and reading comprehension of the Japanese language.

description.zh: 本課程使學生具有基礎德語能力，加強會話及閱讀能力訓練。
description.en: The focus of this course is to enable students to have basic German abilities and to strengthen the training or drilling of conversation and reading comprehension of the German language.

description.zh: 本課程使學生具有基礎法語能力，加強會話及閱讀能力訓練。
description.en: The focus of this course is to enable students to have basic French abilities and to strengthen the training or drilling of conversation and reading comprehension of the French language.

description.zh: 本課程使學生具有基礎西班牙語能力，加強會話及閱讀能力訓練。
description.en: The focus of this course is to enable students to have basic Spanish abilities and to strengthen the training or drilling of conversation and reading comprehension of the Spanish language.

name.en: Skills and Practicum of Escorting English

description.zh: 本課程提供在各種場合中口譯的應用。如伴隨工廠參觀，出席展覽會場，開幕演說，及外賓接待，採取密集的口語演練，並訓練隨行解說的技巧。
description.en: This course provides an application of Interpretation for different occasions. These situations include a factory visit, an exhibition presentation, an opening address, a foreign-visitors reception and a banquet attendance. This course aims to build up the techniques and cultivation of Escort Interpretation through intensive oral training.

description.zh: 本課程介紹心理學理論，並探討如何應用心理學於英語教學，以提昇學生學習動機和自我學習、自我反思能力。
description.en: This course aims at introducing major theories of educational psychology and exploring their relevance to teaching and learning English as foreign language.   Besides, psychological ideas and theories dealing with motivation and concerned with developing students into reflective, autonomous learners will be discussed.

description.zh: 本課程以語言教學目標為橫軸，以分析公司會議及簡報的技術層面為縱軸。課程內容包括會議程序及演練，同意、結束會議，反對、請求說明，提出方案等技巧。簡報則著重了解目的，分析聽眾與場合，確定具體目標，調查研究，構思取材，搭配視聽器材以演練方式實施。
description.en: This course contains skills for conference and briefing , and English language relative to this field. The content of " conference" focuses on creating an agenda , starting and controlling a meeting, agreeing and disagreeing, asking for explanations, proposing solutions, concluding a meeting and so on. "Briefing" stresses on target-setting, audiences and occasion analysis, marketing researches and individual drills accompanied by appropriate audio-visual equipment.

description.zh: 以對流行事物，如電影，音樂，廣告，服裝，電視，通俗小說等，在當代文化思潮中的影響，及其所扮演角色探討為經，並對於英語在各範疇中展現之語彙，修辭，語法，技巧之賞析為緯，引領學生進入一個交織著現代語文與現代意涵的世界。
description.en: This course aims at giving an approach to the study of television, popular music, popular literature such as magazines and best sellers, fashion and movies, as well as an examination into the influence of all aspects of our daily lives on our basic beliefs and values. It involves the use of methodologies from both the humanities and the social sciences in the effort to interpret expressive cultural forms. Students are encouraged to participate in discussion over selected topics from contemporary issues.
