description.en: For the purpose of promoting English communication ability, the course is aimed at cultivating the oral skill components, such as pronunciation, stress, intonation, sentence patterns, and so on.

description.zh: 本課程著重在使學生熟悉日常生活的英語會話並能夠以正常速度聽講。課程內容取材自學生周遭熟悉的事務更藉由每日傳播媒體素材來達到學生每天聽的習慣，並在課堂中研討其內容以達到講的目的。
description.en: This course is designed to familiarize students with daily spoken English as well as listening and speaking ability. The content includes authentic listening materials from lively radio programs and TV programs. It provides a variety of listening activities which give an opportunity for both recognition of different speaking styles and an in-depth, culture-rich understanding of the topics from multiple perspectives. Speaking practices based on day-to-day language are emphasized in class.

description.zh: 本課程主要在培養各類型段落，短文的撰寫能力，包括描寫，敘述，說明及議論性質文章。
description.en: This course is intended for university-level EFL writing students with the aim of increasing their fluency in English writing.  To achieve this goal, students in this course will have ample opportunities to write varying types of English paragraphs, for instance, paragraphs of definition and paragraphs focusing on cause and effect relationships.  In addition, they will have plenty of opportunities to write various kinds of short English essays, including descriptions, narratives, and argumentative writings.

description.zh: 本課程精選有關教育與文化之文章，引導學生從閱讀中印證，比較各種文化和教育現象，並鼓勵學生從各種不同角度蒐集資料，俾使課堂討論呈現時代性與多元化的觀點。
description.en: This course is intended to help students develop their English proficiency through readings and discussions on discourses of education and culture.  Students are encouraged to react to the experiences described, relate them to their own lives and express their feelings and thoughts through interactive speaking activities.

description.zh: 本課程涵蓋的主題包含語音，句法，語意，心理語言，社會語言，語言學習等簡介，作為更進一步語言（母語／外語）學習，教學，研究的基礎。
description.en: This course covers the basic ideas on the following sub-topics: phonetics & phonology, syntax, semantics, psycholinguistics, sociolinguistics and language acquisition, serving as a stepping stone for further research on language learning (native or foreign), teaching or other language-related study.

description.zh: 認識通俗科技文章及科技學術論文語法、文體、結構組織等特質，並探討技術報告及論文撰寫方式。
description.en: This course helps the learners recognize the syntax, style, and organization as far as the papers on technology and technical writings are concerned. Discussions include specific ways to technical presentation and technical writings.

description.zh: 本課程訓練進階的文書處理專業能力外，加強排版作業技術的精進。內容包括：專業領域論文撰寫，書籍，報章雜誌編排等，並加強培養個人在職場的技術能力延伸。
description.en: This course helps strengthen the ability of desk publishing as well as the professional skills in advanced word processing.  The topics cover: thesis writing in the individually professional fields, demonstration and practice of desk publishing in books, newspapers and magazines, with the aim to cultivate more powerful techniques and more extensive ability in the future occupations.

description.zh: 本課程重點為（一）為簡淺明確的商用英文、（二）與時並進的國際經濟貿易實務，內容涵蓋法律、外匯與銀行、倉儲運輸，國際金融、國際行銷學、廣告學、包裝學、海上保險及度量衡。
description.en: This course acquaints students with present-day commercial English and trade practice, the content of which includes Laws, Foreign Exchange and Banking, Warehousing and Transportation, International Financing, International Marketing, Advertising, Packaging, Marine Insurance and Weights and Measures.

description.zh: 本課程旨在培養學生撰寫及處理各類商用文書之能力，透過各類專業文體的講授及寫作練習，使學生熟悉各類商用文書術語、文體及文件的應用。
description.en: This course aims at developing students' English writing skills in writing English business letters for various occasions; it is intended to familiarize students with business technical terms and varying types of business letters and documents and to increase their ability to apply them in authentic situations.

name.en: Introduction to World English and Culture

description.zh: 本課程旨在藉由各種文化媒體（如文學作品，書報雜誌，期刊論文，電影等影音文字）引導學生認識英國、美國，加拿大，非洲、澳洲，紐西蘭，印度，香港，新加坡，加勒比海等國家或地區的文化。藉由認識上述這些國家或地區的文化，擴大學生英語文應用的宏觀視野，暢通異國之情感文化交流，更可助跨國企業拓展鴻圖。
description.en: This course aims to introduce students to the cultures of English- speaking countries and areas such as England, the United States, Canada, Anglophone Africa, Australia, New Zealand, India, Hong Kong, Singapore, and the Caribbean. In this course, various cultural media such as diverse forms of books and magazines, essays, films, and world literatures in English will be employed to compare and analyze the cultures of Anglophone countries and areas. Students are expected to discern the similarities and differences between the cultures concerned. With this cross-cultural awareness, they could help promote cultural exchange and expand the business of Taiwan's international enterprises.

description.zh: 本課程之設計係針對非歷史系學生研習之用，基本上著重以宏觀的角度作歷史趨勢的闡述。課程方面包括中、西歷史觀念的比較與中國歷代政治、經濟、社會、文化的歷史演進，藉以幫助學生認識時代之趨勢與意義。授課方式以口頭講述為主，討論及書面報告為輔，期使學生在短時間內，能對中國歷史有一簡要而清晰的了解，並對日後的生活有所裨益。
description.en: This course is designed for non-history majors. It is chiefly intended to interpret the development of the Chinese history in a comprehensive perspective so that students may have a better understanding of the historical trends and their implications and may thus benefit from such an understanding. The course includes the following topics: a comparison of Chinese and Western concepts of history, the political, economic, social, and cultural developments of the Chinese history. The class activities include lectures and discussions; students are also required to submit written reports.

description.zh: 在二十世紀眾多分歧的思想中，有些廣受人們的認同，並信奉為價值體系而實踐，此稱為思潮。這些流行的思潮，影響人民生活，社會生計，更影響著國家的發展方向。因此，這些思潮與國家發展有極為密切的關係。思潮的內容及其與國家發展的關係就是本課程的主要內容。當代思潮中，民族主義、國家主義與世界主義的理想不同，國家之運作便不相同；民主主義、共產主義影響各國的政治制度及人民的生活方式；資本主義、社會主義與共產主義關係著國計民生，在經濟、社會及生活各層面都深受其影響。本課程中第一部分介紹最具代表性的當代思潮，第二部份就民族思潮、經濟思潮與國家發展的關係加以剖析，藉以探討我國立國的精神所在，即民族平等、政治民主，經濟發展，以實現三民主義自由、民主、均富理想。
description.en: In the 21th century, there are numerous different thoughts in which some are well recognized, treasured and put in practice. These popular thoughts influence the livelihood, the society and the direction of national development. So contemporary thoughts plays an important role in national development. Such contemporary thoughts and national development are the key contents of this course.The ideal of such thoughts as Racism, Nationalism, and Cosmopolitanism differ from each other, so they have a different effect on national policy decision. Nationalism and Communism influence the political system of the nation and the lifestyle of its citizens. Capitalism, Socialism and Communism have a main impact on the social and economical issues and affect the quality of life of a nation. The first part of this course introduces the most representative contemporary thoughts. The second part analyzes the effect of national thoughts, political thoughts and economical thoughts on a nation.

description.zh: 在接洽商務時能以最基本的日文能力應用在名片交換、自我介紹或洽商時基本會話、禮儀及習俗等之應對。第一篇：商務必備        第一章：交換名片與自我介紹        第二章：電話應對實務        第三章：商務會話實務第二篇：模擬洽商        第一章：到日本訪問時的商務會話實務        第二章：在台與日商買主交涉商業實務第三篇：日本文化有趣篇
description.en: This course introduces the fundamental conversation, courtesies and customs by using the Japanese. In addition to understand the origins and significance of these business behaviors, the students will be requested to conduct a simulated practice, such as changing the business card and self-introduction, in the class to have a better realization.

description.zh: 針對企業管理不同的對象，如經營策略、經營文化、事務管理、預算管理等，以實際個案方式介紹並討論。
description.en: This class will introduce and discuss the application on the following topics: Business strategies, business culture, factory management, budgeting management.

description.zh: 以實務應用的角度，幫助同學瞭解市場調查的涵義，發展及進行程序。其次以實際演練的方式，透過問卷的設計及發放，蒐集相關資料，並協助同學應用軟體，將市調所得資料進行整理、分析與解釋，最後以市場調查綜合個案報告之演練方式，以培養同學市場調查相關活動的基本概念與能力。
description.en: To help the students to know the connotation, development and procedure of marketing Research by the view of practice application.  In addition, to help the students to design and distribute the questionnaire. To collect, analysis and explain the data of market survey by using computer software.

description.zh: 以管理經理的角色，經營組織運作系統，包括代理權與機構間的結合，課程包含1.以策略態勢，瞭解和定義零售和批發商概念。2.學習通路管理和行銷組合。3.學習通路規劃、統合和組織。4.學習通路評估與管理。
description.en: This course includes:1. Important concepts in retailing and wholesaling are defined and explained from a strategic perspective; 2.Study channel management and the marketing mix; 3.Study channel planning, coordination and organization; 4. Study channel assessment and control.

description.zh: 本課程主在讓學生瞭解服務業的重要性和特性.如何作好服務並使顧客滿意。 內容:服務業概論、服務傳送系統、服務業地點選擇、服務品質、生產力和品質改善、預測、服務業的經營策略、個案討論。
description.en: Service management is to discuss How to manage service and satisfy customers. The content of the course: Service concept 、The service delivery system 、Service facility and layout、Productivity and quality improvement、Forecasting、Service quality、Service strategy、Customer satisfaction、Case study.

description.zh: 本課程主要在介紹企業的管理系統如何有效的計畫、設計和分析及實行，包括管理系統的分析、可行性研究、系統設計、系統發展、雛形設計、測試、文件製作和評估等。
description.en: This course introduces the plan design , analysis and implementation of business management system it includes the analysis of management system , feasible research , system design , system design development prototyping , testing , documenting and evaluation.

description.zh: 1. 建立網際網路行銷計劃2. 業務概述和實施摘要3. 分析網際網路市場之統計資料4. 闡述行銷推廣策略5. 編列網際網路行銷預算6. 成立網際網路行銷工作小組7. 廣告與直接郵件活動之設計8. 利用輔銷資料9. 發展企業識別10. 進行市場調查研究11. 執行公共關係與促銷方案12. 加入業務支援功能13. 籌劃展示會14. 啟動網際網路行銷方案15. 評量網際網路行銷成果
description.en: 1. Construct an Internet Marketing Plan2. Business Description and Execution Abstract3. Analysis the Statistical Data of Internet Market4. Description of Marketing Strategy5. List the budgets of Internet Marketing6. Establish an Internet Marketing Group7. Design the Activities of Advertisement and Mailing8. Using the Assistance Data9. Develop the Corporation Identification10. Implement Marketing Survey11. Implement Public Relation and Promotion12. Adding the Business Support Function13. Planning the Demonstration14. Beginning the Internet Marketing Plan15. Evaluate the Result of the Internet Marketing Plan

description.zh: 讓學生了解投資的基本觀念，課程內容主管要介紹證券(股票、債券)、期貨、選擇權、證券的評價模式和CAPM等訂價模式說明。
description.en: The course helps students to understand the knowledge of investment. It includes security, future and option, CAPM models, and case study.

description.zh: 本課程旨在加強閱讀策略指導，以培養學生獨立閱讀、及使用適當英文表達之能力。教材以介紹英語地區文化、思想、及價值觀為主，以協助學生建立世界觀，並培養其批判思考能力。教學活動以分組討論、段落寫作與短文習作。
description.en: This course aims at providing the students with various reading strategies so that they may find the optimal straategies when they read independently; and furnishing the students with competence in writing.  Reading selections will be mainly focused on discussion of the cultures, thoughts and values of the English-speaking world.  Students will be required to join class activites, which encompasses group discussion, small group discussion, paragraph writing and essay writing.

description.zh: 本課程以提供二技及四技學生標準訂定有關各類問題解答方法。本課程之目的在尋求以數量模式求出相關作業問題之最佳解，並介紹學生瞭解作業研究的本質，數量規畫方法及機率型態問題等。本課程包括下列主題：線型規畫、網路分析、動態規畫、遊戲理論、整數規畫、非線型規畫、馬可夫鏈、等候線理論、存貨理論、預測、馬可夫決策過程、可靠度、決策分析及系統模擬等。
description.en: The course makes college student to have the ability of soving related problems.The purpose of this course is using quantity model to find the optimal solution of related operation problems and introduce the entity of operation research to student. This course includes following topics:linear programming , network analysis , dynamic programming, game theory, integer theory,non-linear programming , markevo chain,,wait-linear theory, inventory theory programming, markevo decision process , reliabity,decision analysis and system simulation and so on.

description.zh: 本課程之目的在訓練學生，使學生熟悉經常使用之統計方法與理論，能利用已知之資料整理、分析未知之現象，建立修習其他相關學科之基礎。課程內容包括：機率理論、推定、假設檢定等。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to train student and to provide a basis in the methods and applications of general statistical. Topics include probability theory, inference, hypothesis testing.

description.zh: 本課程適合一般大專行銷管理之授課。其目的在尋求優良的產品行銷管理方法，以求企業之良好利潤。本課程授課內容在使學生瞭解行銷管理之觀念，產品設計、產品運銷、促銷及訂價。相關之授課內容包括：市場區隔、市場組織、購買行為、產品開發、零售、批發、促銷、廣告及訂價程序等。
description.en: The marketing course is suitable to college student.The ourpose is to find good method of product marketing,in order to persuit good profit of enterprise.The course contents' goal makes student understand the idea of marketing , product design.product transportion,promotion and price setting.The related course includes :market segmentation,market organization,the behavior of buying , product development,retailing,whole-saling promotion,adveristing and price seeting process.

description.zh: 本課程主要在介紹企業的管理系統如何有效的計畫、設計和分析及實行，包括管理系統的分析、可行性研究、系統設計、系統發展、雛形設計、測試、文件製作和評估等。
description.en: This course introduces the plan design , analysis and implementation of business management system it includes the analysis of management system , feasible research , system design , system design development prototyping , testing , documenting and evaluation.

name.en: The Introduction of Enterprise Resource Planning

description.zh: 本課程包含：企業資源規劃概論及其各模組之介紹。模組包含生產管理、財務管理、人力資源管理及專案管理。除外，並介紹目前常用之商用軟體系統及上機實習。
description.en: This course includes：the fundament of ERP and its component modules. The modules will cover production management, financial management, human resource management, and project management. Besides, the introduction of some commercial software systems and laboratory practice will also include.

description.zh: 由於禮儀存於生活之中，期予學生能充分瞭解商業禮儀，而對其人生有莫大的幫助。〝尊重、肯定、關懷、善解、包容〞是本課程的最高境界。課程內容包括：1.以優雅的儀態展現個人、2.一般社會禮儀、3.辦公室的個人禮儀、4.上班工作禮儀
description.en: Because the Etiquette existed in life , hope students can understand Business Etiquette and have much helpfulness to life. "Esteem 、 certainty、realize、subsume"is the best cumstance of this course. The course include :1.Show individual by elegant attitude.2.General social Etiquette .3.The personal Etiquette .4.The working Etiquette.

description.zh: 物流管理： 本課程在使學生瞭解生產的物品或提供的服務能適時適地，並以最少的成本送到顧客手中。 本課程之內容如下： 1.物流管理和策略 2.運輸和配送 3.保管與包裝 4.定單處理 5.採購 6.物料搬運 7.物流成本 8.物流服務 9.資訊系統 10.物流生產力衡量 11.個案實務研討。
description.en: Logistics Management: The aim of the course is to help the students understand how to perform logistics activities so as to make products and services available to customers at the time place, and in the condition and from desired in the most profitable or cost-effective way. The content of the course description: 1. Logistics management & Strategy 2.Transpor totion 3.Inventory maintenance 4.Order processing 5.Purchasing 6.Warehousing & packaging 7.Materials handling 8.Logistics costs 9.Logistics customer service 10.Productivity measurement .11.Case study.

description.zh: 經濟學基本概念及分析方法，包含供給與需求、市場均衡分析、效用與消費者選擇、生產與成本、國民所得與經濟福利、凱因斯所得理論、貨幣理論、綜合供需均衡分析、國際貿易理論。
description.en: The course introduces the basic concepts and analysis methods. it includes supply and demand ,market equilibrium,utility and consustomer selection,production and cost.national income and economic walfare,keynesian income theory,money theory,aggregated supply and demand analysis and international trade theory.

description.zh: 介紹會計學之基本觀念， 會計循環 - 包括分錄、過帳、試算、結算及財務報表之編製。逐一說明財務報表各個項目，最後並介紹財務報表之分析。修畢本課程之後能瞭解會計學之基本原理，會計資料處理及財務報表產生之整個過程，以及簡單之財務報表分析技術，並為未來之企業及財務相關課程打下良好基礎。
description.en: This course introduces the basic concepts of accounting. All the necessary processes are included as well the financial report analysis. After being taking this course, the student can understand the accounting concepts, accounting data process, generation of accounting report and techniques for analyzing the financial report.

These popular thoughts influence the livelihood, the society and the direction of national development. So contemporary thoughts plays an important role in national development. Such contemporary thoughts and national development are the key contents of this course.The ideal of such thoughts as Racism, Nationalism, and Cosmopolitanism differ from each other, so they have a different effect on national policy decision. Nationalism and Communism influence the political system of the nation and the lifestyle of its citizens. Capitalism, Socialism and Communism have a main impact on the social and economical issues and affect the quality of life of a nation. The first part of this course introduces the most representative contemporary thoughts. The second part analyzes the effect of national thoughts, political thoughts and economical thoughts on a nation.

description.zh: 專題報告 專題演講 研究小組討論
description.en: Case Study, Seminars, Group meeting

description.zh: １.數值解之介紹：精確度與誤差觀念２.插值及多項式３.數值積分與微４.數值線性代數５.非線性方程式之解６.曲線配合與函數近似７.近似解理論８.常微分方程式的數值解法９.偏微分方程式的數值解法
description.en: 1.Preliminary of Numerical Solutions2.Interpolations and Polynomials3.Numerical Differentiation and Integratin 4.Numerical Linear Algebra5.Numerical solution fo Nonlinear Systems6.Curve Fitting and cubic spline Interpolation 7.Approximation Theory8.Numerical Solution of Ordinary Differential Equations9.Numerical Solution of Partial Differential Equations

description.zh: 1.軟體工程簡介 2.專案規劃 3.系統需求分析 4.系統設計方法 5.程式設計方法 6.程式與系統測試 7.系統維護方法

This course can be viewed as the prerequisite for the advanced courses such as linear systems, communication systems and digital signal processing.      The course is outlined as: 1.ntroduction to signals and systems;2. Linear time-invariant systems; 3. Fourier series representation for periodical signals;4. Fourier analysis for continuous-time signals and systems;5. Fourier analysis for discrete-time signals and systems;6. Sampling;7. Modulation;8. Filtering,      9. Laplace transform.     10. description.zh: 在二十世紀眾多分歧的思想中，有些廣受人們的認同，並信奉為價值體系而實踐，此稱為思潮。這些流行的思潮，影響人民生活，社會生計，更影響著國家的發展方向。因此，這些思潮與國家發展有極為密切的關係。思潮的內容及其與國家發展的關係就是本課程的主要內容。當代思潮中，民族主義、國家主義與世界主義的理想不同，國家之運作便不相同；民主主義、共產主義影響各國的政治制度及人民的生活方式；資本主義、社會主義與共產主義關係著國計民生，在經濟、社會及生活各層面都深受其影響。本課程中第一部分介紹最具代表性的當代思潮，第二部份就民族思潮、經濟思潮與國家發展的關係加以剖析，藉以探討我國立國的精神所在，即民族平等、政治民主，經濟發展，以實現三民主義自由、民主、均富理想。
description.en: In the 21th century, there are numerous different thoughts in which some are well recognized, treasured and put in practice. These popular thoughts influence the livelihood, the society and the direction of national development. So contemporary thoughts plays an important role in national development. Such contemporary thoughts and national development are the key contents of this course.The ideal of such thoughts as Racism, Nationalism, and Cosmopolitanism differ from each other, so they have a different effect on national policy decision. Nationalism and Communism influence the political system of the nation and the lifestyle of its citizens. Capitalism, Socialism and Communism have a main impact on the social and economical issues and affect the quality of life of a nation. The first part of this course introduces the most representative contemporary thoughts. The second part analyzes the effect of national thoughts, political thoughts and economical thoughts on a nation.

description.zh: 本課程為光電科技系基本課程之。在具有統計及量子的基本觀念後，可選修本課程。在固態物理(II)的課程中，將包含電漿子、電磁偏極子、極化子、光學過程與激子、超導電性、介電性與鐵電性、反磁性、順磁性、鐵磁性、及反鐵磁性等。對磁共振及表面與界面物理也會詳細的討論。
description.en: Solid State Physics is one of the elementary courses of department of Photonics. The student wants to study this course; he had to possess the basic concepts of statistic mechanics and quantum physics. In Solid State Physics (II), it is include Plasmons, Polaritons, polarons, Optical processes and excitons, Superconductivity, Dielectrics and Ferroelectrics, Diamagnetism and Paramagnetism, Ferromagnetism, Antiferromagnetism.We also discuss about Magnetic resonance and Surface and interface physics in details.

description.zh: 本課程利用傅氏轉換理論解釋繞射理論及光影像處理與光資訊處理技術，它包含：1.簡介 2.二維線性系統分析 3.繞射理論 4.近場及遠場繞射 5.透鏡之傅氏轉換與影像品質分析 6.影像系統之頻域分析7.空間濾波與光資訊處理 8.全像術

description.zh: 由電磁學之理論推導光波在光導波管之運行、偶合及調變，並經由近代物理之量子論介紹雷射理論及光偵測器原理。經由雷射之電光調變、光導波管之電場調制與光偵測器之光電轉換，將積體光學之基本概念完整介紹，並針對其特性及應用，加以說明。
description.en: From the electromagnetic theory, the optical waves propagation, coupling, and modulating in optical waveguides are proposed. Also from the quantum theory introduced by modern physics, the laser theory and the principles of photo detectors are introduced. By the concepts of electro-optical modulation of laser devices, electrical modulation of optical waveguides, and the optol-electronic convertion of photo detector devices, the fundamental concepts of integrated optics are introduced. Also the characteristics and applications of integrated optics are presented.

description.zh: 此課程是針對已修完以微分為基礎之物理相關課程的理工學生而設計。整個課程的重點可分為兩方面:1.用不複雜的數學對物理概念與近物理論提供簡單、清潔的解釋。2.在課程中，特別安排隧道現象、原子結構、分子構造與超導現象。希望藉由一些實際應用來加深學生之近物理的概念，同時能印證所學之近物理論。此課程為一學期課程，我們會設法降低數學難度以提高學生的學習興趣，希望對學生之近物理論。此課程為一學期課程，我們會設法降低數學難度以提高學生的學習興趣，希望對學生日後在光電領域有所幫助。
description.en: This course is intended as a modern physics for science majors and engineering students who have already completed an introductory calculus-based physics courses. Throughout this course the underlying objectives are twofold:1.	To provide simple, clear, and mathematically uncomplicated explanations of physical concepts and theories of modern physics. 2.	To clarify and show support for these theories through a broad range of current applications and examples. In this regard, we will explore tunneling phenomena, atomic structure, molecular structure and superconductivity.   Since it is one-semester course, we try to make it easier. The mathematics level is not difficult for most part, and we hope students are finally getting to the frontier of physics.

description.zh: 本課程為光電科學之概念介紹，本課程包括光的特性、固態物理概念、光的調變、顯示器、雷射、光偵測器、光纖維波導以及光通訊系統。
description.en: The course of Introduction to Optoelectronic Engineering introduces the concepts of the science of electro-optics. It consists properties of light, concepts of solid state physics, modulation of light, display devices, lasers, photo-detectors, fiber optical wave-guide and optical communication systems.

description.zh: 即使科學昌明如此，但我們日常生活中使用的、不斷推陳出新的照相機、攝錄影機、影印機等，在在都說明幾何光學現在仍然是主宰設計的工具。光學主要是藉著對光本質方面的瞭解，發展有關的理論基礎與計算法則，並進而用在日常生活且增益人類福祉的一門科學。幾何光學則是光學理論中，一連串近似運算的結果，著重在成像的效果和應用的一門工具性知識。本系之幾何光學是一學期、三學分、每週三小時的課程，教學內容大致包含以下三部份：一、介紹光的性質、在介面上反射、折射之有關定理、成像的原因及應用。二、分析像差現象及其成因與評估。三、淺介透鏡之設計。
description.en: Light is the principal means by which we gain knowledge of the world. From putting continually the improved camera, video cassette recorder, copying machine, etc., to market can just account for how important a designing tool the Geometric-Optics is.To build a solid basic theory and a rule for calculating through understanding thoroughly the nature of light is the central goal of Optics. Using the basic theory of optics and processes of approximate estimate, the Geometric-Optics put its point on image formation and its applications.Here in our department, the Geometric-Optics is a 3-credit, 3-hour per week, one-semester course. There are three consecutives parts in the one-semester lecture:The 1st part : (a)the nature of light, (b)the related theorems about reflection and refraction, (c) image formation.The 2nd part : the formation and correctness of aberrations.The 3rd part : the designing of lenses.

description.zh: 本課程包括(一)基礎的光電子學之學理介紹，內容包括：量子力學概念、半導體、電磁學；(二)光的傳輸，內容包括：光在介質中的傳輸、光導波管、光偶合；(三)光的產生，內容包括：半導體的發光機制及半導體雷射。
description.en: This course includes (I) the introduction of basic concepts of photonics, including basic quantum mechanics, basic semiconductor electronics, electromagnetics; (II) proipagation of light, including light propagation in media, optical wave-guide theory, wave-guide couplers; (III)generation of light, including optical prosesses in semiconductors and semiconductor lasers.

description.zh: 本課程介紹雷射之基本概念及特性，內容包括電磁波理論、光學系統之光跡追蹤、高斯光束、光學共振腔、雷射之振盪及光放大原理；然後介紹雷射種類及各種雷射元件。
description.en: Solid State Physics is one of the elementary courses of department of Photonics. The student wants to study this course; he had to possess the basic concepts of statistic mechanics and quantum physics. In Solid State Physics (II), it is include Plasmons, Polaritons, polarons, Optical processes and excitons, Superconductivity, Dielectrics and Ferroelectrics, Diamagnetism and Paramagnetism, Ferromagnetism, Antiferromagnetism.We also discuss about Magnetic resonance and Surface and interface physics in details.

description.zh: 本課程為光電科技系基本課程之一。從基本的原子鍵結開始介紹，再導入晶體的結構，此部份包含完美的晶體及晶體的缺陷等。加強有關光電材料的介紹，如電性、光的性質、半導體材料及磁性材料等。祈使學生在進入光電領域前，對光電材料有一充分的認識。
description.en: Materials Science is one of the elementary courses of Department of Photonics. We begin to introduce the basic concepts of the atomic bonding then introduce the crystalline structure, here include perfect crystals and crystal defects. We will enhance about introducing the materials of electronic, optical, and magnetic. It will help the students can recognize the materials of electro-optic when he is going to electro-optic fields.

description.zh: 課程大綱如下：1.一階微分方程式2.二階及高階微分方程式3.線性微分方程系統4.常微分方程式之級數解與特殊函數5.拉氏變換
description.en: The outline of the course includes the following:1.	Differential Equations of the Frist Order2.	Differential Equations of the Second Order and Higher Order 3.	Systems of Linear Differential Equations4.	Series Solution of Ordinary Differential Equations and Special   Functions 5.	The Laplace Transform

description.zh: 瞭解微電腦介面原理與週邊設備的介面技術，內容包括：PC的結構介紹，記憶體的結構，中斷處理的方法，計時／計數器的應用，串列傳輸的原理，並列傳輸的原理及類比／數位轉換原理等。
description.en: Introduction to the principles of microcomputer interfacing,including the architecture of a PC, memory configuration. Interrupt handing, Timer/counter applications, serial port transmission theory, centronics Interface,and analog/digital conversions etc.

description.zh: 課程包羅三個領域：分離元，線性IC，以及數位IC，內容1.基本放大器 2.運算放大器 3.回授與穩定性 4.主動濾波器 5.非線性電路 6.類比電路設計 7.數位電路設計。
description.en: The course provides coverage of three areas :discrete devices, linear integrated circuits,and digital integrated circuits. The contents include : 1.Basic amplifier 2.Operational amplifiers 3.Feedback and stability 4.Active filters 5.nonlinear circuits 6.Analysis circuits design 7.digital electronic design

description.zh: 介紹光纖構造及光在光纖內的特性參數，包括模態偏極態等；介紹光纖系統的光源、偵測器等主動元件，及藕合器、連接器等被動元件；介紹光纖網路及光纖元件，包括分波多工器等的原理；介紹調變、放大、雜訊等光纖控制、偵測子系統。課程內容包括：1.光纖通訊系統介紹 2.光纖特性參數介紹 3.光在光纖內的傳播 4.光纖模態 5.光源6.光偵測器 7.藕合器、連接器 8.光纖元件-分波多工器 9.調變 10.雜訊與偵測。
description.en: 1 Introduction to the optical fiber system,  2 Parameters of the optical fiber,  3 Propagation of light inside optical fiber,  4 Modes of optical fiber,  5 Optical sources for optical fiber system,  6 Detectors for the optical fiber system,  7 Couplers and connectors  8 Introduction to DWDM,  9 Modulation,  10 Noise and Detection.

name.en: Practical Chinese Writting on Various Subject Matters (I)

description.zh: 講授公文及書信。公文之內容包括函、簽、公告、報告等各類常用公文的作法與寫作要領，並兼及處理公文之注意事項。書信之內容包括傳統及現代書信的寫法與寫作要領，並兼及便條與做為便條使用之名片的寫法。
description.en: The course is to teach students how to write and handle official correspondences and social letters.  The contents of social letters include how to write traditional and modern letters, including notes and name cards.

description.zh: 『誰掌握了資訊，誰就獲得先機』。二十世紀人類進入資訊時代，資料型態愈趨多元，各類資訊排山倒海而來，人們不再擔心資訊不足，反倒擔憂『資訊氾濫』，多的不得了。在如此多的資訊中，如何去作最有效的選擇與利用，將是知識份子必備的技能。課程內容包括：科學簡介(定義、特興、方法、發展)、科技指標與各類型資料之介紹與利用。
description.en: "Whoever holds the information takes advantage." With an approach to the information age of the 21st century, people are faced with various types of information, which rushes to us like a flood. People are not worried about being lack of information; instead, they are more worried about a "deluge of information." Encountered with so much information, each of the individual intellectuals finds it essential to know how to pick and make use of -with efficiency--the information in need. This type of ability has become a fundamental skill for modern people. The topics covered in this course include: Introduction to Science (Definition, Properties, Approaches and Development), Technological Indexes, and a diverse types of information.

description.zh: 為了讓學生有機會學習有系統的瞭解、接納自己，體諒父母、尊長，關愛別人，回饋社會，進而發揮潛能，自主自在的過一生，乃設計此種10～15人的獨特小團體，運用團體動力，以「交流分析」(Transactional Analysis,TA)為主要理論架構，採理論與實務、個別與團體並重方式，在師生積極參與中，討論、分享、成長。課程內容主要包含交流分析概述，人格結構與功能分析，自我圖，關愛經濟，愛的證言，交流方式分析，時間結構分析，心理遊戲分析，心理劇本分析的理論與習作等。
description.en: In a systematic way, this course will help students understand themselves, accept themselves, and understand their parents and elders.  Also, it teaches students how to care for other people and have contributions to society with a view to promoting students' potential and live their life self-confiently and freely.  The class is to be desinged into groups composed of 10 to 15 students in each section in order to make use of group interactions, to encourage students to actively participate in class discussion and experience sharing.  On the basis of Transactional Analysis(TA), both theory and practice, individual and group activities are emphasized.  Through such a focus, students will go through various stages leading to personal growth.  The contents of this course include: an introduction to TA, an analysis on personality, self-realization, caring and love experiences, transactional analysis, psychological tests, and game analysis, theory and exercise on psychological plays.

description.zh: 語言是人類情感相互溝通的橋樑，促進人際關係的和諧，而如何把自己的想法、看法、非常輕鬆而正確的說出來，卻不是一件簡單的事。要想說的中肯、說得技巧，就必須經過一番學習與研究。這就牽涉到：與意學、語言學以及倫理學、理則學與表演術，讓別人聽了樂於接納。因此必須注意說話的內容、音調和儀態三方面的基本訓練，更更要注意時間、空間、對象，而有所不同。還要傾聽別人說話的美德。總之，會說不是胡說、亂說、愛說與白說，也就是能放能收、恰到好處。
description.en: Being the bridge of human communication,language improves personal relationship. But how to express oneself comfortably is not that simple. It needs practice and skill if one wants to speak to the point. This 「practice」involves semantics、linguistics、ethics、logic and performance. Therefore, the content、tone and deportment are all essential  elements to a successful speech. When to speak、where to speak and to whom to speak are various components of one's talk. To listen is more important than to speak.

description.zh: 首先介紹歌劇中音樂的元素、本質及角色，欣賞各時期不同類型之歌劇作品，繼由「世界三大男高音」看歌劇曲目的走向，吸引新生代同學對歌劇之響往，帶領愛樂者進入歌劇欣賞的境界。
description.en: This one-semester course is designed to let students learn:  1.to approach to their first opera with open minds and open ears 2. to understand what opera is.  3. to know the essential elements of opera－composers and librettists,  singers, conductors, directors, as well as designs and expenses,...etc.. 4.to understand the development of opera 5.to appreciate opera through watching films of various kind 6.to be able to enjoy opera for the rest of their life.

description.zh: 探究永恆的奧秘，追尋自然的真相，是寶石學中最令人癡狂的學習動力。當您望著各類寶石，欣賞它們顏色與光彩的同時，是否也能從另一個角度，去看看大自然千萬年的蘊化奇蹟，與結合多少後天資源使璞石發亮的過程？寶石領域一如大千世界，不但充滿了驚嘆，也佈滿了色彩。在課程內容上，將藉由豐富的教材，帶您上山下海，探訪寶石的故鄉，從伊麗莎白泰勒的鑽石，賈桂琳甘迺迪的珍珠項鍊、紅藍寶、祖母綠....或關之琳所買下的翡翠、日本皇太子妃的珍珠項鍊、慈禧太后的西瓜碧璽...等等，課程由淺入深循序漸進，不但能帶給您更豐富的珠寶常識，同時也能實際地藉實物練習，到兼具理論與實務的學習樂趣。
description.en: To probe the mystery of eternity, to searach for the answer of nature, is the charismatic power of learning inside gemology circles.  When you look at the variety of gemstones, do you appreciate their color and luster?  Furthermore, do you also see beyond the beauty and discover the miracle of a gem's thousand-year life?  To see how the multi-complicated processes combine to take a raw stone from the earth and turn it intoa beautiful finished gemstone?A gem itself is like the no-bounds world, not only full of fascination but also full of colors.  We are going to, by means of plentiful materials, bring each of you into the spectacular mining districts.  From Elizabeth Taylor's "TAYLOR-BURTON" diamond, Catherine Kennedy's jewelry box-pearls, rubies, emeralds...l to Empress Dowager Tzu-Hsi's Watermelon Tourmaline... etc, we will lead you step by step into this fasciating world of gems, and you will also be given practical lessons to probe theories in order to achieve great success in st

description.zh: 本課程旨在欣賞篆竟藝術，認識我國歷代著名的篆竟家與優美的作品，由作品之中廣泛瞭解篆竟多樣化的美感表現與技法，並嘗試實現於創作。篆竟是我國特有的一種藝術形式，除了日常日信的實用功能之外，更普遍使用在書法或繪畫等藝術作品中。因此瞭解篆竟藝術之美，往往是面對其他藝術作品時所不可或缺的。篆竟創作必須在方寸微小的天地之內，專注構思，謹慎刻畫。如此苦心經營的體驗，同時也是十分可貴的精神陶冶。
description.en: This course enlightens students on the art, the arlists and the masterworks of seal cutting. Form the appreciation of great works, students sharpen the understanding of the versatile beauty and skills exerted in seal cutting.Seal cutting is a unique form of art in China. It is commonly applied in signets, and extensively connected with calligraphy and painting stampings and other artistic performance. Therefore, the understanding of seal cutting is supposed to be an inevitable way to unveil the curtain of Chinese art palace. Students are expected to work out the composition of seal cutting within centimeters;hence,their concentration and deliberation can be spontaneously molded.

description.zh: 本課程有系統概括性闡述動態地球科學的基本知識和理論。課程內容包括:地球簡介、地球在天體間的位置、地貌、全球熱量平衡、氣溫、水氣、降雨、風、氣旋、氣候、天氣、生態系統、水文、土壤、地球材料、岩石圈、板塊構造運動、火山、風化作用、塊體運動、淡水、流水地形、地形與岩石構造、風與浪地形、冰川地形、冰川期、土壤與生物等。
description.en: The contents of the course titled " INTRODUCTION TO EARTH SCIENCE " include : the earth; our place in the sun, geomorphology, the earth's global energy balance, air temperature, atmospheric moisture and precipitation, winds and global circulation, weather systems, global climates, global ecosystems, hydrology, global soils, earth materials, the lithosphere and plate tectonics, volcanic and tectonic landforms; weathering and mass erosion, fresh water of the continents; landforms made by running water, landforms and rock structure; landforms made by waves and wind; glacial landforms and the ice age; soil and biology.

description.zh: 數學與物理是學習理工科目必備的工具，然而很多同學卻視為畏途。探究其原因，是抽象的思維方式以及部分不合實用的作法，造成學習上的障礙。本課程希望藉由電腦的輔助，將數學、物理與工程數學上幾個重要的觀念具體化，使學生能對抽象觀念有直覺式的體驗，結合理論與實際，進一步提升分析問題的能力。
description.en: Mathematics and Physics are prerequisites for learning science and engineering; nevertheless, many students are afraid to study them. Investigating into the problem, we find that the way of abstract and some impractical methods hinder them from learning those subjects. In this course we will study some major concepts including Mathematics, Physics and Engineering Mathematics etc. and combine the theorems and the realities by the aid of computers to promote our students the capability of analyzing.

description.zh: 台灣經濟的發展已帶動了政治民主化的發展，尤其自解嚴後，政治社會全面變遷，改變幅度之大與範圍之廣，變化之快速與轉變之激烈，予人一種眼花撩亂，目不暇給之感。身為明日舞台的主人，要不被社會拖著走，唯有洞察、掌握社會變遷脈動的能力。本課程將以學術理論為你深入分析、客觀探討。
description.en: The economic development in Taiwan resulted in the rapid development in political spheres. Especially after the lifting of the martial law, the changes in politics and society have exerted a great impact.  This course will provide students with the ability to keep track of the changes of the society.  Based on political theories, students will learn how to investigate the phenomena and analyze the reasons of these changes.

description.zh: 本課程目標如下：（一）以心理學為基礎，探討人類生活各面向的知識；（二）建立學生生活行為的技能；（三）促使學生建立自己積極的價值體系。  本課程內容涵蓋人類的個體發展、學習方式、動機、情緒、態度、人格、兩性、愛情、家庭、育兒、健康管理、社會行為等生活面的相關行為。  本課程採學生中心教學法，以啟發法、小組討論、創造式發表等方式授課，藉以活潑學生的思考並增加學生上台練習的機會。
description.en: The objectives of this course are : (1)By basing on the psychology   to guide our students to discuss the variant facets of their lives. (2)To establish the students' good skills to deal with their own lives. (3)To found the students' positive value systems .  This course includes the human behaviors of individual development , learning strategies, motivations, emotion, attitudes, personality, social interaction, religious lives, love, bisexual interaction, family lives, children cultivation , and etc. This course uses the learner-centered instructing strategies. The methods of discovery learning, teams discussion, creative teaching , and etc. will be adopted, in order to excite the students to do deep thought and give them the opportunities to show their efforts and achievements themselves.

name.en: Medical Trend in the New Era

description.zh: 本課程目標：旨在讓學生認識未來醫療走向，掌握趨勢，同時由醫療之觀點，對學生之健康觀作心的新詮釋，並且讓學生實際地學習實用的救命術，重新探討新生命之價值。本課程內容涵蓋：1.新醫療關係與諮詢、2.如何與醫師對話、3.高關注照護醫療倫理、4.掌握生命力、5.新人類通病、6.領袖特質發展之醫療觀、7.善用醫療資源網路、8.未來基因新療法、9.由健保財務危機看新發展潮流、10.急症新趨勢與預防、11.如何自我建診、12.親子醫療新方向、13.健康全方位人格發展新趨勢-4Q學習、14.生命奇蹟-心肺復甦術理論與演練、15.醫療市場與策略之新趨勢。本課程授課方式：口頭講授、課堂討論、專題演講、情境實習演練。
description.en: This course aims to acquaint students with the new trend of medical treatment. From a medical perspective, students will be furnished with new ideas about health.  With practical training and application, students will have a better understanding of life values.The contents of this course include: (1) New perspective on medical relations and consultation (2) How to talk to doctors  (3) Medical Ethics on intensive care (4) The mastering of your life-force (5) The common failing of the new generation (6) A medical observation on leadership qualities (7) How to make use of the internet resources (9) Financial crisis caused by health insurance and the future development (10) The new idea about emergency cases and their prevention (11) Self-exam on health (12) New medical theory on parent-child treatment (13) 4Q-multi-dimensional development of personality (14) Miracles-the theory and practice of CPR (15) New trend on the medical market and strategy.Teaching method: Lecture, discussion, spe

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。包括工業發展概況、工廠組織、工廠計劃與佈置、製造工程、工作研究、生產管制、物料管理、品質管制、成本管制、人事管理、工業安全與衛生。
description.en: General Situation of Industrial Developments, Factory Organization, Factory Plan and Layout, Manufacture Engineering, Work Study, Product Control, Materials Control,  Quality Control, Cost Control, Personnel Management, Industrial Safety and Hygiene.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。熔接概念、熔接方法介紹、各種熔接特性、熔銲人員資格及熔接檢驗、熔接控制及熔接規範(WPS)。
description.en: Introduction of Welding Codes, Fundamentals of Welding, Welding Processes, Welding Equipment, Metals and Their Weldability, Evaluation of Welds, Welding Procedure Specifications (WPS) and Qualification.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。包括液滲檢測法、磁粉檢測法、放射線、超音波檢測法、中子射線、全像攝影檢測法等、針對各種檢測方法之原理、可靠度、靈敏度等作探討。
description.en: Liquid-Penetrant Examination, Magnetic Particle Examination, Radiographic Examination, Ultrasonic Examination, and other less common techinques. Physical  Bases  of  Tests, Materials  to which applicable, Calibration Standards, and  Reliability.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。品質管制之基本觀念、應用統計與機率來推定及控制產品品質、管制圖、抽樣原理、品質成本、品管系統設計及系統績效之評估。
description.en: Fundamental Concepts of Quality Control, Use Statistics and Probability to Infer and Control Products Quality, Control Chart Principle of Sampling Quality Cost Q.C System Design and Performance Estimate.

description.zh: 複習矩陣及向量、狀態空間描述法、求解狀態空間方程式、可控制性及可觀察性、穩定性分析、狀態變數回饋系統的設計、簡介最佳控制、簡介強健控制。
description.en: Review of matrices and vectors, state space representation of control systems, the solution of the state space equations, controllability and observability, stability analysis, design of state variable feedback systems, optimal control systems, and robust control systems.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh: 提供本校四技學生在本行以外，對其他領域的認識，以彌補其只鑽研專業課程的偏頗，訓練學生整合知識，使不致在知識爆炸的時代中迷失，促進各種專材的溝通，培養共識；培育人文素養，啟發人文關懷，使具有完整的人生觀。
description.en: This course offers a good opportunity for four-year college students in this university to have an easier access to a completely different field of knowledge, in the hope that  students can add their individual professional knowledge and broaden their minds. The students will be furnished with integrated knowledge, discovering a better way towards professional communication, developing more common sense and never losing themselves in this information-explosive age. With a solid basis on humanity and liberal ideology, they are sure to find a more complete picture of human life.

description.zh: 先修課程：3002012或負責教授同意。介紹各種不同方法分析(如能量法及Castigliano定理)、破壞理論、材料選用、可靠度概念、軸及軸承、離合器及煞車器、傳動元件(如皮帶、鏈條、齒輪)、軸聯接器、飛輪、彈簧等以及實例分析。
description.en: Introduction to Analysis Methods(Energy method & Castigliano theorem ), Failure Theory, Material Selection, Introduction to reliability, Shafts and Bearings, Clutches and Brakes, Power Transmission Elements (Belts, Chains and Gears), Couplings, Flywheels, Springs and analysis of expansions.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。切削加工概論、影響切削之因素、切削力學、切削熱影響、刀具材料、刀具磨耗與壽命、切屑控制、切削動態分析、切削經濟學、切削液及表面粗度、切削新技術簡介。
description.en: Introduction to Machining Technology, Parameters Affecting Metal Machining, Mechanics of Metal Machining, The Temperature Induced by Metal Machining, Tool Material, Tool Wear and Life, Chip Control, The Dynamic Control, The Economics of Metal Machining, The Fluids and Surface Roughness, Introduction to New Technology.

description.zh: (A)熱工實驗：能量轉換、熱之傳遞、對流及輻射、熱交換器、燃燒及燃料等之實驗。(B) 流力實驗：雷諾數實驗、管路摩擦實驗(損失係數)、管路能量損失實驗(90°彎管、小半徑彎管、大半徑彎管、突擴、突縮)、文氏管流量實驗、孔口板流量實驗、壓力量測實驗、堰流量實驗、pump性能曲線實驗、壓力中心實驗、風洞實驗(升力、阻力係數)。
description.en: (A) Thermal Lab.Thermal experiments include energy transformation, heat conduction, convection, and radiation, heat exchanger, combustion, etc. (B) Fluid Mechanics Lab.Reynolds’s Number test, Pipe friction test (loss coefficient), Pipe energy loss test (90°miter, elbow, sudden enlargement and contraction), Venturi meter flow measurement, Orifice flow measurement, Pressure measurement, Wear flow measurement, Pump performance test, Pressure center test, Wind tunnel experiments (lift and drag coefficient).

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。介紹製造流程編排、可程式控制系統、資料傳輸及局部迴路系統、數值控制、數值控制編程、工業機器人、人工智慧、整合製造系統（CIM）。
description.en: Manufacturing Process Planning, Programmable Control System, Data-Communication and Local-Area-Network System, Numerical Control, Programming for NC Machining, Industrial Robot, Artificial Intelligence, and Computer Integrated Manufacturing System.

description.zh: 先修課程：3002010或負責教授同意。探討材料強度、彈性塑性及建立理論之數學架構，探討金屬的流動性與破壞，及機械行為所須之冶金基礎，金屬成形時其相關冶金及機械因子及機械實驗之冶金變數。
description.en: The Strength of Materials, Elastic and Plastic Behavior of Crystals (Concept of Stress and Strain), Dislocation Theory, Strengthening Mechanisms, Fracture, The Application of Material Tests (Tension, Hardness Torsion, Fracture, Fatigue), Brittle Fracture and Impact Testing, and Fundamentals of Metal Working.

description.zh: 先修課程：3002016或負責教授同意。流體機械總論，輪機機械之歐拉理論總升程、設計原理、相似定律及比速率，水輪機及各種泵之升程、功率、效率及損失，泵原動機功率設計、特性曲線、孔蝕現像、水鎚作用、軸之平衡。空氣機械、流體聯結器與扭拒變速器、油壓及氣力機具。
description.en: Introduction and Classification of Fluid Machines, Turbomachinery Analysis (Including the Angular MomentumPrinciple, Euler's Turbomachine Equation, Velocity Polygon Analysis), Performance Analysis and Specific Speed, Similarity Rules, Cavitation and Net Positive Suction Head (NPSH), Introduction to Water Turbine, Introduction to Pumps, Introduction to Air Machinery, Introduction to Fluid Coupling and Fluid Torque Converter, Introduction to Oil Hydraulic and Pneumatic Machinery or Equipments.

description.zh: 本課程有系統介紹機械工程常用之應用軟體，於不同學期或不同班級教授各不同應用軟體，以提供需要同學選擇。本課程之應用軟體涵括：﹙1﹚數學類：如MATLAB、Mathematica、Macyma等；﹙2﹚工程分析類：如ANSYS、COSMOS、NASTRAN等；﹙3﹚動態分析類：如Working Model/Motion、COSMOS/Motion等；﹙4﹚影像處理類：如Adobe/Photoshop、MATLAB；﹙5﹚介面類：如LABVIEW；﹙6﹚其他：以物件式語言開發應用工具等。
description.en: The course is to systematically introduce application software packages to mechanical engineering students.  In order to offer more options to the interested students, there are several packages are included in the course.  And, different packages may be taught in different semesters or in different class.  The software packages include the following categories: (1) Math: MATLAB, Mathematica, Macyma, etc. (2) CAE:  ANSYS, COSMOS, NASTRAN, etc. (3) Motion: Working Model/Motion, COSMOS/Motion, etc. (4) Image Processing: MALAB/Image, Adobe/Photoshop, etc. (5) Interface: LABVIEW, etc. Miscellaneous: use any Object-Oriented languages to develop ME application tools.

description.zh: 一學期兩學分兩小時，共三學期六學分。每學期開授七門課，學生可從中任選一門修讀。不得重複修讀同一課程。三學期共需修畢三個不同的課目。每班選修以四十二人為限。內容包含：禮記、論語、先秦諸子選讀、朱熹學術思想、傳習錄、史記選讀、世說新語的人物、先秦寓言、詩經、駢文選讀、李杜詩、蘇東坡詩欣賞、孟子、荀子、現代詩、蘇辛詞、莊子、韓非子、六祖壇經、左傳、陶淵明及其作品、唐近體詩選讀、李商隱詩、山海經、唐宋元民間文學、志怪小說選讀、菜根譚與幽夢影、書法名作選讀。禮記－中國古代禮制文明(Ａ)論語(Ｂ)先秦諸子選讀(Ｃ)朱熹學術思想(Ｄ)傳習錄()史記選讀
description.en: For this course, there will be 2 credits for each of three semesters.  Students are required to choose one from the seven subjects offered in each semester.  Selective readings included Book of Rites, Analects of Confucius, and Pre-Chin Works.

description.zh: 本課程以與學生日常生活相關的情境為主題，協助學生建立自然、流利的英語溝通技巧。語程側重訓練學生下列語言能力；(1)重音、縮音、連音、及語調等發音基礎訓練；(2)聆聽大意及特定資訊之能力；(3)熟悉英語人士日常生活情境及與學生將來就業環境相關之會話及適當之應對方式。本課程使用語言教室視聽器材實施教學。除聆聽錄音教材、配對練習、角色扮演、演說、表演短劇、及小組討論外，並佐以錄影教材，以加強實際演練與師生互動。
description.en: This training is designated to help students establishcommunicative skills through natural and authentic English,contextualized in lively, interesting situations related tostudents' immediate needs. Special focuses will be on(1) listening for main ideas and for specific information;(2) pronunciation exercises targeted at important featuresof English, such as stress, rhythm, intonation, reduction,and linking sounds; (3) conversational fluency providingstudents with a wide range of useful conversationalexpressions.  Classes will be conducted in the language labs,and students will be expected to participate in classdiscussions, oral drills after listening to tapes and watching videos.  Lots of interaction with other students either in pairs or in small or large group activities will be emphasized.

description.zh: 本課程承續學生一年級的英文基礎，提供學生更多閱讀機會，並加強閱讀策略指導，以培養學生獨立閱讀、及使用適當英文表達之能力。教材以介紹英語地區文化、思想、及價值觀為主，以協助學生建立世界觀，並培養其批判思考能力。教學活動以團體討論、小組討論、段落與短文習作實施。
description.en: The objective of this course are: (1)to provide the students with abundant reading opportunities based on the students' levels;(2)to introduce various reading strategies to the students so that they may find the optimal strategies to help themselves read independently; and (3)to furnish students with competence in writing. Reading selections will be mainly focused on discussion of the cultures, thoughts and values of the English-speaking world. Students will be able to join activities which encompasses group discussion, small group discussion, paragraph writing and essay writing.

description.zh: 本課程的設計以歷史趨勢的闡述及專題研究分析二方面同時進行。內容包括民族、社會、文化精神，中國歷代政治得失之分析，中國農業經濟之特性，歷代考選、財賦、土地制度之變遷。授課方式以口頭講述為主，討論及書面報告為輔，期使學生除通盤瞭解中國歷史精神與特性外，並能具有獨立分析問題之能力。
description.en: This course is comprised of two parts: introduction to the development of the Chinese history and studies on special topics of Chinese history.  Major topics includes ethnical, social, and cultural problems; the advantages and disadvantages of the political policies of different dynasties; the characteristics of the agricultural economy in the history of China; the evolution of civil service examination systems, of financial structures, and of land policies.  Class activities include lectures and discussions.  Students are also expected to make oral and written reports so that they may have not only a comprehensive understanding of the essence of Chinese history, but also the ability of independent thinking and analysis.

description.zh: 大二上學期為軍訓（三）兩學分選修，在下列三單元中選擇兩者，概述如下：孫子兵法－－使學生了解我國固有兵學思想、戰爭原理、原則及戰爭指導藝術，啟發學生對兵學研究之興趣，增進軍事修養，建立全民國防共識，以維護國家安全。國防科技－－使學生對武器及武器系統與目前世界各國所發展使用的新式武器能作有系統的認識，並對我國獨立自主的國防科技發展成就有所了解，以啟發青年學生參與國防科技研究的興趣。護理與健康－－概述同大一女生部份。國防科技－－使學生對武器及武器系統與目前世界各國所發展使用的新式武器能作有系統的認識，並對我國獨立自主的國防科技發展成就有所了解，以啟發青年學生參與國防科技研究的興趣。護理與健康－－概述同大一女生部份。
description.en: Military Training includes three Courses at the first semester of second year. They are Sun Tzu's Art of War, National Defense Technology, Nursing and Health. Sophomores can choice any two of tem. Sun Tzu's Art of War introduces you into new area of thought of war. National Defense Technology affords you a thorough and systematic knowledge of world's high technology weapons. Nursing and Health is a course of teaching you how to take cares your own body and mind.

description.zh: 先修課程：3001011或負責教授同意。力、質量與加速度、質點運動學、質點動力學、功與能、衝量與動量、剛體運動、剛體系的動力學。
description.en: Force and Acceleration, Kinematics of a Particle, Kinetics of a Particle, Work and Energy, Impulse and Momentum, Kinematics of a Rigid Body, Kinetics of a Rigid Body.

description.zh: 先修課程：3001011或負責教授同意。介紹結構體在受到張力、壓力、剪力、扭力及彎曲等外力狀態下之變形，分析應力、應變及變形，莫耳圓、壓力容器、樑、柱。
description.en: Prerequisite: ME111 or Consent of InstructorIntroduction of the deformation, strain and stress of structures (Beam, Column, Pressure vessel) under several different loading conditions such as Tension, Compression, Shear force, Torsion and Bending moment.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。物質熱力學特性、改變能量形式之基本原理、熱力學第一及第二定律、可逆性與可用性、動力循環、冷凍循環、混合氣、化學反應。
description.en: Prerequisite: Consent of InstructorThermodynamic Properties of Substance, Energy Forms, The First Law Thermodynamics, The Second Law of Thermodynamics, Irreversibility & Availability, Power Cycle, Refrigeration Systems, Mixtures, and Chemical Reactions.

description.zh: 常微分方程式、線性常微分方程式、拉普拉氏轉換、級數及傅立葉級數、線性代數及矩陣、積分定理。常微分方程式、線性常微分方程式。
description.en: Ordinary Differential Equations, Laplace Transforms, Power Series, Linear Algebra, and Matrices.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。半導體元件、整流電路、電晶體和電路、運算放大器、線性積體電路、邏輯元件、數位電路、數位積體電路、微處理器、放大器等。
description.en: Semiconduction Device, Rectifier circuit, Transistor Circuit, Operational Amplifier, Linear Integrated Circuit, logic Device, Digital Circuit, Digital Integrated Circuit, Micro Processor, Amplifier, etc.

description.zh: CAD套裝軟體介紹、CAD數值技巧、二維畫圖、三維畫圖、曲面模型、實體模型建立、動畫之製作、最佳化設計、整合性之CAD系統及專題。
description.en: Introduction of CAD software package. Review of Numerical technique for CAD.2-D Graphics, 3-D Graphics, surface modeling, solid modeling. Design optimization, Integrated CAD systems and Animation project.

Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh: 本軍訓課程分四學期，大一上學期為軍訓（一）零學分，概述如下：戰爭概論－－使學生了解戰爭的涵義與指導要領，藉以體認「好戰必亡，忘戰必危」的真義，以樹立國防共識，維護國家安全，並增進對國家生存、民族發展的必勝信念。陸軍概要－－使學生了解我國陸軍之沿革、使命、特性、組織體系、教育訓練、情報、作戰、後勤及未來發展，增進對陸軍之認識。
description.en: The military training courses comprise four semesters. During the first semester, there are two subjects which are the War Conception and the Introduction of Army. The War Conception is designed to make student understand the definition of War and the guidelines of the War. By knowing the War, we can realize that the bellicose must lead to destruction, while the ignorant lead to risk, and build the consensus that the National Defense and security is crucial to National survival and development. The introduction of Army is designed to make student understand the army's history, task, character, origination, intelligence, operation, logistics and the future development.

description.zh: 孫中山先生創立中華民國之立國精神在於三民主義之自由平等、民主、均富，此精神也就是依據的原則。本課程以中華民國憲法為經，　國父建國之理想步驟為緯，俾使學生充分瞭解我國之立國精神所在，並認識我國憲法的精神及內涵，培養學生維護憲法之尊嚴，以及愛國家愛民族之情操。
description.en: The Republic of China is established by Dr. Sun Yat-sen on the basis of Equality, Democracy, and Equated Distribution of Wealth, which are also the principles in San-Ming-Zhu-Yi (literally, Three Principles of the People). This course is made up of two focuses: the Constitution of the Republic of China and the ideal approaches which lead to the establishment of the very nation to the purpose that the students would realize the constitutional spirit and the underlying meaning, so as to cultivate a patriotic love for the country and its people.

description.zh: 一學期兩學分兩小時，共三學期六學分。每學期開授七門課，學生可從中任選一門修讀。不得重複修讀同一課程。三學期共需修畢三個不同的課目。每班選修以四十二人為限。內容包含：禮記、論語、先秦諸子選讀、朱熹學術思想、傳習錄、史記選讀、世說新語的人物、先秦寓言、詩經、駢文選讀、李杜詩、蘇東坡詩欣賞、孟子、荀子、現代詩、蘇辛詞、莊子、韓非子、六祖壇經、左傳、陶淵明及其作品、唐近體詩選讀、李商隱詩、山海經、唐宋元民間文學、志怪小說選讀、菜根譚與幽夢影、書法名作選讀。禮記－中國古代禮制文明(Ａ)論語(Ｂ)先秦諸子選讀(Ｃ)朱熹學術思想(Ｄ)傳習錄()史記選讀
description.en: For this course, there will be 2 credits for each of three semesters.  Students are required to choose one from the seven subjects offered in each semester.  Selective readings included Book of Rites, Analects of Confucius, and Pre-Chin Works.

description.zh: 本課程設計重點有三：(1)藉由精選的中級程度教材加強學生必備的基礎文法觀念和句型結構；(2)使學生確切把握閱讀要領以及充分瞭解寫作的各種技巧，重心在生字、片語、句法的解釋和基本寫作技巧的分析；(3)透過練習加強聽、說、讀、寫的知能及表達。
description.en: This course is designed (1) to strengthen students' previously required knowledge in English with basic grammatical ideas and sentence patterns reviewed through selected materials at intermediate level; (2) to get the most (gist) out of the reading and appreciate the writing strategy of diverse interests. Focuses will be on explanation of difficult words, phrases, and syntax, as well as on analysis of fostering a basic writing skill; (3) to reinforce the competence and performance of listening, speaking, reading and writing by practice.

description.zh: 本課程以與學生日常生活相關的情境為主題，協助學生建立自然、流利的英語溝通技巧。語程側重訓練學生下列語言能力；(1)重音、縮音、連音、及語調等發音基礎訓練；(2)聆聽大意及特定資訊之能力；(3)熟悉英語人士日常生活情境及與學生將來就業環境相關之會話及適當之應對方式。本課程使用語言教室視聽器材實施教學。除聆聽錄音教材、配對練習、角色扮演、演說、表演短劇、及小組討論外，並佐以錄影教材，以加強實際演練與師生互動。
description.en: This training is designated to help students establishcommunicative skills through natural and authentic English,contextualized in lively, interesting situations related tostudents' immediate needs. Special focuses will be on(1) listening for main ideas and for specific information;(2) pronunciation exercises targeted at important featuresof English, such as stress, rhythm, intonation, reduction,and linking sounds; (3) conversational fluency providingstudents with a wide range of useful conversationalexpressions.  Classes will be conducted in the language labs,and students will be expected to participate in classdiscussions, oral drills after listening to tapes and watching videos.  Lots of interaction with other students either in pairs or in small or large group activities will be emphasized.

description.zh: 本課程希望在一學年中，能使學生對微分及積分有充分的瞭解、培養邏輯推理、啟發思考創造、強化計算演繹並注重應用與作圖，以建立同學未來學習工程數學及相關專業課程之數學基礎，充分達到學以致用的目的。課程內容包括：1.極限與連續，2.導數及其應用，3.不定積分與定積分，4.超越函數及其反函數，5.積分法則，6.不定型與瑕積分，7.定積分的應用，8.空間幾何與向量微積分，9.偏導數，10.重積分，11.級數。
description.en: This course aims at developing comprehension of Derivation and Integral、activating capabilities of Logic Inference and Induction、enlightening confidence and independence、strengthening calculating abilities with an emphasis on its application and diagram、furnishing a sound basis for future specialty. The content includes: 1.Limits and Continuity, 2.Derivative and Application, 3.Indefinite and Definite Integral, 4.Transcendental Functions and their Inverses, 5.Techniques of Integration, 6.Indeterminate Forms and Improper Integral, 7.Application of Integration, 8.Basic Vector Analysis, 9.Partial Derivative, 10.Multiple Integration, 11.Infinite Series.

description.zh: 本校之普通物理課程專為工程科系背景之同學設計，主要的目的是鼓勵同學參與大自然運行奧秘、法則之探索，並供給爾後修習專業課程之堅實基礎。本課程之內容包含力學、熱力學、聲學、電磁學、光學及近代物理。教授者可按每週三小時、二個學期的時間設計、再參酌各系不同之需求、加強或節略某些章節。
description.en: The course is designed for the students with engineering background. The theme of this course is to encourage students to participate in the discovery of laws and wonder of nature, and to solidate the foundation for the particular courses of study for different departments. The contents of this course include mechanics, dynamics, thermodynamics, electromagnetics, optics, and foundation of modern physics, etc.. The lecturers will emphasize or abridge certain contents based on the individual needs of departments. For this course, there will be 3 credits for each of two semesters,  and 3 lecture hours per week.

description.zh: 銜接工程圖學及基本幾何學的觀念，以繪製機械之零件圖、立體圖、剖面圖與組合圖，並能正確的標註尺度、表面加工符號及公差與配合。
description.en: Connecting the fundamental Engineering graphics and the geometrical drawing technology to mechanical parts and assembly drawings with emphasizes on mastering the intersections and development theorem, Steel Structures, Hydraulic and Fluid Systems and Related Mechanical Drawing.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。依所欠專長及發展專題需要選項實習，每學期以兩項為原則，項次含：1.機工實習：車床、銑床、刨床、磨床、鉗工等。2.鑄鍛實習：鑄造或鍛造等。3.焊接實習：鈑金及氣焊、電弧焊實習。
description.en: Prerequisite: Consent of InstructorContents: (1) Machining Shop5          (2) Casting or Forging Shop          (3) Welding ShopStudents, depending on their own specialties and interests, shall choose at least two categories in one semester.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意第一部份（電工原理）：電路元件、直流電阻電路、直流電容電路、電磁感應、直流電感   電路、直流電機、交流電路、變壓器、三相交流、三相感應電動機、單相感應電動機、同步電動機、電工儀表設備。第二部分（電工實驗）：三用電表量測、電磁開關啟動法、電動機之順序控制、RC電路之量測、感應電動機之Ｙ－△降壓啟動法、直流馬達與直流發電機、、繞線式感應馬達、直流伺服馬達速度及位置控制、變頻器與感應馬達速度控制。
description.en: Prerequisite: Consent of InstructorPart I (Electrical Engineering Principles):Circuit components, DC resistance circuit, DC capacitor circuit, Electro-magnet induction, DC inductor circuit, DC electric machines, AC circuit, Transformers, Three-phase AC, Three-phase induction motors, Single-phase induction motors, Synchronous motors, Electrical instrument and meters.Part II (Electrical Engineering Lab.):Multi-meter measurement, Magnetic switch starting, Sequential control of motor, Measurement of RC circuit, Ｙ-△ Starting of induction motor, DC Motor and DC generator, Wound induction motor, Speed and position control of DC servo motor, Inverter and speed control of induction motor.

description.zh: 先修課程：無。計算機之硬體基本架構及週邊設備、計算機程式設計架構、運算法則、流程圖、輔助記憶體、Windows簡介、中文輸入、輸等方式、數據通訊與網路、PC結構、BASIC語言等。
description.en: Prerequisite: NoneHardware and Peripheral Equipment of a Computer, Introduction to MS-DOS And operation systems, Input/Output of Chinese Character, BASIC Language, Algorithm and Flow Chart for Programming, Data Communication and Network.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.en: Prerequisite: Consent of InstructorPart I (Electrical Engineering Principles):Circuit components, DC resistance circuit, DC capacitor circuit, Electro-magnet induction, DC inductor circuit, DC electric machines, AC circuit, Transformers, Three-phase AC, Three-phase induction motors, Single-phase induction motors, Synchronous motors, Electrical instrument and meters.Part II (Electrical Engineering Lab.):Multi-meter measurement, Magnetic switch starting, Sequential control of motor, Measurement of RC circuit, Ｙ-△ Starting of induction motor, DC Motor and DC generator, Wound induction motor, Speed and position control of DC servo motor, Inverter and speed control of induction motor.

description.zh: 先修課程：無。計算機之硬體基本架構及週邊設備、計算機程式設計架構、運算法則、流程圖、輔助記憶體、Windows簡介、中文輸入、輸等方式、數據通訊與網路、PC結構、BASIC語言等。
description.en: Prerequisite: NoneHardware and Peripheral Equipment of a Computer, Introduction to MS-DOS And operation systems, Input/Output of Chinese Character, BASIC Language, Algorithm and Flow Chart for Programming, Data Communication and Network.

description.zh: 直流機數學模式與分析，直流機控制器設計，感應機數學模式與分析，感應機控制器設計，同步機數學模式與分析，同步機控制器設計。
description.en: mathematical models of DC machines,controller design ofDC machines,mathematical models of induction motors,driversdesign of induction motors ,controller design of induction motors ,mathematical models of synchronous machines,controller design of synchronous machines.

description.zh: 各種時域響應之電腦繪圖，矩陣各項特性分析與應用，根值軌跡圖，波德圖，奈奎士圖，PID控制器之設計，Lead-Lag補償器之設計，控制器時域及頻域分析，控制器在狀態空間之設計，實例探討，書報研讀。
description.en: Course Title:Automatic Control PracticeDescription:This course is first to introduce the basic concepts ofcontrol systems and the mathematical background, second, state thetransfer function, block diagram and signal  flow graph, third,discuss the mathematical modeling of control systems and elements, andforth, describe the time-domain analysis, root locus techniques andfrequency-domain of control systems, and then to measure the characterof control systems, Finally, the design of control system will beintroduced.

description.zh: 一、電腦網路概述二、Internet三、TANET BBS四、Gopher五、Unix介紹六、Unix指令七、Mail八、Ftp九、News、WWW十、Novell Netware
description.en: 1.TANet BBS2.NCSA Telnet3.UNIX Concepts, Commands4.Mail, News5.Ptp, Archie6.other Internet resources7.Network hardware8.Drivers, Network protocol9.LAN10.Dial up service

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh: 提供本校四技學生在本行以外，對其他領域的認識，以彌補其只鑽研專業課程的偏頗，訓練學生整合知識，使不致在知識爆炸的時代中迷失，促進各種專材的溝通，培養共識；培育人文素養，啟發人文關懷，使具有完整的人生觀。
description.en: This course offers a good opportunity for four-year college students in this university to have an easier access to a completely different field of knowledge, in the hope that  students can add their individual professional knowledge and broaden their minds. The students will be furnished with integrated knowledge, discovering a better way towards professional communication, developing more common sense and never losing themselves in this information-explosive age. With a solid basis on humanity and liberal ideology, they are sure to find a more complete picture of human life.

description.zh: 通論，基本理論，傳輸線參數，傳輸線的數學模式，變壓器的數學模式及標么值系統，對稱成分，對稱三相故障，非對稱故障，負載潮流分析與控制，電力系統之經濟運轉，發電機之數學模式，電力系統穩定度，電壓控制系統，電力控制系統，系統保護。
description.en: Introduction, Basic principles, Transmission line parameters, Line model, power flow analysis, optimal dispatch of generation

description.zh: 本課程之教學目標在使學生瞭解信號與系統之基本概念及分析方法，以作為控制，通訊，電子電路，濾波器設計及數位信號處理等課程修習之基礎。課程內容包含：(1)標準訊號及訊號表示法 (2)連續系統的數學分析 (3)離散系統的數學分析 (4)拉氏轉換分析 (5)Z-轉換分析 (6)傅立葉分析 (7)工程應用。
description.en: course title : signals and systemsdescription : this course contains the properties of signals , systems , LTI systems , and basis linear transforms . this is a basic course in the field of control and communication .

description.zh: (1)向量分析 (2)靜電場理論：庫倫，高斯定律，電位能，電場能量與功，介電質電場現象，電容 (3)拉普拉斯方程式，電像法、邊界值問題 (4)靜磁場理論：畢沙瓦特，安培定律，磁位能，磁場能量與功，強磁性材料特性電感 (5)電磁感應與馬克斯威爾方程式。
description.en: Course Title:ElectromagnetismDescription:This is an introductory course of electromagnetic bias onits Engineering applications. The course is divided into five parts(1) the static electric field, (2) the steady electric current, (3)the static magnetic field, (4) the quari-stationary electromagneticfield and, (5) Maxwell equations and their applications.Besides, the course also introduces some of the optical technology.

description.zh: 探討各種電機特性及工作原理，內容包含：(1)磁路分析(2)電機-機械能量轉換 (3)繞組及氣隙磁動勢 (4)繞組電感及電壓方程式 (5)繞組因數 (6)直流機 (7)感應機 (8)同步機。
description.en: Course Title:Electric MachineryDescription:Principles, Construction and Application of transformer,DC motors, DC generators, induction motors, induction generators,synchronous motors and synchronous generators.

description.zh: 實驗室設備與儀器介紹，步進馬達實驗，直流伺服馬達實驗，動力計實驗（EC&DC），感應電動機變頻特性實驗，變壓器類應用（Slidac，IVR等特性），同步機滑差實驗，固態華德黎翁那式速率控制特性，電機參數測量與模擬。
description.en: Course Title:Electrical Machinery Lab.Description:This course offers the students an experience in the fieldof electric machinery. It includes no-load characteristic test, torquemeasurement and parallel operation of generators, etc.

description.zh: 最佳化組合邏輯之演算法，可規劃邏輯元件，組合邏輯之VLSI設計，使用MSI與標準電路元件設計多層邏輯，使用閘陣列設計，循序邏輯之元件，循序邏輯之分析與合成，VLSI之設計與測試技巧，各種CALD軟體工具介紹。
description.en: 1.Algorithms for Optimization of combirational logic2.VLSI realizations of combination logic3.Multilevel logic using complex parts and cells.4.Components of sequential systems5.Synthesis of clock-mode sequential circuits.

description.zh: (1)作業系統簡介 (2)工作觀念之介紹：異步及平行程式處理(3)記憶體管理：實際及虛擬記憶體之管理 (4)處理機管理：工作排序及多元處理 (5)輔助儲存體之管理：磁碟排序，檔案及資料庫 (6)網路作業系統及安全性(含分散式資料處理)(7)範例研究：DOS，UNIX Windows NT。
description.en: 1.History and evolution 2.Process concepts3.ASynchronous concurrent processes4.Desdlock and indefinite postponrmrnt5.Real storage management6.Virtual storage organization and management 7.Processor scheduling 8.Disk mansgement9.Network and security

description.zh: 簡介，二極體電路，雙極性電晶體電路，低頻小信號放大器，場效電晶體電路，功率放大器，回授放大器，差動放大器，多級放大器，運算放大器，頻率響應分析與設計，振盪器及濾波器分析與設計，固態半導體理論。
description.en: Course Title:Linear ElectronicsDescription:This course is to study the characteristics of thesemiconductor devices and design of the electronic circuits.

description.zh: 簡介，感測器，基本驅動器，順序及計時控制，PLC，伺服驅動器及放大器，基本伺服控制系統。
description.en: Course Title:Mechatronics PracticeDescription:To familiarize students with the usage of mechatronictechniques and corresponding parts/components

description.zh: 本課程以與學生日常生活相關的情境為主題，協助學生建立自然、流利的英語溝通技巧。語程側重訓練學生下列語言能力；(1)重音、縮音、連音、及語調等發音基礎訓練；(2)聆聽大意及特定資訊之能力；(3)熟悉英語人士日常生活情境及與學生將來就業環境相關之會話及適當之應對方式。本課程使用語言教室視聽器材實施教學。除聆聽錄音教材、配對練習、角色扮演、演說、表演短劇、及小組討論外，並佐以錄影教材，以加強實際演練與師生互動。
description.en: This training is designated to help students establishcommunicative skills through natural and authentic English,contextualized in lively, interesting situations related tostudents' immediate needs. Special focuses will be on(1) listening for main ideas and for specific information;(2) pronunciation exercises targeted at important featuresof English, such as stress, rhythm, intonation, reduction,and linking sounds; (3) conversational fluency providingstudents with a wide range of useful conversationalexpressions.  Classes will be conducted in the language labs,and students will be expected to participate in classdiscussions, oral drills after listening to tapes and watching videos.  Lots of interaction with other students either in pairs or in small or large group activities will be emphasized.

description.zh: 本課程承續學生一年級的英文基礎，提供學生更多閱讀機會，並加強閱讀策略指導，以培養學生獨立閱讀、及使用適當英文表達之能力。教材以介紹英語地區文化、思想、及價值觀為主，以協助學生建立世界觀，並培養其批判思考能力。教學活動以團體討論、小組討論、段落與短文習作實施。
description.en: The objective of this course are: (1)to provide the students with abundant reading opportunities based on the students' levels;(2)to introduce various reading strategies to the students so that they may find the optimal strategies to help themselves read independently; and (3)to furnish students with competence in writing. Reading selections will be mainly focused on discussion of the cultures, thoughts and values of the English-speaking world. Students will be able to join activities which encompasses group discussion, small group discussion, paragraph writing and essay writing.

description.zh: 本課程的設計以歷史趨勢的闡述及專題研究分析二方面同時進行。內容包括民族、社會、文化精神，中國歷代政治得失之分析，中國農業經濟之特性，歷代考選、財賦、土地制度之變遷。授課方式以口頭講述為主，討論及書面報告為輔，期使學生除通盤瞭解中國歷史精神與特性外，並能具有獨立分析問題之能力。
description.en: This course is comprised of two parts: introduction to the development of the Chinese history and studies on special topics of Chinese history.  Major topics includes ethnical, social, and cultural problems; the advantages and disadvantages of the political policies of different dynasties; the characteristics of the agricultural economy in the history of China; the evolution of civil service examination systems, of financial structures, and of land policies.  Class activities include lectures and discussions.  Students are also expected to make oral and written reports so that they may have not only a comprehensive understanding of the essence of Chinese history, but also the ability of independent thinking and analysis.

description.zh: 提供本校四技學生在本行以外，對其他領域的認識，以彌補其只鑽研專業課程的偏頗，訓練學生整合知識，使不致在知識爆炸的時代中迷失，促進各種專材的溝通，培養共識；培育人文素養，啟發人文關懷，使具有完整的人生觀。
description.en: This course offers a good opportunity for four-year college students in this university to have an easier access to a completely different field of knowledge, in the hope that  students can add their individual professional knowledge and broaden their minds. The students will be furnished with integrated knowledge, discovering a better way towards professional communication, developing more common sense and never losing themselves in this information-explosive age. With a solid basis on humanity and liberal ideology, they are sure to find a more complete picture of human life.

description.zh: 大二上學期為軍訓（三）兩學分選修，在下列三單元中選擇兩者，概述如下：孫子兵法－－使學生了解我國固有兵學思想、戰爭原理、原則及戰爭指導藝術，啟發學生對兵學研究之興趣，增進軍事修養，建立全民國防共識，以維護國家安全。國防科技－－使學生對武器及武器系統與目前世界各國所發展使用的新式武器能作有系統的認識，並對我國獨立自主的國防科技發展成就有所了解，以啟發青年學生參與國防科技研究的興趣。護理與健康－－概述同大一女生部份。國防科技－－使學生對武器及武器系統與目前世界各國所發展使用的新式武器能作有系統的認識，並對我國獨立自主的國防科技發展成就有所了解，以啟發青年學生參與國防科技研究的興趣。護理與健康－－概述同大一女生部份。
description.en: Military Training includes three Courses at the first semester of second year. They are Sun Tzu's Art of War, National Defense Technology, Nursing and Health. Sophomores can choice any two of tem. Sun Tzu's Art of War introduces you into new area of thought of war. National Defense Technology affords you a thorough and systematic knowledge of world's high technology weapons. Nursing and Health is a course of teaching you how to take cares your own body and mind.

description.zh: 集總電路和克希荷夫定律（KCL,KVL），電路元件，串、並聯電路，一階電路，二階電路，線性非時變電路分析，相量及弦波穩態分析，耦合元件和電路，多相電路，複數頻率，頻率響應，狀態變數法，雙埠網路，PSPICE，傅式分析及轉換，拉式轉換。
description.en: Lumped Circuits,KCL,KVL,Circuit elements,series & parallelcircuits,the RL&RC circuit,linear time-invarient circuitanalysis,the phasor concept & SSS analysis,magnetically coupled circuits,polyphase circuits,complex frequency, frequency response,state-variable analysis,two-port circuitsPSPICE,Fourier analysis & transforms,Laplace transforms

description.zh: (1)電腦數字系統 (2)8088系列組合語言 (3)8088系統接線、時序、及故障排除 (4)8088中斷及中斷應用 (5)數位介面 (6)各種記憶體 (7)DMA資料傳輸。
description.en: Course Title:MicroprocessorDescription:This course introduces the working principles of computer.It puts emphasis on both hardware and software, as well as both theoryand appplication. Basically, this course covers the introduction ofgeneral microprocessors:their architecture and operation, Assemblylanguage program and module program, instruction addressing mode,instruction operation, and I/O Program and interface. Morespecifically, multi-programming configuration and multi-processingconfiguration are also discussed here. New topics will be added ifneeded.

Course Title:MicroprocessorDescription:This course introduces the working principles of computer.It puts emphasis on both hardware and software, as well as both theoryand appplication. Basically, this course covers the introduction ofgeneral microprocessors:their architecture and operation, Assemblylanguage program and module program, instruction addressing mode,instruction operation, and I/O Program and interface. Morespecifically, multi-programming configuration and multi-processingconfiguration are also discussed here. New topics will be added ifneeded.

description.zh: 基本儀器介紹；電子零件之認識；二極體電路（特性）；運算放大器；電晶體電路（特性）；A/D ，D/A 轉換器；類比乘法器。運算放大器應用；線性電壓調整器；電壓參考及電流源；電壓比較器；電壓控制振盪器；鎖相迴路；頻率－電壓轉換器；類比－數位轉換器；數位－類比轉換器；特殊裝置語言合成電路。
description.en: Course Title:Electronics and Electronics Lab.Description:The properties of semiconductor and fabrication of a PNdiode and BJT, and their characteristics are explained. Part 2concentrates on analog circuit and system. Method of biasing adiscrete BJT or EET are given, and stability of the operating point isdiscussed. The small-signal model for each device is abstained and usedto calculate the performance of low frequency single stage andcascaded amplifiers. The feedback concepts of AMP. OP AMP, itscharacteristics and applications are described.

description.zh: 本課程將介紹工程上、物理上系統解析的相關數學工具，內容包括五大項：一 常微分方程式：一階，二階，及高階常微分方程，拉譜拉斯轉換，   特殊函數。二 向量幾何與分析：矩陣行列式及特徵問題。三 傅立葉級數，積分及轉換。四 偏微分方程及邊界值問題。五 複變分析及映射轉換。
description.en: This course intends to inbtroduce the mathematical principles and practices that today's engineers need to know. The course contents are 1. Ordinary Differential Eqs: 1st order, 2nd order and higher    order ODEs. Laplace transform, special function.2. Vector Algebra and Vector Analysis: Matrixs and    Determinants, Eigenvalve problems.3. Fourier Series, Integral and Transforms.4. Partial Differential Equations and Boundary Value    Problems.5. Complex Analysis: complex Integration, conformal mapping    and Applications.

description.zh: 線性電路；電算放大器；二極體；非線性電路應用；接面場效電晶體（JFET）；金屬氧化物半導體場效電晶體(MOSFET)；雙極性接面電晶體（BJT）；差動放大器；多級放大器。金氧半電晶體；雙接面電晶體；差動及多極放大器；功率放大器；頻率響應；回授；類比積體電路；濾波器；調諧放大器；振盪器。

description.zh: 1. 程式語言類別2. 物件導向與資料抽象化3. 類別與方法4. 訊息，實例與初始化5. 繼承6. 靜態與動態繫結7. 多型性8. 發展環境及工具9. 物件導向程式語言C++,Java,Smalltake簡介10.應用實例
description.en: 1. Programming Language Paradigms2. Object-Orientation and Data Abstraction3. Classes and Methods4. Messages,Instances,and Initialization5. Inheritance6. Static and Dynamic Binding7. Polymorphism8. Environment and Tools9. Introduction to C++,Java,and Smalltalk10.Case Study

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.
