Classes will be conducted in the language labs,and students will be expected to participate in classdiscussions, oral drills after listening to tapes and watching videos.  Lots of interaction with other students either in pairs or in small or large group activities will be emphasized.

description.zh: 本課程希望在一學年中，能使學生對微分及積分有充分的瞭解、培養邏輯推理、啟發思考創造、強化計算演繹並注重應用與作圖，以建立同學未來學習工程數學及相關專業課程之數學基礎，充分達到學以致用的目的。課程內容包括：1.極限與連續，2.導數及其應用，3.不定積分與定積分，4.超越函數及其反函數，5.積分法則，6.不定型與瑕積分，7.定積分的應用，8.空間幾何與向量微積分，9.偏導數，10.重積分，11.級數，12.常微分方程。
description.en: This course aims at developing comprehension of Derivation and Integral、activating capabilities of Logic Inference and Induction、enlightening confidence and independence、strengthening calculating abilities with an emphasis on its application and diagram、furnishing a sound basis for future specialty. The content includes : 1.Limits and Continuity, 2.Derivative and Application, 3.Indefinite and Definite Integral, 4.Transcendental Functions and their Inverses, 5.Techniques of Integration, 6.Indeterminate Forms and Improper Integral, 7.Application of Integration, 8.Basic Vector Analysis, 9.Partial Derivative, 10.Multiple Integration, 11.Infinite Series, 12.Ordinary Differential Equation.

description.zh: 本校之普通物理課程專為工程科系背景之同學設計，主要的目的是鼓勵同學參與大自然運行奧秘、法則之探索，並供給爾後修習專業課程之堅實基礎。本課程之內容包含力學、熱力學、聲學、電磁學、光學及近代物理。教授者可按每週三小時、二個學期的時間設計、再參酌各系不同之需求、加強或節略某些章節。
description.en: The course is designed for the students with engineering background. The theme of this course is to encourage students to participate in the discovery of laws and wonder of nature, and to solidate the foundation for the particular courses of study for different departments. The contents of this course include mechanics, dynamics, thermodynamics, electromagnetics, optics, and foundation of modern physics, etc.. The lecturers will emphasize or abridge certain contents based on the individual needs of departments. For this course, there will be 3 credits for each of two semesters,  and 3 lecture hours per week.

description.zh: 本課程的目的是為了：1.驗證物理理論之真實性，2.培養同學認真的科學態度與方法，3.培養同學數據處理的能力，4.啟發同學自行設計解決量度問題的方法。課程之施行分為上下兩學期，每一學期為一學分三小時。上學期的內容偏重力學、波動、熱力、流力之實驗，下學期的內容則偏重電磁、光學、近物之實驗。
description.en: In this course there will be 1 credit for each of two semesters, and 3 laboraborial hours per week. The first semester experiments involve mechanics, dynamics, thermodynamics, and waves, etc.. The second semester experiments contains electromagnetics, optics, and modern physics, etc.. The purposes of this course are 1: to identify the physical laws, 2:to cultivate the ability of data reduction of students, 4: to instruct the students solving the problems of measurements of measurements by self-designments.

description.zh: 內容包括各種能量形式、能源轉換、物質之熱力性質、熱力學第一、第二定律、各種動力循環以及冷凍循環。
description.en: To provide students with the concepts and abilities of analyzing energy forms, energy transformation, properties of substance, first law & second law of thermodynamics, power cycles, refrigeration cycles and heat pump cycles.

description.zh: DOS命令，物件導向程式語言Turbo C++整合發展環境，條件與迴圈，陣列與指標，函數，結構，類別與物件，檔案，溢載及繼承關係，文字視窗的應用，繪圖的應用，資料處理的應用，資料結構的應用，數位信號處理的應用，數值分析的應用。
description.en: The course intends to have students to be familiar with computer language programming. It also introduces different computer languages with the purpose of developing student's capability of designing a complete program.

description.zh: 本課程將從基本空調相關之冷媒化學理論入門，藉由各種冷媒系統之氣、液相臨界溫度、壓力與比容積等性質，各純物質成份與混合物之熱力學性質、蒸氣壓與相變化焓值，標準自由能形成，熱容、表面張力、黏度、熱傳導、擴散係數以及相平衡等因素，探討比較各別冷煤系統化學上之外延及內含性質。此外亦配合相關課程進行實驗操作，加深學習效果。
description.en: This course presents a critical review of various estimation procedures for a limited number of properties of gases and liquids: Critical and other pure component properties, PVT and thermodynamic properties of pure components and mixtures, vapor pressures, and phase-change enthalpies, standard enthalpies of formation, standard gibbs energies, thermal conductivity, diffusion coefficients, and phase equilibrium. Comparison of experimental and estimated values are normal shown in tables to indicate reliability.

description.zh: 教授立體三維空間的投影觀念、幾何學製圖方法，訓練繪製草圖、各種物件之三視圖、零件／組合圖及各式剖面變位圖之能力；並能正確標註尺寸及加工表面符號，公差與配合。並且熟悉交線展開之原理，使具備繪製各式管路、鋼架、氣油壓及機械設備之相關標準工程圖的能力。
description.en: Instructing the concepts of orthographic projection of 3D space and the methods of geometry graphics. Training the skills to raw sketch, various 3D views, parts/assembly drawings and cross-sectional views. Learning to mark dimensions, manufacturing surface symbols tolerance and fittings correctly. This lesson also demands students to able to be familiarize the intersections and development theorem in order to draw the steel structures, hydraulic and fluid systems, and related mechanical devices as the standard engineering drawings.

description.zh: 認識通俗科技文章及科技學術論文語法、文體、結構組織等特質，並探討技術報告及論文撰寫方式。
description.en: This course helps the learners recognize the syntax, style, and organization as far as the papers on technology and technical writings are concerned. Discussions include specific ways to technical presentation and technical writings.

description.zh: 1. 交流電機模型2. 磁場導向控制3. 電流型變頻器控制4. 電壓型變頻器控制5. 控制器參數調整6. 交流電機轉速估測
description.en: 1. MODELLING OF AC DRIVES2. VECTOR CONTROL OF AC DRIVES3. CURRENT SOURCE INVERTER CONTROL4. VOLTAGE SOUR INVERTER CONTROL5. PARAMETER TUNING OF CONTROLLER6. SPEED ESTIMATION OF AC DRIVES

description.zh: 現代控制理論簡介、線性空間分析、狀態方程式及響應，可控制性及可觀測性、穩定性分析、狀態回授及估測、控制器設計及應用、觀測
description.en: Introduction of Modern Control Theory﹒Linear space Analysis , State equation and Response, Controllability and Observability , Stability Analysis, State Feedback and Estimation, Controller Design and Applications, Observer Design and Applications, Nonlinear systems, Time varying Systems, Applications of Modern Control theory.﹒

description.zh: 神經網路之簡介、直傳式神經網路、監督式學習、非監督式學習、回傳式神經網路、神經網路之結構分析、學習方式分析神經網路之應用。
description.en: Introduction to Networks, Feedback Neutral Networks ,Supervised Learning, Unsupervised Learning, Recurrant Neural Networks, Structure Analysis of Neural Networks, Analysis of Learning Methods, Applications of Neural Networks.

description.zh: 1. 電力系統品質項目與定義2. 電壓降與停電3. 電壓不平衡4. 電力諧波5. 頻率變動6. 電壓閃爍7. 暫態過壓8. 電力品質監控
description.en: 1. Terms and definitions of power systems quality2. Voltage sags and interruption3. Voltage unbalance4. Power harmonics5. Frequency deviation6. Voltage flicker7. Transient overvoltages8. Monitoring of power quality

name.zh: 計算機在電力系統之應用

description.zh: 1. 簡介2. 電力系統簡介3. MATLAB簡介4. 電力潮流分析5. 最佳化調度6. 電力系統故障之研究7. 電力系統穩定度分析
description.en: 1. Introduction2. Power system matrix3. Introduction to MATLAB4. Power flow studies5. optimal Dispatch6. Fault Studies7. Power system stability

description.zh: 1. 數位通訊系統簡介2. 隨機程序3. 數位調變與多工技術4. 最佳接收器5. 載波與符碼同步6. 消息理論7. 訊源編碼8. 通道編碼9. 展頻通訊系統10. 行動通訊系統
description.en: 1. Introduction 2. Random Processes3. Digital Modulation and Multiplexing4. Optimal Receiver5. Carrier and Symbol Synchronization6. Information Theory7. Source Coding 8. Channel Coding9. Spread Spectrum Systems10. Mobile Communication Systems

description.zh: 這門課程主要是介紹資料庫系統的理論與應用，內容包含有： 1. 資料庫系統的介紹與架構 2. ER 資料模式 3. 檔案儲存結構 4. 關連式資料模式 5. SQL 查詢語言 6. ER資料模式與關連式資料模式之間的轉換 7. 資料庫正規化 8. 最佳化查詢 9. 交易處理
description.en: This course provides introduction to both database system theory and application. These are the following : o 1. Database System Concepts and Architecture -2. Data Modeling Using the Entity-Relationship Model --3. Record Storage and Primary File Organizations -4. -The Relational Data Model -5. SQL -6. ER- and ERR-to Relational Mapping -7. Functional Dependencies and Normalization for Relational Databases -8. Query Processing and Optimization -9. Transaction Processing Concepts

description.zh: 1. 離散時間訊號與Z-轉換2. 取樣原理3. 離散傅式轉換與快速傅式轉換4. 數位濾波器系統設計5. 同位訊號處理6. 時變訊號處理-短時域傅式轉換7. 離散時間隨機程序8. 離訊與訊號估測
description.en: 1. Discrete-time signal and Z-transform 2. Sampling theorem 3. Discrete Fourier Transformer(DFT) and Fast Fourier Transformer(FFT) 4. Digital Filter Design5. Homomorphic Signal Processing 6. Time-varying signal Processing-short-term Fourier transformer 7. Discrete-time Random Process8. Noise and Signal

description.zh: 此課程在介紹 Robust Control 的理論基礎與其應用，其目的在使同學能具有分析不定參數系統之能力。 主要內容包括: 不定參數數學模式建立、線性分式轉換、Lyapunov 分析。此外，強健控制中常用的H∞ 控制及μ合成技術亦將在課程中介紹。
description.en: 1. Introduction.2. Mathematical preliminaries for robust control.3. Uncertainty modeling4. Lyapunov analysis5. H∞ control6. μ synthesis7.  Case studyThis is an advanced course designed for graduate students which will provide techniques that can help you to analyze linear systems with varying uncertainties. Concepts such as uncertainty, linear fractional transformation, and Lyapunov analysis are introduced in the course. In addition, the course also introduces the H∞ control and the μ synthesis techniques which are the main streams in the robust control.

name.zh: 電腦電話整合與網路通訊

description.zh: 實驗一: CTI卡之Install, 與撥接電話處理實驗二: 偵測電話按鍵, 做身份與密碼驗證實驗三: 電話答錄機設計實驗四: 網路電話設計, Phone to Phone架構, Speech Coding(u-Law PCM,64kbps)實驗五: 網路電話設計, 語音編碼(G.729, CS-ACELP, 8kbps)實驗六: 網路電話設計, 網路流量分析, (Speech Packet Loss/Delay 統計)實驗七: 網路電話設計, 聲音補償(聲音封包加序號碼, 以及UDP遺失補償)實驗八: CTI與Text-to-Speech系統整合實驗九: 透過電話界面之Email-Reader實驗十: 透過電話界面之即時新聞閱讀機實驗十一: CTI與Speech Recognition(有限字彙辨識)系統整合實驗十二: 透過電話界面之電話號碼查詢與回應
description.en: Exp.1: CTI H/W Install, Call In/Out ProcessExp.2: DTMF Detection, Exp.3: Automatic Record/Play MachineExp.4: I-Phone with Speech Coding(u-Law PCM,64kbps)Exp.5: I-Phone with Speech Coding(G.729, CS-ACELP, 8kbps)Exp.6: Internet Packet Traffic Analysis, (Speech Packet Loss/Delay Statistic)Exp.7: I-Phone with Speech Compensation(Sequence No. + Speech Recover)Exp.8: CTI-Based Text-to-SpeechExp.9: CTI-Based Email-ReaderExp.10: CTI-Based News ReaderExp.11: CTI-Based Speech RecognitionExp.12: IVR System Development

description.zh: 中文課程概述：類比IC簡介、運算放大器設計與補償、電流鏡與高性能運算放大器、比較器、取樣與閂鎖電路、電壓參考與傳輸線電路、切換電容電路、數位與類比轉換電路、超取樣交換器、濾波器與傳輸器、鎖相迴路等。預修課程 ：電子學
description.en: English Description General Induction，Basic Opamp Design and Compensation，Advanced Current Mirrors and OPamps，Comparators，Sample and Hold Circuits， Voltage References and Translinear Circuits，Transforms and Filters，Switch-capacitor circuits (1)，Switch-capacitor circuits (2) ，D/A and A/D Converters，Nyquist-rate D/A Converters，Nyquist-rate A/D Converters，Oversampling Converters，Filters and Transconductors，Phase-locked Loops (PLL) (1) ，Phase-locked Loops (PLL) (2)。

description.zh: (1)	網路的應用和服務，例如Web， E-Mail， Network File Server (NFS)， Domain Name Server (DNS)。(2)	利用Sockets 和 remote procedure call(RPC)機制來設計client-server computing。(3)	Internet通信協定的設計。(4)	TCP和UDP運作原理。(5)	RIP和OSPF路由通信協定運作原理。(6)	實體層的LAN和WAN。
description.en: This course aims to provide a comprehensive introduction to Internet technologies. Unlike traditional courses, it pursues a top-down approach to the topic, starting with the application layer and then describing the transport and network layers, finally covering the physical layer.Among others, this course describes in details the network applications such as Web and Email and network services such as file service provided by Network File Server (NFS) and directory service provided by Domain Name Server(DNS); the design and implementation of client-server computing using Sockets and remote procedure call(RPC) mechanisms; the architecture and design of communication protocols; the operations of the transport layer provided by TCP and UDP; the packet routing layer as provided by IP and routing mechanisms and protocols (RIP, BGP); the physical layer of LANs and media technologies (Ethernet, Token Ring, FDDI, bridging); the physical layer of WANs (modulation, multiplexing, T1) and emergi

description.zh: 本課程說明如何利用質量及動量守恆建立可以描述速度、應力及壓力等流體系統物理量間關係之統制方程式。其內容包括：線及角動量守衡、應力張量、平滑近似理論、非穩態流動、邊界層近似法、線性穩定度理論及紊流系統。
description.en: We will learn how fundamental principles such as conservation of mass and momentum lead to equations that govern or describe the interrelationships of velocity, stress, pressure, and so on. Content includes macroscopic balance for linear and angular momentum, the stress tensor, lubrication approximation, unsteady flow、the boundary layer approximation, linear stability theory, and turbulent flows.

description.zh: 基本熱傳機構，穩態與非穩態熱傳導其包括有內部熱源之系統。內部及外部之強制及自然對流。表面及氣體間之輻射。利用因次方法及邊界層來考量熱傳。
description.en: Basic heat transfers mechanisms. Steady and unsteady conduction, including system with internal heat sources. Internal and external forced and free convection. Radiation between surfaces and in gases. Dimensional and boundary layer consideration.

description.zh: 本課程內容包括以分子熱力學的觀點來推導狀態方程式與活性係數模式，及有關相平衡的應用，統計熱力學原理亦將一併介紹。
description.en: The contents of this course include deriving the equation of state and the activity coefficient model based on the viewpoint of molecular thermodynamics and its application in phase equilibrium, and the principles of statistical thermodynamics will be also introduced.

description.zh: 本課程之主要目的是介紹生物程序之必需知識給傳統化學工程，假定他們未具生物學的背。生物程序是應用工程原理，來設計，發展以及採用生物催化劑來解析程序。這些程序可得很多結果，諸如生產期望化合物或分解破壞不要的有害的物質。工程的工具，尤其化學工程將會成功拓展生物程序所必須。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to introduce the essential knowledges of bioprocessing to traditional chemical engineers. No background in biology is assumed. Biopocess engineering is the application of engineering principles to design, develop, and analyze process using biocatalysts. These processes may result in the production of desirable compounds or in the destruction of unwanted or hazardous substances. The touls of the engineer, particularly the chemical engineer will be essential to the successful exploitation of bioprocesses.

description.zh: 探討生物化學反應種類及其特性，主要代謝路徑；生物熱力學、生物動力學、酵素特性探討與酵素動力學，固定化技術、生物反應器之組裝、實驗設計、反應器內質傳、熱傳及流動型態解析；數學模式，電腦模擬及最適化；簡介反應器種類：好氧及厭氧反應器，其操作特性與應用。
description.en: Describes the classification and characteristics of biochemical reactions, major metabolic pathways; biochemical thermodynamics, biokinetics, immobilization technology, bioreactor construction, experimental design, mass transfer, heat transfer, and flow pattern; mathematical modeling, computer simulation, and optimization; the classification of reactors, aerobic and anaerobic, their operational characteristics and applications.

description.zh: 本課程旨在教導學生瞭解各類化工程序模式的建立以及其求解的方法。內容包括：輸送動態方程式之建立，線性、非線性、矩陣、微分方程等之轉換及求解。
description.en: The goal of process simulation is to develop numerical analysis techniques that allow students to simulate the behavior of a chemical process. The contents involving：the development of dynamic equations of transport, the transformations and solutions of linear, nonlinear matrix, and differential equations.

description.zh: 本課程綜合介紹電化學之原理，電化學程序和反應器之輸送理論、操作和設計，並介紹相關之電化學工業。
description.en: This course involves three parts: the comprehensive introduction to principles of electrochemistry,the transport theory, design and operation of electrochemical processes and reactors, and the related electrochemical industries.

description.zh: 本課程主要介紹生物無機化學，生物無機化學主要連貫生物學與無機化學。由無機化學與生物學的基本觀念開始介紹，課程內容包括生物學中的金屬離子化學及無機化學，及金屬離子在生命組織中的功用。也介紹各種不同的物理及化學方法對含金屬生物分子、過渡金屬錯合物及電子轉移化學的研究。
description.en: This course is focused on bioinorganic chemistry. Bioinorganic chemistry is the leading discipline at the interface of inorganic chemistry and biology.  This course begins with a brief review of the fundamental concepts in inorganic chemistry and biology.  The relationship between classical inorganic chemistry and the chemistry of metal ions in biology is introduced. Discussion are focused on the function and occurrence of essential metal ions in living organisms. An overview of the use of various physical and chemical methods available for the investigation of etal-containing biomolecules are presented. Studies of transition metal complexes and electron transfer chemistry are also covered.

name.zh: 半導體材料檢測技術及原理

description.zh: 本課程將探討半導體材料之表面化學性質之分析技巧、以及界面和分子間引力之量測方法、表面形態分析、晶相結構分析以及電磁性質量測之技術和其原理。並配合半導體旋轉塗佈機和濺鍍機所備製之薄膜﹐實際操作FTIR顯微鏡、原子力顯微鏡、微量材料流變儀。
description.en: This course will present the techniques and their corresponding theories on the surface property measurements including chemical information, stress analysis, morphology, crystalline structure and intermolecular forces between interfaces. The course also includes a practical training on the FTIR microscope, atomic force microscope, reology meter on the semiconductor materials.

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論。
description.en: Case Study. Seminar. Group meeting.

description.zh: 本課程在討論金屬與合金凝固之基本理論以及它的應用與控制,由熱流動,質量傳輸以及成核與晶体成長來討論凝固機制。
description.en: The course of solidification principles dealing with the fundamentals of metal and alloy solidification and how to relate these fundamentals to practice and control. Based upon the fundamentals of heat flow mass transport and nucleation crystal growth to discuss about solidification mechanisms. This course is suitable for senior-level and graduate students.

name.en: Topic of Powder Science and Technology

description.zh: 本課程主要是開設給已經修過"粉体工程"的學生，進階對粉体科學中粒子的物理與化學性質，成堆粉末的構造特性，力學、熱學、電學、光學等的性質，粉体群與流体間的運動現象與關係，以及粉粒的生成與消滅的過程與變化等做深入的說明，讓學生有更進一步對粉体的認識。
description.en: This course is a special topics of powder science and technology.

description.zh: 本課程將結合理論說明與示範實習，使同學對雷射基本原理及光電科技應用有一完整的認識，內容包括：1.光電工程概論，2.基礎光學，3.電射發光原理，4.雷射光的調製，5.光電科技應用概論。
description.en: This course is a special topics of Photo- Electronic Materials.

description.zh: 1.陶瓷絕緣體之性質2.陶瓷電容材料3.壓電及光電陶瓷4.磁性陶瓷5.陶瓷感應器：理論及實務6. ZnO變阻器之應用及特性7. 多層陶瓷技術8. 高電導陶瓷
description.en: This course is a special topics of Dielectrical Materials.

description.zh: 熱分析課程是闡述熱學基礎原理(熱力學,不可逆熱力學及動力學)以及其操作技巧;這包括:熱學.差示熱分析,熱量學,熱力學分析,熱膨脹以及熱失重分析。本課程適合大四及研一生。
description.en: The course of thermal analysis is described starting with its theories (thermodynamics, irreversible thermodynamics, and kinetics) and covering the basic techniques: thermometry, differential thermal analysis, calorimetry,thermo mechanical analysis and dilatometry, and thermogravimetry.This course is suitable for the senior undergraduate and beginning graduate students.

description.zh: 一、簡介二、固相反應法三、溶液合成法四、氣相反應法
description.en: This course is a special topics of Techniques of Synthesis Ceramics.

description.zh: 相圖及相變化熱力學,多元溶液及部份莫耳熱力學。以熱力學分析.設計及電腦模擬冶金方法。
description.en: The thermodynamics of phase diagrams and phase transformations. Solution thermodynamics of multi-compoment and partial molar properties. Applications of thermodynamics to the analysis, design and computer simulation of metallurgical processes.

description.zh: 超硬材料是一種越來越普及的新興材料。超硬材料可以作成精密加工工具及多種高價值產品。是提升一國競爭力不可或缺的尖端材料。超硬材料包括鑽石及立方氮化硼。本課程將介紹世界各國最先進製造超硬材料方法，包括超高壓技術及鑽石膜技術。而目前日新月異之超硬材料之發展及應用，亦作進一步介紹。
description.en: This course is to introduce the Hard materials.

description.zh: 本課程在討論生醫工程之性質與應用在整形外科,骨科和牙醫界。課程內容包括生醫工程之發展,牙醫材料之應用,複合材料在生醫工程之應用,生醫陶瓷,生醫材料之腐蝕機制以及生醫材料之工程問題。
description.en: The topics of this course include the engineering of bio-materials, and their applications in the orthopedic and dental fields. The course contains the development of biomaterials, the application of materialsfor dentistry and dental surgery, composite materials in biomedical engineering, bioceramics, corrosion mechanisms of metallic biomaterials and engineering problems associated with materials.

description.zh: 本課程針對固體廢棄物的來源及基本性質，分析並介紹各種固體廢棄物再生的技術與方法實例。
description.en: This class include the discussion of the origin of the solid waste and its basic physical and chemical properties that related to its recovery, recycling and reutilization.  The recovery methods and the follow-up process to recycle the solid waste will also be discussed.  Several practical case study will be included.

description.zh: 一、地質資料之收集分析與應用二、大地應力分析量測方法。三、地下坑室設計。四、地下坑室施工。五、監測與管理。
description.en: 一、Collection analysis and application of geological data二、Geotechnical stress analysis and measurement。三、Underground excavation design。四、Underground excavation operation。五、Monitoring and management。

description.zh: 討論有機化學與環境、浮選及再生技術等方面有關的部份。主要在使用到的有機化學藥劑，如介面活性劑。
description.en: The organic chemicals, such as surfactants, which are used for environmental, floatation, and recycle techniques will be discussed in this course.

name.zh: 機電整合特論及實驗(一)
name.en: Special Topics and Experiments of Mechatronic Engineering I

description.zh: 包括理論與實驗，由機電所教授共同開課。第一學期探討的內容主要在機電整合技術，側重在機電整合與創新設計相關之專業知識。
description.en: This course includes theories and experiments, is conducted by several professors of Institute of. Mechatronic Engineering. In first semester, topics covered are mainly in the field of Mechatronic, Automatic, Systematic, MENS, etc. emphasizing in professional knowledge of Mechanical Electrical integration.

description.zh: 偏微分方程式、變分法、張量分析、工程統計及積分方程式等工程分析用工具知識。
description.en: Partial Differential equation, Variation Principle, Tensor Analysis, Engineering Statistics and Integral equation.

description.zh: 機構、機械設計、古典動力學、熱力學第一定律及熱平衡、潤滑與摩擦、機械加工、機電系統匹配、機械負載等及實驗(作)。
description.en: Mechanism and Mechanical design, Classical Dynamics, Thermal Analysis, lubrication and wear, Mechatronic system design and practice.

description.zh: 電機機械、電力系統設計與匹配、電動機驅動與設計、光電原理等及實驗(作)。
description.en: Basic Electrical Engineering training for students with Mechanical Engineering major. The goal of this course is to get familiar with the building blocks of electrical systems in Mechatronic applications. Major topics include Electrical machines, Motor Drives, Power Amplifiers, Power Electronics, and OP-Amp related signal processing circuits. Lectures are given to illustrate the function of the each block in electrical systems. And then the students can conduct experiment to explore relevant circuits in order to obtain thorough understanding of their characteristics.

description.zh: 基礎流體力學原理及實驗、比例閥、伺服元件、電液元件及比較、伺服驅動器設計等實驗(作)。
description.en: A general background in fluid mechanic and use of mechanical laboratory machinery equipment. The course Hydrau-servo Systems introduces the varied aspects of Pneumatic and Hydraulic Servo System Servo and Proportional Valves, Electro-hydraulic Servo-valves, Electro-hydraulic Servomechanisms and Hydra-mechanical Servo-mechanisms. The course in programming is one third time of lectures and the other of laboratory practices.

description.zh: 精密傳動元件於各種製程設備與精密機械上之應用簡介；齒輪、凸輪、軸承、滾珠螺桿、與線性滑軌等精密傳動元件之設計與選用；精密傳動系統之摩擦、潤滑、與動態分析；精密傳動系統之運動控制。
description.en: Introduction to the applications of precision transmission elements in manufacturing equipments and precision machinery； Design and selection of precision transmission elements such as gear , cam , bearing, ball screw, linear guide, etc.； Friction , lubrication , and dynamic analysis of precision transmission systems； Motion control of  precision transmission systems.

description.zh: 專題報告專題演講 研究小組討論
description.en: Case Study.Seminar.Group meeting.

name.en: Design and Analysis of Computer Algorithms

description.zh: 1. 數學基礎   1.1 函數成長率之漸近性質   1.2 遞迴關係之解   1.3 數學歸納法2. 基本分析技巧   2.1 計算複雜度之上下限   2.2 最差情況分析及平均情況分析   2.3 動態平均分析3. 基本設計技巧   3.1 分擊法   3.2 貪婪法   3.3 動態規劃   3.4 隨機演算法4. 計算複雜度   4.1 資訊理論證明法   4.2 對抗式證明法   4.3 問題之線性轉換   4.4 完全NP
description.en: 1. Mathematical background   1.1 Asymptotic growth rate of functions   1.2 Solving recurrence relations   1.3 Mathematical induction2. Basic analysis techniques   2.1 Computational complexities -- lower bounds and upper bounds   2.2 Worst case analysis and average case analysis   2.3 Amortized analysis3. Basic Design Paradigms   3.1 Divide and conquer   3.2 Greedy methods   3.3 Dynamic programming   3.4 Probabilistic algorithms4. Computational Complexity   4.1 Information-theoretic arguments   4.2 Adversary arguments   4.3 Linear reduction of problems   4.4 NP-completeness

description.zh: 本課程主要介紹平行處理的理論﹑硬体技術及可擴充式平行計算機結構1. 平行理論:．平行計算機模型．程式及網路特性．系統性能計算2. 硬体技術．超能量處理器．ＶＬＩＷ架構．向量處理器．共享式記憶体架構．超管線處理器3. 平行計算機結構．多重處理器系統．多向量處理器及ＳＩＭＤ電腦．多線式處理器．資料流處理器架構
description.en: This course introduces the following topics of parallel processing:theory of parallelism ,Hardware technologies,and parallel Architecture.The detail for each topic is as follows:  1.Theory of parallelism  .parallel computer model   .program and Network properties  .principles of scalable performance2. Hardware technology .superscalar processor .VLIW Architecture .Vector processor .shared memory organization .superpipelined processor3. Parallel architecture .multiprocessor system .multivector and SIMD computers .multithread architecture Dataflow architecture

name.zh: 電腦輔助積體電路設計

description.zh: 本課程將給予學習者充分瞭解現代体電路設計技術如何產生矽晶片與應用在各種複雜電子系統上.課程內容如下所述:1.系統設計流程2.MOS電晶体理論3.IC制程技術4.電路效能評估5.CMOS電路與邏輯設計6.副系統設計7.期末專題計劃
description.en: The course dims to give an understanding of how integrated circuit technology is used today to implement complex electronic systems as silicon chips.Content in the course are:1.System Design Flow 2.MOS Transistor Theory3.Fnbrcation Process Technology4.Performance Estimation 5.CMOS circuit and Logic Designs6.Subsystem Design 7.Final Project

description.zh: 1.天線基礎2.長導線天線3.孔徑型天線4.陣列分析與合成5.自阻抗與互阻抗6.信號饋入結構
description.en: 1.Fundamental of antennas2.Long-wire antennas3.Aperture-type antennas4.Array analysis and synthesis5.Self-impedance and mutual-impedance6.Feeding structures

description.zh: 本課程再使學生瞭解灰色系統的理論及原理，進而培養學生能運用該灰色系統之理論於資訊系統，控制系統，影像處理，糢糊控制，類神經網路，醫學，工業，經濟及管理等領域之應用：課程內容包含：1.灰色系統介紹 2.灰色關聯度分析 3.灰色預測原理4.灰色建模 5.灰色系統的應用 6.實例學習
description.en: This course is introduced the principle and theory of grey ststem. Therefore, the student can be used the grey systemapplied to information sytem, control system, image processing,fuzzy control, neural network, medicine, industry,economy,and manaement,etc..The contents of this course is:1.The introduction of grey system 2.Grey relational analysis 3.the theory of grey prediction 4.the grey modeling 5.The application of grey system 6.Case study

description.zh: 1.展頻通訊簡介2.展頻序列之產生3.展頻行動通訊4.展頻多重進階通訊5.展頻通訊之同步技術6.展頻多重進階網路之容量與涵蓋範圍
