description.zh: 本課程係初級日文(一)、(二)的延續，再利用半年一學期的時間，繼續增強學生對日語的興趣，加強學生對日語的簡易聽、說、讀、寫的能力，增進認識日本及日語地區文化的特色，擴大國際視野。授課內容：日常生活之對話、童謠、歌曲及民俗文化等。
description.en: This is a continue course of Primary Japanese(I) and (Ⅱ). Students are expected to keep their interests in study Japanese language, further improve their communication skills, better understand Japanese culture, and become globalization. The course contains: daily conversation, folk songs, music and traditional culture of Japan.

description.zh: 本課程利用半年一學期的時間，培養學生學習德語的興趣，培養德語簡易聽、說、讀、寫的能力，增進認識德國及德語地區文化的特色，擴大國際視野。本課程教授基礎德語之文法，學習生活實用的德語會話，達到能以德語溝通的基本目標，並為未來之德文學習奠基。
description.en: This is a beginner's lesson for German language study. Students are expected to have basic German communication skills through using Audio/Video materials and through practicing in a group. It also helps students for study in Germany or study German in advance.

description.zh: 本課程利用半年一學期的時間，培養學生學習德語的興趣，培養德語簡易聽、說、讀、寫的能力，增進認識德國及德語地區文化的特色，擴大國際視野。本課程教授基礎德語之文法，學習生活實用的德語會話，達到能以德語溝通的基本目標，並為未來之德文學習奠基。
description.en: This is a beginner's lesson for German language study. Students are expected to have basic German communication skills through using Audio/Video materials and through practicing in a group. It also helps students for study in Germany or study German in advance.

description.zh: 法學概論，顧名思義是在介紹法律原理，以啟發學生法學研究的興趣。然而，法學涵蓋的層面甚廣，法學緒論的課程，只能大略介紹各種法律的共通原理，就繁駁的法律現象，作綜合的引說，俾使初學法律的人，不僅能粗知「實定法」的共通原則，還可藉此原則來培養法律見解和修養，執簡馭繁，因而體會法律的性質、內涵和理念。有關本課程的教授方式，擬先介紹法律的基概念及原理，並以答問之方式訓練學生邏輯反思的能力，同時輔以日常屢見之法律實例問題。如此，學生不僅可以可以學習正確的法律觀念和知識，並可培養縝密思辨的能力，將課堂上所習得的知識應用落實在日常生活中，以達保障並維護自己及他人權益之目的。
description.en: Introduction of Law is to introduce the theory of law and to promote students' interest to study law. Since the field of law is very broad but the time is limited, this course can briefly explain common principles of law, complex phenomena of law, etc. The main purpose of this course is to let students catch the concept of common principles of "lex scripta."  Also, this course aims to promote students' knowledge about law, thus cultivating their spirit of abiding by law.  This course will introduce the basic concept and theory of law first. Then students will be given logical training through discussion.  Besides, the general cases and problems of law will be covered as well. Through this course, students can not only get correct concepts of law, but learn to protect their/others' right.

description.zh: 面對日益複雜的社會現象與社會組織，生活規範已由傳統的道德習俗，逐漸代之以法律倫理，生活在現代化的社會，有必要從認知法理、遵守法律，進而要求落實法治。俾政府施政依法而治，社會倫理得以重建，個人權益亦獲得確實的保障。本課程兼顧理論與實例的探討，包括法律的理念與概念、法律與社會生活各層面的關聯性、現行法體制的基本認識、法治生活的檢視與展望。
description.en: Facing increasingly complicated social phenomena and organization, norms of life are governed by laws instead of traditional moral customs. Living in modern society, it is necessary to have a better understanding of the law, so that people will abide by the law and further thoroughly implement the legal system to ensure that the government administration may be performed in accordance with the law. In this way, social ethic may be re-established and individual's benefit may be protected. The discussion in the course covers theory and examples, including the concept of the law, law and politic, law and society, law and life, etc.

description.zh: 中文概述：專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論。
description.en: Case study. Seminar. Group meeting.

description.zh: 中文概述：專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論。
description.en: Case study. Seminar. Group meeting.

description.zh: 本課程為訓練學生具有敏銳的觀察能力及細密的思考能力，以發現技職教育的相關問題，並擬定完善可行的研究計畫，遂行研究工作，經客觀分析程序，並作成研究論。課程內容括技職教育研究概論、研究設計、研究方法、取樣與量測、資料處理、報告撰寫。
description.en: This course is a survey of research methodology that is relevant to the technological education. It discusses how to design quantitative research, collect, and report the data. It also highlights the difference between quantitative research and qualitative research.

name.zh: 技職教育理論與實務研究

description.zh: 剖析技職教育的基礎、本質與特性。能力本位、群集、建教合作、生計教育、職業輔導等理念對技職教育的影響。並對我國技職教育發展及特有問題的背景、產生原因以及解決之道深入探討。
description.en: Objectives and foundations of technical-vocational education; structural foundations of vocational education; organization of technical-vocational education; the future of technical-vocational education.

description.zh: 本課程在訓練學生熟悉統計方法與理論，使能利用已知的資料，經由整理、分析並作成合理解讀，作為教育相關研究工具。課程內容包括機率、抽樣分配與估計，假設考驗，相關迥歸分析、變異數分析等。
description.en: This course is designed to equip students with ability to analyze and interpret experiments and surveys. Course contains include probability concept, sampling distribution, interval estimation, hypothesis testing and analysis of variance.

name.zh: 技職教育課程發展研究

description.zh: 探討課程發展理論並以職業分析、社會需求等因素為基 礎，決定技職教育課程目標、課程內涵。並進行課程評 鑑。
description.en: Trends in methodology for designing, and evaluating curriculum in technical-vocational education at vocational high school and community college levels.

name.zh: 實習工場管理與安全研究

description.zh: 深入探討技職學校實習工場如何進行、規劃、布置、管理場房、設備物料及工場人事等事項以達到教學研究及安全法規之需求。
description.en: To probe intr the peration, the planning, the setting,workshop-management, equipment, the personnel assignment,etc.of the school shop in a vocatinal school, in order to meet the need of both teaching, research and safety regulations.

description.zh: 教學評量範圍、目的、沿革與發展，評量策略、評量結果分析及應用。
description.en: Application of personal computer to processes of classroom measurement and testing; test writing, scoring and evaluation based on computer use.

description.zh: 學習心理的特質、範圍與研究方法；認知學派、行為學派及其他相關學派；學習領域的探索，學習效果影響變項的探索；學習心理學的應用及未來發展趨勢。
description.en: Course Description: This course provides an overview of contemporary learning theories and research methodology on learning. Topics include behavioral approaches to learning , cognitive approaches to learning , and other related learning theories, types of learning, variables that affect learning, and applications of learning theories.

description.zh: 教育行政理論的歷史背景、學校社會系統理論、學校科層體制、學校氣氛、學校領導、決策、溝通理論、學校效能研究。
description.en: Historical background of the theories of educational administration; theories of school social system ; school departmental hierarchy; school atmosphere; school leadership; theories of decision and communication; studies of school efficiency.

description.zh: （一）瞭解、預測及控制組織內工成員的行為；（二）培養積極有效管理組織內工成員的行為之基本能力。課程內容以個体、團体與組織三層次為經，行為基礎、激勵理論、個体決策、團体行為、團体決策、溝通理論、領導、權力與政治、組織設計、組織文化、組織變革與發展等相觀議題。課程實施方法為講解、討論、個案研究及專題討論。
description.en: Human behavior in work organizations; nature of organizations; models of organization; design work structuring; motivation and performance; group and intergroup behavior; influence processes and planned change.

name.zh: 人力資源管理專題研究
name.en: Special Topics in Human Resource Management

description.zh: 研究生探討主題可針對當前人力資源管理重要課題，挑選有興趣之子題研擬，心得報告於課堂中研討。
description.en: Exploration of concepts, current issues, and implication underlying from major research in human resource management. Discussion, selected topics research, and reporting in class are required.

description.zh: 研究生探討主題可針對當前技職教育與訓練或人力資源領域進行能力分析，挑選有興趣之子題研擬，心得報告於課堂中研討。
description.en: Exploration of competency analysis in technical-vocational education & training program or in the field of human resource. Discussion, selected topics research, and reporting in class are required.

name.zh: 職業分析與輔導實務研究
name.en: Practical Study of Occupation Analysis & Guidance

description.zh: 研究生探討主題可針對職業內容、從業人員條件、職業相關資料，與職業手冊編製與運用進行個案探討。
description.en: Exploration of the main research in occupation analysis & guidance. Topics include occupation contents, the requirement of enterprise worker, occupation relation occupation, and the application & compilation of occupational manual. Case study, discussion, reporting are required.

name.zh: 電腦在教育研究的應用

description.zh: 本課程訓練學生熟悉電腦系統並應用電腦套裝軟體，作為研究分析之基礎，以進行教育研究工作，包含SPSS、ERIC及其他相關軟體。
description.en: This course emphasis the applications of computer in the educational research.

description.zh: 研究生依據個人基礎:透過個別化指導，就其興趣對教育行政領域，進行小型研究問題的探討與實作以發展研究能力。
description.en: Exploration of current issues, trends and research in educational administration. An individualized study program is planned to develop the skills and research for graduate students and guided by a professor.

description.zh: 研究生透過個別化的學習方式，就其興趣對專案管理領域，進行小型研究問題的探討與實作，以發展研究能力。
description.en: Exploration of current issues, theories and research in project management of technical-vocational education. An individualized study program is planned to develop the skills and research for graduate students and guided by a professor.

description.zh: 研究生依據個人基礎，透過個別化的學習方式，就其興趣對職業訓練領域，進行小型研究問題的探討與實作，以發展研究能力。
description.en: Exploration of theories, trends and research in vocational training of technical-vocational education. An individualized study program is planned to develop the skills and research for graduate students and guided by a professor.

description.zh: 研究生透過個別化的學習方式就其興趣對技職教育課程的設計領域，進行小型研究問題的探討與實作，以發展研究能力。
description.en: Exploration of current issues, theories and research in curriculum design of technical-vocational education. An individualized study program is planned to develop the skills and research for graduate students and guided by a professor.

name.zh: 獨立研究--教育理論與教育政策
name.en: Independent Study:Theory and Policy of Education

description.zh: 研究生依據個人基礎:透過個別化指導，就其興趣對教育理論與教育政策領域，進行小型研究問題的探討與實作以發展研究能力。
description.en: Exploration of current issues and research in educational theory and educational policy.  An individualized study program is planned to develop the skills and research for graduate students and guided by a professor.

description.zh: 研究生透過個別化的學習方式，就其興趣對遠距教育領域，進行小型研究問題的探討與實作，以發展研究能力。
description.en: An individualized study program is planned for graduate students to develop the skill and research and guided by a professor. Analysis of current issues and conclusion or implications underlying major research in fields of distance education through independent, directed study.

description.zh: 研究教師專業的基本素養與評量標準，並探究教師生涯各階段專業發展的再精進策略
description.en: Critical study of the basic literacy of teachers and assessment of professional criteria. Exploration of successful strategies of professional development for teachers in different career stages.

description.zh: 本課程主要探討與各種維生線系統有關的管理技能，諸如公路、通訊、給水管線、電力線、橋樑、瓦斯管線等系統均將加以說明。
description.en: This cause will introduce all kind of management thechniques with infrastructure system, such as highway, communication utility,water supply utility,power utility, bridge and gas utility.

name.zh: 結構隔減震及耐震設計
name.en: Seismic Isolation and Earthquake Resistant Design

description.zh: 本課程主要在於介紹結構如何提高結構物承受地震力之能力，並探討各國有關結構隔減震及耐震設計規範，使同學了解其設計精神所在，更進一步訓練同學建立對於各種結構使用何種設計的判斷能力及設計技術。

name.en: Planning and Design of Incineration System

description.zh: 本課程以講授廢棄物焚化處理系統之規劃與設計為主,使學生能瞭解此專業技術之基本原理,其課程內容包括:1.焚化系統概述     2.燃燒基本原理      3.焚化爐類型與特性4.焚化系統基礎規劃 5.焚化爐基礎設計    6.後處理設施之評選.
description.en: To promote the knowledge of incineration system for students,the course,Planning and Design of Incineration System,focuses on concept and basic principle with the following items:1.Introduction.2.Basic theory of combustion.3.Performance of incinerator.4.Basic design.5.Preliminary planning.6.Air pollution control devices.

name.en: Mass Rapid Transit System Basics and Concepts

description.zh: 本課程授課內容包含：(1)緒論、(2)捷運系統與都市發展之關係、(3)捷運系統技術型式之評析、(4)國內捷運建設之問題剖析、(5)捷運安全：以木柵線火燒車事件為例、(6)捷運系統工程及營運管理、(7)21世紀人類先進大眾運輸系統。
修先課程：光學。 本課程利用傅氏轉換理論解釋繞射理論及光影像處理與光資訊處理技術，它包含：1.簡介 2.二維線性系統分析3.繞射理論 4.近場及遠場繞射5.透鏡之傅氏轉換與影像品質分析 6.影像系統之頻域分析7.空間濾波與光資訊處理 8.全像
description.en: This course illustrates the diffraction theory and techniques of image processing and optical information processing by using the methods of Fourier transform. It involves：1. Introduction2.Analysis of 2-D linear systems3.Diffraction theory 4.Fresnel and Fraunhofer diffraction5.Fourier transforming6.Frequency analysis of optical imaging properties of lenses 7.Spatial filtering and optical information processing8.Holography

description.zh: 本課程為光電學程基礎課程之一。本課程包括黑體輻射、量子力學概念、原子能階、半導體、接合面，光之調制、顯示器、雷射、光偵測器、光纖維波導以及光通訊。
description.en: Introduction to Optoelectronic Engineering is one of fundamental electro-optics courses. It consists Blackbody Radiation, Quantum Mechanical Concepts, Energy Bands, Semiconductors, Junctions, Modulation of Light, Display Devices, Lasers, Photo-detectors, Fiber Optical Wave-guide and Optical Communication.

description.zh: 本課程為光電學程進階課程之一。其內容包含: (1) 光纖通訊系統的簡介; (2)光纖的結構和光傳播的特性; (3)光源和傳輸器; (4) 光檢測器和接收器; (5) 光纖系統的設計和效能.
description.en: Fiber-optic communication is one of the advanced courses in electro-optics program. The following contents are included: (1) introductions; (2) optical fibers; (3) optical sources and transmitters; (4) optical detectors and receivers; (5) system design and performance.

description.zh: 本課程為光電學程基礎課程之一。從黑體輻射之頻譜分析開始，引入量子化的概念；進而推出物質與波動之二象性。經由波爾之半古典的氫原子模型，結合量子化的概念以解釋原子結構，並引入薛丁格方程式所求得之波函數與電子之空間機率的關係。再由原子進而推廣至分子及固態物理之能帶理論，應用能帶理論於解釋固態晶體之光、電及熱學等特性，並介紹半導體之應用的基本原理。
description.en: Modern Physics is one of fundamental electro-optics program courses. From the analysis of the spectrum of black-body radiation, the concept of quantization is introduced and the duality of matter and wave is also introduced. Combining the idea of quantization and the semi-classical hydrogen model of Bohr, the structure of atom is described. Solving the Schrodinger equation, the deduced wave function is related to the probability of finding the electron in space. The concept of atom is expanded to the molecular and the energy band theory of solid state physics. The energy band theory of solid state physics is applied to account the optical, electrical and thermal properties of solid states, also the fundamental princ

description.zh: 本課程為光電學程進階課程之一。本課程包括光訊號傳輸、影像處理、傳真機、掃瞄器、CD、DVD、全像術、數位照相機等原理及應用。
description.en: Introduction to Optical Information is one of advanced electro-optics courses. It consists principles and Applications of Optical Signal Processing, Image Processing, Fax Machine, Scanner, CD, DVD, Holography, Digtal Camera, etc.

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論
description.en: Case Study. Seminar. Group meeting.

description.zh: 面對科技發展日新月異，社會急驟變遷的新世紀，只習得專業上的一技之長，已不足以和協圓滿地實踐有意義的人生。有鑑於此，乃以生涯發展與生涯諮商的理論與研究為基礎，配合學生的發展，希翼能透過教育的歷程，使學生的專業知識能和未來的工作與生活規劃，產生有意義的聯結，進而為學生提供一個短程與長程的生涯發展與選擇的準備與指引。授課內容包括生涯理念介紹、興趣、性格、價值觀探索，生涯決定因素，生涯技巧，生涯角色調適，生涯選擇與規劃技巧，生涯訪談，生涯高原調適，轉型期調適，性別、職業歧視，雙生涯家庭，就業準備等主要生涯課題的研討與習作。
description.en: In face of a new century with continuous scientific development and rapid social changes, to learn one single professional skill is not enough to fulfill a meaningful life in a harmonic and satisfactory manner. In view of this, based on the theory and research of career development and consultation in association with the development of students,  it is hoped to produce a meaningful linking between their professional knowledge and job and life planning through the course of eucation, and further to provide them a preparation and guide for short and long-range career development and choice. The contents of the course include the discussion and exercise related to major career topics such as introduction to the concept of career, the discussion of interest, character and value, decisive factors of career, skills of career, role adjustment in career, career choice and planning skill, career interview, uphill adjustment in career, adjustment in transit period, sex and occupation.

description.zh: 兩性關係是人際關係的核心問題，它關係著交友的態度、婚姻生活的幸福與社會的祥和。本課程由對兩性差異性的了解為基礎，以尊重為原則，在平等互助的精神中，確定兩性關係的和諧。本課程內容包括理論與實際的配合，儘量以生活化的內容貫穿其間，並注重課程內容的可實踐性，以協助學生處理兩性關係的難題。
description.en: Gender Studies is a core issue of interpersonal relationship.  It involves attitudes toward making friends, marriage and social tranquility.  This course aims to help students become aware of sex difference, understand the importance of respect, equality and mutual-help between sexes.  The contents of the course will cover both theory and practice, providing cases and examples related to our daily life so as to help students handle problems when getting along with the opposite sex.

description.zh: 本課程由基本構造分析概念、運動力學分析、板塊構造等之介紹，進一步闡述斷層、節理、褶曲、劈理等構造現象。
description.en: The basic concept of structural dynamic analysis, introduction of plate tectonic and origin & characteristics of strata, fault, joints, fold and cleavage.

description.zh: 探、取樣及地球物理方法，十字片剪力儀、孔內側壓力儀、平鈹膨脹                                          儀、階段平鈑膨脹儀、孔內直接剪力儀、平鈑載重試驗、基椿載重試驗                                          、地錯抗拔試驗、現場透水試驗探討，岩石直剪、平鈑、岩石裂縫、孔                                          內應力、岩栓抗拔、隧道浮空等量測探討，鋼筋計、水壓計、土壓計、                                          沈陷計等監測儀器之運用說明。
description.en: advanced engineering geology , sampling and physical method, application of                                          instrument and test like pressurement , vane shear instrument , dilationter . in-situ                                          permeability test, direct shear instrument, foundation loads test, rock direct shear                                          test, rock cleft, pressure meter, steel bar instrument , piezometer, soil pressurement

description.zh: 一、合成方法--固相、溶液、氣相反應法二、成核與晶體成長機構與速率三、單晶合成-矽晶、石英及鑽石四、粉末合成-鈦酸鋇系、氧化鐵系、氧化鋯、氧化鋁、氧化鋅之合成五、薄膜技術簡介

description.zh: 本課程之目的在於討論資源開發進行中及開發後所可能對環境造成之衝擊以及如何因應之對策，其中包括空氣、水、噪音及震動等之控制方法。對於開發後之土地復整及二次利用亦在本課程討論之列。
description.en: This class is to discuss the impact of the mining operations to the environment and how these problem can be resolved.  It includes air, water, noise and vibration controls.  It also discuss the mine reclamation and secondary usage of mined land.

description.zh: 人的身體一接觸自然界，便開始各個器官的功能，人不如機器，無法汰換零件，加上身體機能遇到問題之後，許多人往往不知如何處理應對，甚至身體出現徵兆也渾然不知。所以此科目最主要的目的是希望藉由對醫學的認識，讓大學生們更瞭解自己的身體，進而保護並時時自我偵測身體是否正常運作，要培養健全的大學生，而不是只會讀書的大病貓。
description.en: Once the human body contacts the natural environment, the organs of the body begin to function.  But the human body can not change it's organizational like machine.  So when our body's function is in trouble, we always have no idea how to solve it, either to find out.  One of these course's objection is to let college students understanding their own body by learning some important medical concepts.  We hope that our country both has excellent and healthy college students,  and not all sick.

description.zh: 本課程將透過每週專題演講方式，讓學生了解有機材料之最新開發成品或最先進之研究成果。演講者之安排將以校外知名專家學者及校內各計畫執行者為主。
description.en: This course will provide important information regarding to the latest development or application on the organic materials. Speakers being invited are well-known scholars in organic area.  Graduate students or thesis advisors will also be invited to report any in interesting result from their graduate studies.

description.zh: 本課程之教學目的，在使學生對污水系統有整體之設計概念，使其未來在實務工作時，了解如何著手進行設計一具水準、經濟、高效益之污水下水道系統。課程內容包括：1.污水下水道系統規則  2.管線系統設計 3.抽水設施設計 4.污水處理方法之選擇 5.污水處理設施(除油、攔污、沈砂)設計 6.初沈池設計 7.各種生物處理法設計 8.終沈池、浮除設計 9.三級處理設計 10.污泥濃縮設計 11.污泥消化設計 12.污泥脫水、焚化設計 13.污水處理廠配置設計 14.污水處理廠水力計算 15.污水處理機械設備及儀控系統選擇 16.污水處理廠機械動力設計 17.污水處理廠附屬設備設計
description.en: This course provides a general designing concept of wastewater treatment system, and makes student to understand how to make a design of wastewater treatment system, which combine quality, economizatin and high efficiency. The contents of the course include:rules of sewerage system, design of pipe system, design of pumping ststem, design of the facilities of sewage treatment, unit operation and unit process design of biological unit system, and design of advanced sewage treatment.

description.zh: 本課程主要探討界面的物理化學現象及其在高科技之應用。包括有(1) 表面及界面張力的分子理論(2)界面的作用力(3)表面及界面的熱力學(4)液體和固體界面的熱力學(5)表面及界面張力的測量(6)接觸角的測量(7)吸附的熱力學(8)分散液的穩定性(9)分散液分子間吸力及斥力(10)懸浮液之高分子穩定性(11)凝聚(12)界面科學在高科技及光電工業上之原理及應用。
description.en: This course is to elucidate the interfacial phenomena and its application in high-tech Industries. It includes (1)molecular theory of surface and interface (2)molecular interaction of interface (3)thermodynamics of surface and interfaces (4)thermodynamics of liquids in contact with solids (5)measurement of surface and interfacial tension (6)contact angle measurement (7)thermodynamics of adsorption (8)stability of dispersion (9)molecular interaction of dispersion (10)stability of suspension (11)flocculation(12)application of interface science in High-tech industries

name.zh: 界面活性劑原理與應用
name.en: The Principles and Applications of Surface Active Agent

description.zh: 本課程將介紹界面活性劑的種類及其化學製程、界面活性劑於界面之吸附現象、微胞形成原理與應用、表面改質技術、發泡劑的應用等。
description.en: This course will introduce (1)characteristic features of surfactant and its preparation (2)adsorption of surface-active agents at interfaces (3)micelle formation by surfactants (4)modification of surface properties by surfactants (5)foaming and antifoaming by aqueous solutions of surfactants.

description.zh: 一、張量分析二、電性質三、介電性質四、壓電性質五、磁性質六、光學性質七、其他-包括光電、電光、光磁、磁光特性。
description.en: 1.(Tensor analysis) 2.(Electrical  Properties)3.(Dielectric  Properties)4.(Piezoelectric)5.(Magnetic Properties)6.(Optical  Properties)7.(Miscellaneous, includes optic-electronics electro-optics optic-magnetic magneto-optics)

name.en: Special topics on designing SCADA Systems

description.zh: 監控系統介紹監控系統之應用遠端資訊設備感測器與轉換器資料擷取通訊系統規劃通訊協定人機介面實例研討

description.zh: 科技管理有別於一般管理，主要以科技產業、科技領域、科技組織、科技人才為層面，探討各項管理技巧，管理科學的應用，其主要內容包含：1.科技管理的領域，2.科技管理模式，3.科技企業組織及管理，4.科技專案管理，5.科技行銷管理，6.科技管理的新發展。
description.en: 1.The coverage of technology management. 2.Technology management model. 3.The organization and management of technology      corporation.4.The management of technology projects. 5.The management of technology marketing. 6.The development of technology management.

description.zh: 本課程教導學生作為一位諮詢顧問師所需具備的技巧及在今日工商社會中有效溝通的要件。本課程所涵蓋的主題為：1.管理諮詢的目的和範圍，2. 顧問師的職責和角色，3. 諮詢的過程，4. 計劃書的擬定與合約的草擬，5. 訪談與展示的技巧，及6. 手冊與研究報告的撰寫。學生必須完成一項分組個案來應証對本課程所教授的管理諮詢與溝通技巧。
description.en: This course teaches the students basic skills possessed by a management consultant and the criteria for effective communication in today's business community. Topics covered by this course are: (1) Scope and Purpose of Management Consulting, (2) Duties and Roles of A Consultant, (3) Consulting Process (4) Writing a Proposal and Drafting A Contract, (5) Interview and Presentation Skills, and (6) Development of a Manual and Report Writing. A group project is required to demonstrate student's understanding of the consulting and communication skills learned in this course.

description.zh: 介紹真空技術基本概念、各種真空泵原理、真空元件用材料特性、各種真空元件及其材料特性、真空壓力量測技術、真空計工作原理、真空系統設計、真空測漏技術及真空系統之各種應用，使用和維修。
description.en: An introduction course for the basic concept of vacuum technology, vacuum pump, system components and their material properties. The measuring methods of vacuum system, working principals of vacuum meter, system design, leak-detecting technology and the applications of vacuum system will also be presented.

description.zh: 科技日文主要是以培養閱讀日文科技期刊或論文能力為重點，俾充實大學理工系、所學生參考日文系列技術論文或工程手冊時之理解、翻譯與書寫方式。課程內容包含：    1.論文閱讀練習    2.翻訣技巧    3.技術論文之書寫

description.zh: 本課程將有系統的介紹中國各類藝術的來龍去脈，基本知識和理論，使學生對中國各類藝術有初步瞭解，具備欣賞能力，並能滌淨心靈。課程內容包括:1.建築部分：涵蓋宮殿、寺廟、陵墓、民居等不同建築類型，以及中國著名之庭園介紹。2.器物部分：講述中國玉器、金銀器、陶瓷器、琺瑯器、漆器、象牙、竹木器等。3.介紹自新石器時代以後之雕塑、佛像、明器等，欣賞其形式美、材質美與其表現涵意。4.解說中國繪畫史，各朝代重要畫家，就山水、花鳥、人物、畜獸等，分析其構圖，用筆用墨，使用皴法等。
description.en: The course is to equip students with the ability to understand and appreciate Chinese Art. Contents: 1.Architecture: including the architecture of palace, temple, emperor's mausoleum, residence, as well as famous gardens in China. 2.Wares: such as jade objects of China, gold and silver ware, ceramics and porcelain, cement ware, lacquer ware, ivory,bamboo, etc. 3.Sculpture: introducing clay statute of Buddha, ware, and appreciating the beauty and expression of art. 4.Painting: introducing the history of Chinese painting, master painters, and various painting; analyzing the making of a sketch of a painting, stroking, and inking, of landscape, flower-bird works, figure painting, and animal painting.

description.zh: 深入一層探討素描，增加複雜，及難度。修過素描（一）或有基礎之同學，均可修此課程。使用四開紙，靜物之種類增加，例如水果、蔬菜、酒瓶、襯布所構成之畫面，要能加以構圖，而後表現各類物品之質感，以及玻璃之透明感。亦包括人物速寫、交通工具，以及較複雜之建築物寫生。要求作畫速度與準確度相互配合，每幅作品兩週完成。
description.en: Study sketching further in order to increase its complexity and sophistication.  This class is limited to students who have taken the Sketch (I) course.Quarto papaer shall be used to paint various still life, for example, fruits, vegetables, wine bottles and composition of a picture on canvas.  It is important to conceive the picture first and then express the quality of each object and the transparency of glass.  It also includes the sketch of figure painting, transportation and complex architecture. The coordination of painting speed and precision is important, as each painting shall be completed within two weeks.

description.zh: 邀請校內外學者專家至校針對某一專長領域進行專題演講，讓學生藉由聽講及心得報告之寫作，開展視野，並與時代之脈動相契合。
description.en: Invited speakers from different disciplines give speech in their specialized area. Thus students can broaden their eyesight and also keep updating the technology and its applications of the generation.

description.zh: 本課程旨在探討各種類型之神經網路，如逆傳遞網路、機率神經網路、學習向量量化網路、反傳遞網路、自述應共振理論、霍普菲爾網路、雙向聯想記憶網路、自組織映射圖網路等，此外相關文獻及運用之領域將深入討論。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to study the several ANN paradigm，such as Bachpropogation，prohability ANN，learning vector quantization，Counter-propagation，self-organizing map，Hopqueld network，BAM etc. Besides，the relative literature and applications will also cover .

description.zh: 本課程主要目標在研習以VLSI的觀點來設計近代數位訊號處理架構，使學生得以將數位訊號處理的架構以超大型積體電路IC方式來實現之。其課程內容包含如下：1、超大型積體電路介紹2、各式數位訊號架構介紹3、各式加減乘除法器架構4、DCT、FIR、MPEG等架構5、近代高效率數位訊號等架構6、專題研究
description.en: This course is an introduction to the design and implementation of various types of VLSI DSP structures and such that the students have the ability of DSP IC design in this course. The major topics covered in this course are:1、Introduction to modern VLSI system2、Introduction to digital signal processing system3、Architectures of adder、subtracter、multiplier、divider etc.4、Architectures of DCT、FIR and MPEG etc.5、Modern high-performance DSP architecture6、Special project

description.zh: 本課程旨在介紹河川污染控制中有關河川污染源的種類及數量，就其分析模式中有關溶氧之來源、溶氧之消耗、非感潮河川與氧垂曲線模式之推演、河川調查及資料分析工作及河川涵容能力之計算方法亦有完整之敘說，藉由河川涵容能力之推估，達到控制或分配家庭污水及工業廢水之目的。
description.en: The objective of this course is to introduce the River Pollution Control.

description.zh: 污水工程主要講授管線收集系統及污水處理系統二大部分管理系統，分為雨水及污水收集系統，舉凡水量、水質之估算及管線之施工等，皆為授課範圍。污水處理的方法講授：(1)物理方法，如攔污柵、沈砂、沈澱池、(2)生物方法，如活性污泥法、過濾池等、(3)化學方法，如混凝、化學沈澱等，處理方法講授原理及應用，設計準則與工程設計施工。
description.en: Sewerage system includes sanitary sewerage and storm water sewer systems. Their planning, design, and construction method methods are all included in this study. Wastewater treatment is also emphasized in this course.

name.en: Operation and Maintenance of Water Plant

description.zh: 水處理廠操作與維護課程包括給水工程及污水工程設施之操作與維護,本課程為傳統衛生工程設施最主要之部份,內容涵蓋物理單元化學單元以及生物單元之操作維護,主要之設施包括前處理,混凝,沈澱,過濾,消毒,活性污泥,旋轉生物盤,接觸曝氣法以及污泥處理,處置單元之操作維護.
description.en: Water supply Engineering includes the system from water sources, intake, conveyor, purification and distribution. Water source will discuss about the intakes and resource conservation. Conveyor will have topics about layout, pumping and piping. Water treatment flow sheet is most important part in this course and the special treatment about odor problem is also studied.

description.zh: 本課程以汽車產業為例，說明車輛生產與行銷較一般商品所涵蓋的範疇複雜，如車輛製造管理、新車市場行銷、中古車通路、售後服務到融資與保險等的關連性，使之瞭解其間的重要性，並使其對未來車輛產業的職場認識有助益外，又可增添其在就業市場上的競爭機會。
description.en: This course takes the vehicle industry as an example to introduce the vehicle production and marketing in the part of production preparation, mass production control, new car marketing, used car marketing, after service, insurance, etc. The purpose of this course is to increase students' knowledge of vehicle industry and enhance students' competitive advantage.

description.zh: 介紹陶瓷基本特性如晶體結構、固態化學及其物理性質、微結構行為等，並藉由陶瓷的機械性、熱學性質、磁學性質、光學性質、導電性等特質應用於一般工業材料上。
description.en: Ceramic material is concerned with understanding the development, use, and control of the properties of ceramics from the point of view of theories and practices. It involves: characteristics of ceramics, crystals, glass,defects, interfaces, phase diagrams, phase transformation, glass-ceramics, solids reactions, sintering, vitrification, thermal properties, optical properties, elasticity, strength, thermal stress, electrical conductivity, dielectric properties, magnetic properties, etc..

description.zh: 1.醫用電子學之基礎。2.生醫電物理化學之基礎。3.人體生理系統與經絡系統介紹。4.生醫系統電物理化學模型分析。5.醫用電探針、感測器元件與生物晶片的應用。6.量測理論與生醫電訊號量測技術。7.生醫電訊號處理技術。8.超音波、紅外線、X光、CT、磁振醫學造影原理與影像處理。9.醫用電子安全規格製訂。10.醫用醫療儀器與生化分析儀設計。11.DICOM、HL7醫療網路資訊系統介紹。12.中西醫工應用系列介紹。
description.en: 1.Fundamental of medical electronics。2.Fundamental of electro-physiology。3.Introduction to human body system and Meridian system。4.Electronic physics-chemical modeling analysis of   biomedical system。5.Applications of medical electrode、biosensor and biochip。 6.Medical measurement theory and technology。7.Processing technology of biomedical signals。8.Constructing and processing of ultrasound、infrared、X-ray  、CT and MRI Imaging。9.Safety specifications of medical electronic devices。10.Designs of biomed

description.zh: 1.寬頻通訊系統簡介2.寬頻通道特性3.系統分析基礎4.UTRA實體層設計5.UTRA傳輸系統6.無線電資源管理7.CDMA20008.OFDM
description.en: 1.Introduction to Wideband Communication Systems2.Wideband Channel Characterization3.System Analysis Fundamentals4.The UTRA Physical Layer Design5.The UTRA Transmission System6.Radio Resource Management7.CDMA20008.OFDM

description.zh: 電腦運動控制課程包含下列課題：(1) 命令產生器設計 (2)運動本體與回授系統介紹 (3)基礎迴授控制器設計 (4)前饋控制器設計 (5)估測器設計(6)多軸路徑控制 (7) 案例探討 -- 半導體與LCD設備。學生從這門課程中可學到如何利用 PC_based 控制器去完成一套運動控制系統。
description.en: The course of computerized motion control includes the following topics:  (1) Command generator design (2) Introduction of motion control plant and feedback system (3) Feedback control loop design (4) Feedforward control loop design (5) Observer design (6) Multi-axis contouring control (7) Case study: semiconductor/LCD equipment。 The student will understand how to develop a PC_based motion control system by this course.

name.zh: 自動化光學精密檢測概論

description.zh: 本課程講授自動化光學精密檢測技術，內容包括如下：精密量測及機器視覺原理概論，各種光學檢測技術，自動化系統整合，目前產業相關技術應用，及結論。
description.en: This subject is arranged to introduce the principles and techniques required in Automatic Optical Inspection (AOI). The subject includes the following subtopics: introduction to precision metrology and machine vision, the measurement principles and methods used in the automatic optical inspection, AOI system integration and technologies, and conclusion.

description.zh: 數位影像處理的基礎 2.影像的轉換 3.影像的加強 4.影像的復原 5.彩色影像的處理 6.影像的壓縮 7.影像的分割與特徵抽取 8.影像的表達及描述 9.影像的辨認與解釋 10.導航與醫學影像
description.en: 1.Digital image fundamentals. 2.Image transforms. 3.Image enhancement. 4.Image restoration. 5.Color image processing. 6.Image compression. 7.Image segmentation and feature detection. 8.Representation and description. 9.Recogmition and interpretation. 10.Applications:ALV navigation and medical image.

description.zh: 1. 傅利葉分析與訊號取樣，2. 離散時序系統之頻率響應與電路設計， 3. Infinite Impulse Response 數位濾波器設計：Bilinear 轉換式，Impulse-invariance 方式，Step-invariance 方式，高通、帶通、帶拒濾波器轉換式，4.Finite Impulse Response 數位濾波器設計：Fourier Series 方法，Window 方法，5. 離散與快速傅利葉轉換：DFT、FFT等演算法。
description.en: 1.Fourier analysis and signal sampling 2.Frequcy response of discrete time system 3.IIR digital filter design 4.FIR digital filter design 5.Discrete Fourier transform 6.Fast Fourier transform

description.zh: 先修課程：3001018或負責教授同意。此課程為製造組基本重要課程、其內容為討論定形刀刃和非定形刀刃之切削機構、塊狀和板金之變形機構、以及連結和剝離機構。並討論上述之各種加工實例。例如車、銑、鑽、磨、搪拋光、焊接、EDM、ECM、USM、LBM、EBM、鍛造及沖壓等加工情形。
description.en: Introduction to Manufacturing Systems, Theories of Metal Processing including Electrical Methods, Case Studies of Manufacturing Systems, Discuss of the Metal Processing of Manufacture.

description.zh: 先修課程:3001051或負責教授同意。參數化設計之介紹及應用、特徵基底模型之建立及組合、模型特徵之拷貝及仿造、目標導向設計之概念及應用、複雜曲面特徵之合成及修整、模型特徵從屬關係之介紹、圖層之產生及使用、模型組件之合成及修改。
description.en: Introduction and Applications of Parametric Design, Construction and Assembly of Feature Based Models, Copying and Patterning of Model Features, Concept and Applications of Design Intent, Synthesis and Triming of Complex Surface Features, Introduction to Parent-child Relationship Between Model Feature, Generation and Usage of Layers, Synthesis and Modification of Model Assembly.

description.zh: 複習矩陣及向量、狀態空間描述法、求解狀態空間方程式、可控制性及可觀察性、穩定性分析、狀態變數回饋系統的設計、簡介最佳控制、簡介強健控制。
description.en: Review of matrices and vectors, state space representation of control systems, the solution of the state space equations, controllability and observability, stability analysis, design of state variable feedback systems, optimal control systems, and robust control systems.

description.zh: 機械振動、非線性振動、振動量測、振動抑制及隔離技術、振動與波之傳播、聲音之反射及折射、噪音之降低及吸音材料、消音器與噪音控制、法規及環境等。
description.en: Topics include: Mechanical vibration, Vibration  transmission, Vibration measurement, The use of vibration isolators and absorbers, Fundamentals of acoustics, Noise control engineering, Instrumentation and Law.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意材料機械性質是強調材料巨觀性質與材料微觀結構, 鍵結及晶體結構之間的關係, 是一門實務性,基本且重要的課程。它包括彈性, 塑性行為, 差排理論, 單晶與聚晶材料之塑性變形, 複合材料, 高溫聚晶材料之變形, 非晶質材料之永久變形, 材料強化機構, 材料破壞, 潛變與氫脆性等問題之討論。
description.en: This course deals with the mechanical behavior of materials. It emphasizes the relationship among macroscopic properties, material microstructure, and fundamental concepts of bonding and crystal structure. Contents of this course include the elastic and elastic behavior , dislocation , plastic deformation in single and polycrystalline materials ,strengthening mechanism of crystalline materials, composite materials, high temperature of crystalline materials ,fracture , fatigue and embrittlement.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。製造系統之基本概念與架構，先進製造技術/系統（如CNC、機器人、群組技術、製程規畫、FMS、CIM等）之探討。製造（裝配）系統之設計與評估模擬，個案研究。
description.en: Basic concept and components of manufacturing system. Study of advanced manufacturing technology/system including CNC, Robotics, Group technology, Process Planing, FMS, CIM ,etc. Design and evaluation of a manufacturing system with special emphasis on assembly tasks.

description.zh: 建議先修課程：流體力學、水文學、統計學資料研析方法、水文統計與迴歸分析、小流域洪水推估(含基本水文系統實驗)、基本水文系統實驗、頻率分析(2)、水文演算、水力演算、降雨逕流模擬、地理資訊系統(GIS)結合地文單位歷線(GIUH)、序率水文模式，HEC-2,6 講解與實習、專題討論
description.en: Prerequisite(suggested) : Fluid mechanics, Hydrology, StatisticsIntroduction, Data error analyses, Hydrological statistics, Frequency analyses, Stochastic analyses, Hydrological routing, Hydraulic routing, GIUH plus GIS, Small watershed flood prediction(including Lab. experiment), Seminar.

description.zh: 介紹渠流基本原理及運算，配合水利工程實務，使學者了解基本渠力理論、渠變基本概念及設計簡易水工結構物。建議先修課程：流體力學水文學1.渠流通論 2.渠流及其特性 3.能量及動量原理及應用 4.等速渠流公式與計算 5.等速渠流斷面之設計 6.定量緩變流之理論分析與計算 7.實際渠流問題(ex:倒虹吸，量水設備)8.空間緩變渠流 9.水躍與消能池設計 10.變量渠流 11.洪水演算
description.en: Prerequisite(suggested):Fluid Mechanics.Hydrology,Statistics Introduction,Energy-Depth Relationships,Uniform flow, Gradually-Varied Flow Computations,Hydraulic Jump,Rapidly-Varied Flows,Spatially-Varied Flows, Supercritical flow,Unsteady flow, Semimar.

description.zh: 1. 傅利葉分析與訊號取樣，2. 離散時序系統之頻率響應與電路設計， 3. Infinite Impulse Response 數位濾波器設計：Bilinear 轉換式，Impulse-invariance 方式，Step-invariance 方式，高通、帶通、帶拒濾波器轉換式，4.Finite Impulse Response 數位濾波器設計：Fourier Series 方法，Window 方法，5. 離散與快速傅利葉轉換：DFT、FFT等演算法。

name.zh: 有限元素法在大地工程之應用
name.en: Finite Element Method in Geotechnical Engineering

description.zh: 有限元素法常被用來模擬基礎施工、開控支撐及山坡地開控的過程，預估土壤或岩盤的變形行為，研判或分析施工的安全性。本課程的內容除了講授有限元素法的基本理論，尚須以大地工程的案例作為實際推導公式理論之演練。其案例包括滲流問題、壓密沉陷問題及土石結構穩定分析等等。
description.en: Finite element method ha been widely used to simulae the process of foundation construction, cut and bracing and excavation etc, and to predict and analyze the construction safety. This course should include the basic theory and sfiffues matrix formulation, in addition, geotechnical engineering problem are in addition, geotechical engineering problems are used to help students to understand the basic theory and code formulation. These examle problems includes seepage, consolidation and earth structure stability analyses.

description.zh: 闡述可靠性工程基本理論與數學並結合電子系統可靠性設計方法，包括四個單元如下：（１） 可靠性基本理論與數學（２） 電子系統可靠性設計實務：電路簡，化電子零件選用與篩選， 降額設計，瞬態抑制與保護電路，電磁相容設計，熱與振動設       計，餘裕（３） 可靠性分析方法：可靠性模式與預估，失效模式。效應與關鍵       性分析，故障樹分析（４） 可靠性試驗：環境應力篩選，可靠性成長與鑑定試驗，加速壽       命試驗。
description.en: Discussed the basic concept and mathematical of reliability engineering associated with comprehensive methodolgy of electronic system reliability design practices. These topics are grouped into four parts as follow :1.Devoted to the basic theory and mathematical of reliability   engineering. 2.Deal with electronic system reliability design practices :   Circuit simplification , parts selection and application ,   Hi-Rel parts screening , Derating , Transients suppression   and protection circuits , EMC design , Thermal and   vibration design , and Redundancy. 3.Dosvusses the reliability analysis methods : Reliability   modeling and prediction , Failure mode、effects and   criticality analysis (FMECA) , and Fault tree analysis   (FTA). 4.Dedicated to reliability testing : Environmental streess   screening (ESS) , Reliability growth test , Reliability   qualification test , and Accelerated life test.
